GSP28mimsvtku:3227: pūrvaṃ sati sambhava iti parisaṃkhyoktā, tasyāḥ phalam etad bhāṣyakāreṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:3228: pratipādyate. evaṃ hi nyāyābhāsabhrāntāḥ śiṣyā bhāṣyakāreṇa śikṣitāḥ yad vivakṣitāsambhave vākyabhedādibhir api sūtrāṇi gamayitavyānīti. tad ihaiva tāvac codanāsūtre pradarśyate yad vākyabhedenāpi codanāsūtrārtho bodhyata
GSP28mimsvtku:3230: arthaḥ. eṣety api ca bhāṣyoktaiva vākyabhedagatiḥ pratyavamṛśyate. yathāha
GSP28mimsvtku:3231: -- bhinnayor eva vākyayor{1,196}imāv ekadeśāv iti. tad anena śiṣyān
GSP28mimsvtku:3232: pratyaviśeṣe 'pi vyākhyātṝṇām eva vyākhyāprakāro bhāṣyakāreṇokta iti darśitam. vyākhyākārā hi ciraparicitanyāyasāmastyasmaraṇakṣamā nyāyabalena vākyabhedādibhir api sūtrāṇi vyācakṣata iti || 277 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3233: yataś ca pramāṇāntarānusāreṇa vākyabhedādibhir api sūtreṣv avagatiḥ sambhavati, tasmād āvṛttyā vā tantreṇa vedaṃ sūtraṃ vyākhyeyam ity āha -- tasmād iti. āvṛttau tāvat sakalam eva sūtraṃ dviḥ paṭhitavyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3234: tatraikasya codanālakṣaṇo dharma ity atra tātparyam. aparasya cārtho dharma ity atra. anyaparatve 'nyatarasambandho 'nuvādaḥ. sūtrabhedena cobhayavidhānāt tatsiddher ubhayānuvādopapattiḥ. tantraṃ codanālakṣaṇādīnāṃ trayāṇām anyatamam. tadupariṣṭād vakṣyate. tasmin pakṣe na vākyabhedaḥ. tathā hi -- tripadam idaṃ sūtram. padatrayasyāpi cetaretarasambaddho 'rtho vākyārthaḥ. tad yad eva trayāṇām
GSP28mimsvtku:3235: ubhayasandhānārtham[588]āvartyate tad eva vākyaṃ bhinatti. tantreṇa tūbhayasambandhe na vākyabhedaḥ. sakṛdvacanāt. sakṛduktasyaiva yogyatayobhayasambandhe śaktibhedāt. tad iha dharmapadaṃ vā tantroccaritam ubhābhyāṃ sambadhyate. sidhyati cobhayaṃ codanālakṣaṇo dharmo 'rtho dharma iti ca. madhyapadaṃ vādyantābhyām. evam api ceṣṭaṃ sidhyati artho dharmaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:3236: sa codanālakṣaṇa iti. ādyam eva vottarābhyām. codanālakṣaṇo 'rthaḥ sa eva ca dharma iti. idam ekam eva vākyaṃ trayāṇām anyatamasya
GSP28mimsvtku:3237: tantreṇobhayasambandhād dvyartham ity avagantavyam. āha ca --
GSP28mimsvtku:3245: bhāṣyakāreṇa bhinnayor eva vākyayor imāv ekadeśāv iti vadatā sūtradvayam{1,197}evedaṃ darśitam. tad upanyasyati -- ekadeśeti. artho dharma ity ekaṃ sūtram, aparaṃ codanālakṣaṇa iti. tena codanālakṣaṇāvayavenānumitenānantarasūtrasthena dharmapadenaikaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3246: niṣpadyate codanālakṣaṇo dharma iti. tad idam uktam -- ekadeśānumānād iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3247: nanv artho dharma iti codanālakṣaṇācodanālakṣaṇayor anyatarasyā[590]nupādānāt tadapekṣāyām acodanālakṣaṇo 'py upatiṣṭhamānaḥ kena vāryate. evaṃ codanālakṣaṇo dharma ity atrāpy anarthaprasaṅgo
GSP28mimsvtku:3248: darśayitavyaḥ. ata āha -- itaretareti. etāv eva codanālakṣaṇārthaśabdāv
GSP28mimsvtku:3249: itaretarasamīpyāt parasparaṃ sūtradvaye 'pi viśeṣaṇatvena vākyaśeṣatayā kalpyete. ato nācodanālakṣaṇānarthāvayavakalpaneti. anuvādatvena cātra codanālakṣaṇārthāvayavasambandho bhinnayoḥ sūtrayor darśayitavyaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3250: yadartho dharma ity ekasūtreṇoktaṃ taccodanālakṣaṇa iti, yaccodanālakṣaṇo dharma ity atroktaṃ tadartha iti || 279 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3253: aparam api athavā arthasya sataś codanālakṣaṇasya dharmatvam ity ekārtham eveti bhāṣyam. tadākṣipati -- viśiṣṭety evāntena.
GSP28mimsvtku:3254: arthaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭacodanālakṣaṇānuvādena dharmavidhānaṃ darśitam. evam api viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyobhayaparatvena vākyaṃ bhidyata[591]eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:3255: yathaikatvaviśiṣṭagrahānuvādena sammārgavidhau. ataḥ kena viśeṣeṇā[592]thaveti parihārāntaram uktam iti. yataś cāyam aparihāraḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3256: tasmāt pūrvoktam eva padatrayatantratvaṃ vākyabhedaparicodanāyām uttaram ity āha -- itīty
GSP28mimsvtku:3257: etac ca tantratrayaṃ vyākhyātam eva. saṃjñāśabdena dharmapadam ucyate.[593]tad dhi codanālakṣaṇasyārthasyālaukikī saṃjñā bhūvādīnām
GSP28mimsvtku:3258: iva{1,198}dhātuśabdaḥ. pūrvācāryāṇāṃ matena caitad uktam. yady
GSP28mimsvtku:3259: avaśyaṃ[594]vākyabhedaḥ[595]parihartavyaḥ, tatas tantreṇa dvyartham ekaṃ vākyaṃ vyākhyeyam. na ca prakārāntareṇa vākyabhedaparicodanā parihartuṃ śakyata iti || 281 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3262: [592] ṇa pari [593] te. sā hi co (KA)
GSP28mimsvtku:3264: atra codayati -- dharma iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- dve kilātra vacanavyaktī. codanālakṣaṇānuvādena dharmavidhānaṃ viparītaṃ vā. tatrādye tāvat pakṣe codanālakṣaṇatvasyārthatvavyabhicārād yuktam eva viśeṣaṇam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3265: yadā tu sāmānyataḥ siddhadharmānuvādena pramāṇam anena kathyate, tadā arthatvaṃ prāptam eva, arthasyaiva śreyassādhanasya dharmatvaprasiddheḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:3266: sarve hi vādinaḥ prītisādhanaṃ dharma ity atrāvipratipannāḥ, tadviśeṣeṣv eva vivādaḥ. mīmāṃsakā hīṣṭāpūrtayor dharmatvam icchanti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3267: saṅghaṭṭavandanādau saugatāḥ. sāmānyaṃ tu prītisādhanaṃ dharmasvarūpaṃ sarvavādinām avivādasiddham eva.[596]eṣaiva ca prāg api sāmānyasiddhir
GSP28mimsvtku:3268: uktā. ata eva ca viśeṣa[597]siddhijijñāsāyāṃ pramāṇaviśeṣavidhānaṃ, tata eva tatsiddheḥ. vedāgame hi pramāṇe yāgādayo dharmāḥ. buddhāgame tu caity
GSP28mimsvtku:3269: avandanādayaḥ. ko dharma ity atrāpi viśeṣajijñāsayaiva praśnaḥ. vakṣyati ca viśeṣasya ca jijñāseti. tasmād eṣaivātra vacanavyaktir mukhyā. ata evādye prathamam uktvā satsūtreṇa ca pratyakṣādinirākaraṇād eṣaiva vacanavyaktiḥ sūtrakārābhimatā lakṣyate. yo dharmaḥ sa codanālakṣaṇaḥ iti pratijñāte 'nyalakṣaṇanirākaraṇaṃ saṅgacchate, nānyathā. tasmād eṣaivātra vacanavyaktiḥ. asyāṃ cārthāvyabhicārād arthaviśeṣaṇam anarthakam iti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3273: pariharati -- codaneti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- satyam. eṣaiva cātra vacanavyaktiḥ. iyam eva tu nāsatyarthaviśeṣaṇe sidhyatīti phalavadarthagrahaṇam.{1,199}asati hi tasmin vacanavyaktyantarasandeho
GSP28mimsvtku:3274: bahvet. evaṃ hi tadā sambhāvyate, yaś codanālakṣaṇaḥ sa dharma iti. atra tu vakṣyamāṇo doṣaḥ. nityānuvādabhūte tv[598]arthagrahaṇe naivaṃ vacanavyaktiḥ sambhavati, arthagrahaṇasya vidhyanuvādayor asambhavāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:3275: vidhau tāvad vākyabhedād asambhavaḥ. anuvādasya cāprāpteḥ. na hi codanālakṣaṇam arthasambandhaṃ na vyabhicarati anarthasyāpi tallakṣitatvāt. ato nānuvādaḥ. na caitat parityāgena vākyārthatvam anarthakatvād vākyaikadeśasya. ato yatarasmin pakṣe 'rthapadānvayo
GSP28mimsvtku:3276: ghaṭate, tataraḥ pakṣo 'vadhāryeta. dharmānuvādena pramāṇavidhau sambhavati nityānuvādabhūto 'rthaśabda iti sa eva pakṣo niścīyate. ato vidhyanuvādasūcanārtha evārthaśabdo na viśeṣaṇam. viśeṣaṇād vinā caitad
GSP28mimsvtku:3277: iti ca spaṣṭam eva sūtrārtha iti darśayiṣyati || 283 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3281: ata āha -- tatheti. codanālakṣaṇānuvādena dharmavidhāvadharmāṇām api
GSP28mimsvtku:3282: niṣedhacodanayānarthasādhanatvena lakṣitānāṃ brahmahatyādīnāṃ codanālakṣaṇatvād dharmatvaṃ bhavet. na caitad iṣṭam. ato na vidheyārtham
GSP28mimsvtku:3283: api vidhiphalam arthavad[600]arthapadagrahaṇam. ato neyaṃ vacanavyaktiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:3288: yasyām arthaś ca dharmatayā na tyajyate, ekaś ca vākyārtho bhavati. sā ca dharmānuvādena pramāṇavidhiḥ, tasyāṃ hi dharmasyārthatvāvyabhicārād artho na tyajyate. eka eva vākyārtho bhavati, sāmarthyalakṣyatvād arthasya. iyaṃ cārthānuvādād eva sidhyati, [602]nānyathety uktam evety āha -- tasmād iti || 285 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3291: {1,200} yady eṣaivātra vacanavyaktiḥ, kathaṃ tarhi bhāṣyakāraḥ ubhayam ihetyādigranthenārthapadasya viśeṣaṇatāṃ darśayati. vispaṣṭaṃ hi tatroktaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3292: tatrānartho dharma ukto mā bhūd ity evam artham arthagrahaṇam iti, yad api cedam athavetyādi bhāṣyam ākṣiptaṃ tasyāpy adyayāvan na kiñcit samādhānam
GSP28mimsvtku:3293: upalabhāmahe, ata āha -- viśeṣaṇād iti. anena bhāṣyadvayam api samāhitam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3294: yat tāvadubhayam ihety uktaṃ tadarthaviśeṣaṇād vinaivārthasāmarthyakāritam eva bhāṣyakāreṇa kathitam. kim idam arthasāmarthyakāritam iti. etad uktaṃ bhavati -- yad dharmānuvādena pramāṇavidhānād[603]evānarthānāṃ hiṃsādīnām adharmatvena varjanaṃ bhavati, pramāṇānuvādena ca dharmavidhau teṣām api dharmatāpadyeta. tad ihānartho dharma ukto mā bhūd ityevamartham arthagrahaṇam iti vadatā vacanavyaktiviśeṣaparigrahārtho 'rthaśabda iti
GSP28mimsvtku:3295: darśitam. ākṣiptabhāṣyasamādhāne 'py ayam eva grantho vyākhyeyaḥ. nedam athaveti śabdasāmarthyakāritaṃ bhāṣyakārīyam uttaram. tathā hi vākyabhedo
GSP28mimsvtku:3296: bhavati. iha tu vinaiva viśeṣaṇād arthasāmarthyakāritam evedam ucyate. tac ca vacanavyaktiviśeṣāśrayaṇena darśitam. na cārthād āpadyamāno vākyabhedam
GSP28mimsvtku:3297: āpādayati. aśabdapramāṇakatvād, vākyabhedasya ca śabdadoṣatvāt. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:3299: tatra cārthaśabdasyānuvādatvād[604]vākyabhedaḥ suparihara eva. yad etad anarthānāṃ hiṃsādīnāṃ varjanam, idaṃ dharmānuvādena pramāṇavidhānavacanavyakter evārthasāmarthyakāritaṃ phalaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa kathyata ity artha iti || 286 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3305: {1,201} tasya nimittaparīṣṭir iti sūtram. tasyāyam arthaḥ -- tasya dharmasya yannimittaṃ pramāṇaṃ codanābhidhānaṃ, tatparīṣṭiḥ kartavyeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3306: pākṣikī ca parīṣṭipadarūpasiddhiḥ. tathā hi iṣu gatau ity asmād dhātoḥ iṣer anicchārthasya iti yuci vihite parer vā iti ktinyucor vikalpaḥ smaryate. tena yujvidhau paryeṣaṇeti bhavati. ktini tu parīṣṭir iti. atra vadanti -- kim idam anavasara eva parīkṣāpratijñānam. codanālakṣaṇo 'rtho
GSP28mimsvtku:3307: dharma iti hi pratijñātam. atas tadupapādanasamarthahetuvacanāvasare kim
GSP28mimsvtku:3308: aparaṃ nimittaparīkṣā pratijñāyate. na hi naiyāyikāḥ śabdo 'nitya iti pratijñāya tad etat parīkṣāmahe iti parīkṣām avatārayanti, api tarhi sahasaiva kṛtakatvād iti hetum abhidadhati. tad ihāpi codanāsūtrapratijñātāvadhāraṇadvayopapādanāya sadautpattikasūtrābhyāṃ hetuvacanam ucitam. kim antarā parīkṣāpratijñānena. yadi mataṃ -
GSP28mimsvtku:3309: parārthapratijñāsvayaṃ nyāyaḥ yat pratijñānantaram eva hetvabhidhānaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3310: svapratipattau tu na hetudharmā yojayitavyā iti. tan na. na hi jaiminer
GSP28mimsvtku:3311: api svapratipattaye śāstranirmāṇam, anyato viditavedārthaḥ śiṣyahitārthāya
GSP28mimsvtku:3312: sūtrāṇi praṇītavān. ato 'trāpi parārthaiva pratijñā. atho[605]cyate --
GSP28mimsvtku:3313: dvedhā hi paraḥ, vyutthitāvyutthitabhedāt. tatra vyutthitapratipādane pratijñānantaram eva hetur abhidhīyata iti nyāyyam.[606]uttare tu parīkṣāpurassaram eva hetvabhidhānena pratipādyanta iti. tan na.
GSP28mimsvtku:3314: lakṣaṇāntareṣv api prasaṅgāt. bhedādilakṣaṇeṣv api yathāsvam arthaṃ pratijñāya parīkṣāpratijñānam āpadyate. na ca tathā dṛśyate. kaś caiṣa nyāyaḥ yad vipratipannāya pratijñānantaram eva hetur ucyate na śiṣyebhya
GSP28mimsvtku:3315: iti. pratyuta tān eva prati lāghavāya pratijñānantaram eva hetur vaktum
GSP28mimsvtku:3316: ucitaḥ, kim antarā vyākṣepakarī pratijñā nikṣipyata iti yatkiñcid etat.
GSP28mimsvtku:3317: tasmād ayam atra samādhiḥ -- ihādyena sūtreṇa śāstrasya prayojanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3320: śeṣalakṣaṇam.[607](3.1.1) atha viśeṣalakṣaṇam (8.1.1) itivad ṛṣiṇā praṇītam.{1,202}etad uktaṃ bhavati -- ihādhyāye dharmapramāṇaṃ parīkṣiṣyāmaha iti. yady api codanāsūtreṇāpi samastatantrārthasaṃkṣepe kriyamāṇe pramāṇalakṣaṇārtho 'pi codanaiva pramāṇam eveti pratijñātḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3321: tathāpi saṅkīrṇe pratijñāte punar anena niṣkṛṣyādyādhyāyārthaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:3322: pratijñāyate. aniṣkṛṣyamāṇe hi pratijñāsaṅkareṇa[608]na jñāyate kasya pratijñābhāgasya sadautpattikasūtrābhyāṃ hetur abhidhīyata iti. bahv eva hi tatra pratijñātaṃ dharmasvarūpādi. atas tatrāpi hetvabhidhānam idam iti kaścid bhrāmyet. atas tadbhramāpanuttaye svayam eva nirdhāraṇaṃ darśayati.
GSP28mimsvtku:3323: yo 'yaṃ tantrārthaḥ saṃkṣipyāsmābhiḥ pratijñātaḥ, tasmin vyākhyāsyamāne nimittaparīkṣaiva tāvad ihādhyāye vartiṣyate pramāṇapurassaratvāt prameyasiddheḥ. tad iha tāvac caturvidhā parīkṣā vartiṣyate -- kiṃ codanaiva utānyad eveti niyamaḥ, codanā vānyad veti vikalpaḥ, ubhayaṃ veti samuccayaḥ, na cobhayam ity ubhayāpalāpaḥ. āha ca --
GSP28mimsvtku:3330: codanaivānyad eveti yad vānyac codanāpi vā ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3331: athavā codanānyac ca na cānyan nāpi codanā
GSP28mimsvtku:3332: iti. tad ete niyamavikalpasamuccayobhayāpalāpaiś catvāraḥ pakṣā bhavanti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3333: bhavati ca pramāṇavikalpaḥ. yathārād avasthitam agniṃ kadācil liṅgād avaiti. kadācid āptopadeśāt. na ca samuccaye 'nyataravaiyarthyam,
GSP28mimsvtku:3334: īśvaramaharṣayo hi pratyakṣeṇa dharmam avayanti āgamenetara iti pramātṛbhedād ubhayopapattiḥ. bhāṣyakāreṇa tu pradarśanārthaṃ kiṃ codanaiva utānyad apīti darśitam. parīkṣamāṇasya hi caturdhaiva pratibhā
GSP28mimsvtku:3335: jāyate. tad iha pratyakṣasūtre tāvat pratyakṣādiniṣedhena pratipakṣaniyamavikalpasamuccayāḥ pratyuktāḥ. ubhayāpalāpas tu codanāprāmāṇyasamarthanenautpattikasūtre nirasiṣyate tat pramāṇam anapekṣatvād iti. tad ayaṃ nimittaparīkṣāsaṃkṣepo bhavati --
GSP28mimsvtku:3339: vākyārthasaṃvinmūlopapādanam, upariṣṭāt tu mantrārthavādaprāmāṇyaprakārakathanaṃ, smṛtipādena ca manvādyāptasmṛtācaritāgṛhyamāṇakāraṇakāṣṭakā holākādipadārthānāṃ mūlavedasadbhāvopapādanaṃ, nāmadheyapādena codbhidādināmnāṃ guṇaparāṇām
GSP28mimsvtku:3340: eva nāmadheyatayaiva kriyopayogakathanam iti kṛtsna evādhyāye dharmasya nimittaparīkṣeti sūktaṃ tasya nimittaparīṣṭir iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3341: atra bhāṣyam uktīmadam asmābhiś codanā nimittaṃ dharmajñāne iti tat pratijñāmātreṇoktam ityādi. tad ayuktam,
GSP28mimsvtku:3342: sopapattikapratijñābhidhānāt. tathā hi -- codanā hi bhūtam ityādinā codanāprāmāṇyopapattir uktaiva, nānyat kiñcanendriyam iti
GSP28mimsvtku:3343: cānyāprāmāṇyopapattiḥ. ataḥ katham ucyate tat pratijñāmātreṇoktam iti, ata āha -- pratijñeti sārdhena. asyārthaḥ -- yady api bhāṣyakāreṇānāgatāvekṣaṇena sadautpattikasūtrābhyāṃ vakṣyamāṇā svapakṣasya yuktiḥ pratijñāvyatiriktā darśitā, tathāpi na sūtrakāreṇa kācid upapattir ukteti tanmatānusāreṇa pratijñāmātrābhidhānam iti || 1 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3344: samarthanāntaram āha -- vṛttikāra iti. asyārthaḥ -- yat tu codanā hītyādinā bhūtādyarthaprakāśanasāmarthyaṃ codanāyāḥ kṛtaṃ, tat prāmāṇyadvāramātram eva kathitam. pāramārthikī yuktir upariṣṭād vakṣyate
GSP28mimsvtku:3345: sūtrakāreṇaiva. ato vakṣyamāṇayuktyadhikam eva tat prāmāṇyasambhāvanāmātram abhihitam. sambhāvito hi pratijñāyāṃ pakṣo hetunā sādhyate, na tv asambhāvita iti svābhiprāyeṇāpi pratijñāmātrābhidhānopapattir iti || 2 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3349: avatārayituṃ sūtram -- satsamprayoge puruṣasyendriyāṇāṃ buddhijanma tat pratyakṣam animittaṃ vidhyamānopalambhanatvād iti. tad idaṃ vṛttyantare
GSP28mimsvtku:3350: 'nimittād avacchidya tat pratyakṣam ityevamantaṃ lakṣaṇaparaṃ vyākhyātam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3351: tad etad upanyasya dūṣayati -- varṇyata iti. asyārthaḥ -- dharmasya nimittaṃ parīkṣitavyamiti hi pratijñātam. anantaraṃ ca pratyakṣasya
GSP28mimsvtku:3352: lakṣaṇam ucyamānaṃ na pūrvapratijñayā saṅgacchata iti || 1 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3354: lokaprasiddhapramāṇavyavahāriṇo hi mīmāṃsakasya kiṃ tallakṣaṇakaraṇeneti bhāvaḥ. dvyaṃśā hi pūrvapratijñā codanaiva pramāṇaṃ pramāṇam eva codaneti tantrārthasaṃkṣepapratijñānam. punaś ca parīṣṭisūtreṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:3355: niṣkṛṣyādyalakṣaṇaviṣayatayā. na cānyatarāṃśaprasādhanenāpi lakṣaṇābhidhānam upayujyata iti. yadi tu naiyāyikādiprasthānam
GSP28mimsvtku:3356: anuvidadhatā pratyakṣasya lakṣaṇaṃ praṇīyate, tadvad eva hi tatpūrvakaṃ trividham anumānam ityādivadanumānāder api lakṣaṇapraṇayanam āpatitam ity āha -- kimartham iti || 2 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3357: syād etat. apramāṇam evānumānādi pratyakṣād anyatvāt tadābhāsavad iti tallakṣaṇānabhidhānam iti, tad ayuktam ity āha -- na tāvad iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yad eva kiñcit tadaprāmāṇyasiddhaye pramāṇam upanyasyate, tat tenaiva bādhyate. api cānumā(?na/nā)prāmāṇyasiddhaye
GSP28mimsvtku:3358: 'numānam upanyasyate iti svavāgvirodhaḥ. tad alaṃ nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam iti pāṣaṇḍajalpiteneti.{1,205}syād etat -- sambhavaitihyayor ivānumānāgamayoḥ pratyakṣāntarbhāvād itareṣāṃ lakṣaṇānabhidhānam iti, tan
GSP28mimsvtku:3359: na. lakṣaṇavailakṣaṇyād ity āha -- nāpīti vaktumantena. syād etat --
GSP28mimsvtku:3361: jāyamānatvād iti. tan na. na hi cakṣuṣā sannikṛṣṭadhūmo 'py
GSP28mimsvtku:3364: eva yathākramaṃ pratyakṣādipramāṇodaye sādhanam iti sādhanabhedāl lakṣaṇavailakṣaṇye sati nānyonyāntarbhāvopapattiḥ. tad idam āha -- na ceti || 3 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3365: na ca vācyaṃ sarvādau pratyakṣalakṣaṇābhidhānād eva tatpūrvakatvenetarāṇi lakṣitānīti pṛthaglakṣaṇānabhidhānam
GSP28mimsvtku:3368: na ca sāmānyātideśalakṣaṇam iva viśeṣātideśalakṣaṇaṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇoktir anumānādīnāṃ pāramārthimaṃ lakṣaṇam ākṣipati, tena vinā tadupapatteḥ. sāmānyaṃ tu nānākṣiptaviśeṣam ātmānaṃ labhata ity
GSP28mimsvtku:3369: ākṣipaty arthaviśeṣam. tad etad āha -- pratyakṣeti || 5 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3371: vyabhicāra uktaḥ. tad api pratyakṣalakṣaṇokter ananyathāsiddhyabhāvān na sidhyatīty āha -- tadatad iti. tac cātac ca tadatadī. te pūrve yasyeti
GSP28mimsvtku:3372: bahuvrīhiḥ. tad ayam arthaḥ -- tad vā pratyakṣam anyad vā pūrvam
GSP28mimsvtku:3373: anumānādīnām iti na pratyakṣalakṣaṇād avagamyata iti.{1,206}yadi tu vinaiva kāraṇena pratyakṣalakṣaṇokter itareṣāṃ tatpūrvakatvam āśrīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:3374: hanta atatpūrvakatvam api vāṅmātreṇa śakyam āśrayitum ity āha -- tadukter
GSP28mimsvtku:3375: iti. tadapūrvaṃ yasyeti vigraho darśayitavya iti || 6 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3379: yas tv eṣām avāntaralakṣaṇabhedaḥ svarūpaṃ ca, saṃkhyā ceyanti pramāṇānīti, tat sarvaṃ na sidhyatīty āha -- na ceti || 7 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3380: syān mataṃ - prasiddhāny evānumānādīni pramāṇāni, kim amīṣāṃ lakṣaṇakaraṇeneti. tat pratyakṣe 'pi samānam ity āha -- prasiddhatvād iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3381: ato bahuṣu pramāṇeṣu yad ekalakṣaṇakaraṇaṃ tad anyaparisaṃkhyārtham eva syāt. tad etad āha -- tenānyeti sūtramantena.
GSP28mimsvtku:3382: abhimatapramāṇaparisaṃkhyānaṃ cāyuktam iti bhāvaḥ. mūḍhena vā jaimininā
GSP28mimsvtku:3383: pratyakṣamātraṃ lakṣitam ity abhyupagantavyam āpadyeta. evaṃ cātmīyam ajñānam ṛṣer āropitaṃ bhaved ity āha -- mūḍhena veti nāntena. api ca vākyabhedo nāmāgatyā kvacid āśrīyate yathāgnayaś ca svakālatvāt ity atra
GSP28mimsvtku:3384: vakṣyate. na ceha sūtre kiñcid anupapannaṃ dṛśyate yad bhittvā vyākhyāyata
GSP28mimsvtku:3386: lakṣaṇam apy etad ativyāpter ayuktam ity āha -- na cāpīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3387: ativyāptim eva darśayati -- tadabhāseṣv iti. sarve hi mṛgatṛṣṇādivibhramāḥ{1,207}sūryaraśmitaptoṣarādisaṃyuktanayanajanyāḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:3388: saṃśayāś ca sthāṇvādisaṃyuktanayanajanmāna iti pratyakṣatām aśnuvīran.
GSP28mimsvtku:3389: seyam ativyāptir iti. alpaṃ cedam asmābhir uktaṃ tadābhāseṣu tulyatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:3390: iti. ekaṃ tu svapnajñānaṃ varjayitvā sakalapramāṇāpramāṇasajātīyavijātīyajñānamātrasādhāraṇam idaṃ lakṣaṇam ity āha -- svapneti. liṅgaśabdasadṛśādisambaddheṣv evendriyeṣv anumānādipramāṇapañcakotpattir iti bhāvaḥ || 10 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3392: bāhyendriyasamprayogābhāvābhiprāyeṇa cedam uktam. svapne tv ātmamanodehaiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:3393: saṅgatir astyeveti tad apy anena lakṣaṇena vyāpyata iti darśayitavyam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3394: svapnajñānātiriktaṃ tu yat kiñcid bhrāntyādi, tat kenacit samprayoge saty eva jāyata iti pratyakṣam āpadyetety āha -- kenacid iti. yathā kenacit samprayoge bhrāntyādir bhavati, tathā pūrvam evāsmābhir vivṛtam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3396: nanu kenacit samprayogamātraṃ na pratyakṣakāraṇam abhipretam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3397: api tarhi grāhyeṇa. na ca bhrāntyādayo grāhyasaṃyuktanayanasya jāyante.
GSP28mimsvtku:3398: kiṃ tarhi. anyasaṃyuktendriyasyānyārthaviṣayāḥ. na cedaṃ grāhyaviśeṣaṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:3399: asmābhir eva kevalam āśritam. api tu vṛttikāreṇāpi pratyakṣalakṣaṇaparaṃ sūtraṃ vyācakṣāṇena. tanmataṃ ca bhavadbhir upariṣṭād vakṣyata eveti
GSP28mimsvtku:3400: nāvayor viśeṣam upalabhāmahe, ata āha -- grāhyeṇeti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:3401: satyam abhimataṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavato 'pi. tat tv anupāttaṃ na labhyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:3403: {1,208} yadābhāsaṃ hi vijñānaṃ tatsaṃyoge tad iṣyate |
GSP28mimsvtku:3404: iti vakṣyate. ato bhavanmate grāhyaviśeṣaṇānupādānād grāhyasamprayogajam anyasamprayogajaṃ vā jñānaṃ pratyakṣam āpadyeta. ato 'sti mahān vakṣyamāṇena viśeṣa iti || 12 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3405: yata eva yathāvasthitam idaṃ sūtraṃ na pratyakṣaṃ lakṣayituṃ kṣamate, ata eva vṛttikāreṇāpi prāsaṅgikalakṣaṇakaraṇe vyatyayena paṭhitam
GSP28mimsvtku:3408: para idānīṃ satsamprayogaviśeṣaṇopādānasāmarthyād eva grāhyaviśeṣaṇākṣepaṃ manvānaḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate, tadāha --
GSP28mimsvtku:3410: sambhavavyabhicārau hi viśeṣaṇakarāv ubhau tad yadi samprayogamātrajaṃ jñānaṃ sūtrakārasyābhimatam abhaviṣyat, tadā viśeṣaṇopādānam anarthakam āpatsya(?te/ta.) na hy asamprayogajaṃ pramāṇam apramāṇaṃ vā jñānam asti. ato viśeṣaṇopādānasāmarthyād eva grāhyaviśeṣaṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:3411: avagamyate. ato na kiñcid dokṣyatīti. etad eva[610]dūṣayati -- etad eva hīti. evaṃ hi manyate -- naivaṃvidhenottareṇa vyutthito bodhayituṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3412: śakyate. tasya hy etad eva pratipādyaṃ yat
GSP28mimsvtku:3417: upetya vā brūma ity āha -- svapnādīnām iti. uktam
GSP28mimsvtku:3419: varjayitvā sarvam eva pratyakṣaṃ prāpnuyād iti. ādiśabdena cādṛṣṭamātrodbodhitasaṃskārakāraṇikā smṛtir abhipreteti. tasmād anupāttam evātra[612]samagraṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇam iti na tad vidhātum anuvadituṃ vā śakyam ity āha -- tasmād iti. yat pratyakṣaṃ tad evaṃlakṣaṇakam[613]iti
GSP28mimsvtku:3420: lakṣaṇavidhiḥ. yad evaṃlakṣaṇakaṃ[614]tat pratyakṣam iti lakṣaṇānuvādaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:3421: na cānukto 'rtho vidhyanuvādabhāg bhavati, ubhayor api sādhāraṇatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:3426: evaṃ lakṣaṇaparatāṃ pratyākhyāyānabhimatavacanavyaktinirākaraṇapurassaram abhimatāṃ sūtrasya vacobhaṅgim āha -- teneti dvābhyām. etad uktaṃ bhavati -- yad evaṃlakṣaṇakaṃ tat pratyakṣam iti naiṣa sūtrārthaḥ. kiṃ tarhi.
GSP28mimsvtku:3427: yallokaprasiddhaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tasya satsamprayogajatvaṃ nāma dharmo 'sti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3428: taddharmakatvāc ca vidyamānopalambhanatvaṃ bhavati. tataś ca bhaviṣyaty
GSP28mimsvtku:3430: nanu śābare 'pi pratyakṣam animittam, evaṃ lakṣaṇakaṃ hi tad ity ucyate. tadalakṣaṇaparatve sūtrasyānupapannam ata āha -- evam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3431: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- śābarā api ye lokaprasiddhalakṣaṇānuvādenānimittatvaṃ vidadhati tān api na mṛṣyāmahe, sampūrṇalakṣaṇābhidhāne sūtrasyāśakteḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:3432: ato lakṣaṇoktir iha liṅgavivakṣayaiva. yathā dhūmo lakṣaṇam agneḥ, evaṃ vidyamānopalambhanatvam animittatvasya. lakṣyate hi tat teneti bhāṣyakārasyābhimatam iti || 19 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3433: {1,210} yal liṅgaṃ yasya ca, tadubhayam api vyanakti -- yata iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3434: vidyamānopalambhanatvaṃ nāma dharmo liṅgam. animittatā tu liṅgi. yadi tu talliṅgam asiddham iti kaścid brūyāt, taṃ prati satsamprayogajatvahetvantaraprasiddhena tenānimittatādhigantavyeti prasiddhenety uktam iti || 20 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3435: kutaḥ punar hetvantarasyaiva prasiddhiḥ, ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:3436: pratyakṣatvam iti. etad uktaṃ bhavati -- traya ete prayogāḥ -- pratyakṣam animittaṃ vidyamānopalambhanatvāt. vidyamānopalambhanatvaṃ ca satsamprayogajatvāt. satsamprayogajatvaṃ ca pratyakṣatvāt. atra ca vidyamānopalambhanatvasya vyaktam eva pañcamyā hetutvam upāttam. itarayos tūpādānenaiva hetutvaṃ sūtritam iti draṣṭavyam iti. ayaṃ ca pratyakṣaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3437: yajjane siddham ity asyaiva prapañco veditavyaḥ. tathā hi -- tatraiva vidyamānopalambhanatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:3439: pratyakṣaṃ yajjana iti ca pratyakṣatvād evaṃdharmakatvam uktam. idaṃ hi tatrākūtaṃ pratyakṣaṃ sadevaṃdharmakaṃ bhavatīti. idaṃ tv iha vaktavyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3440: kim anayā prayogaprapañcaracanayā. vimatipadāspadaṃ hi pratyakṣam animitaṃ pratyakṣatvād ity etāvatāpīṣṭaṃ sidhyaty eva. tat tu śuṣkatarkahetor
GSP28mimsvtku:3441: udbhāvakatvān na tathāśritam iti samādhātavyam. evaṃ hi śrutisādhāraṇyamātreṇānimittatvam uktam iti manvīran. na ca śrutisāmānyamātreṇaiva sarvasādharmyaṃ bhavati. na hi bhavati gopadās padaṃ vāg iti viṣāṇavatī. vidyamānopalambhanatvād animittatvam ucyamānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3442: cittaṃ bhāvayati. kathaṃ ca[615]vidyamānopalambhanam anāgate nimittaṃ bhavati. kathaṃ ca satsamprayogajam avidyamānopalambhanam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3444: vartamānavacanatvāt. na cānāgatena dharmeṇa vartamānaḥ samprayogaḥ sambhavati. sambandhidvayādhāro hi sambandhaḥ. nāsāv anyatarasminn avartamāne vartata iti yuktam abhidhātum. evaṃ pratyakṣaśabdo 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:3445: pratyutpannendriyasamprayogādhīnavṛttir nāvartamānasamprayogaje vartitum arhatīti yuktaṃ kramābhidhānam. prapañcarūcayaś ca mīmāṃsakā iti yuktaṃ prapañcābhidhānam ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3448: {1,211} idaṃ tu vācyam -- anaikāntikaṃ satsamprayogajatvaṃ vidyamānopalambhanatve. saty eva hi nadīpūranayanasannikarṣe
GSP28mimsvtku:3449: atītā[616]divṛṣṭivijñānaṃ bhavati. vartamāna eva ca meghacakṣussannikarṣo bhaviṣyadvṛṣṭiviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ janayati. ato nāyam ekāntaḥ yat satsamprayogajaṃ jñānaṃ vidyamānopalambhanam iti. api ca aparokṣanirbhāsam
GSP28mimsvtku:3450: api jñānaṃ vartamānasamprayogajam avidyamānaviṣayaṃ dṛṣṭam. bhavati hi vartamāne śuktinayanasannikarṣe 'tītānāgatavyavahitarajatāvagrahaḥ. uktaṃ ca bhavadbhir api bhavadāsadūṣaṇāvasare sakalapramāṇāpramāṇajñānasādhāraṇyaṃ satsamprayogajatvasya. syān matam --
GSP28mimsvtku:3455: rajatānubhavas tu doṣasāhāyyāt prācīnajñānajanmanaḥ saṃskārād yatkāraṇaṃ sannikṛṣyate khalv asya nānārthair indriyam. na cāsatsu doṣeṣv
GSP28mimsvtku:3456: avidyamānaprakāśanam upakalpayati. ato viṣayādidoṣānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyino vibhramās tam eva svātmani
GSP28mimsvtku:3458: śukti[617]nayanasannikarṣa eva hi saṃskārodbodhe kāraṇaṃ bhrāntau. anumāne ca liṅgasannikarṣo vyāptismaraṇe. ataḥ śakyaṃ tadubhayam api paramparayā satsamprayogajam iti vaktum. aviśeṣitaṃ ceha satsamprayogajatvamātraṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3459: hetur uktaḥ. ato duṣpariharam anaikāntikatvaṃ tādṛśasya.
GSP28mimsvtku:3463: atrocyate -- uktam idaṃ lokaprasiddhasya pratyakṣasyāyaṃ dharmaḥ yat satsamprayogajatvaṃ nāma vidyamānopalambhanatvasiddhau hetur
GSP28mimsvtku:3464: uktaḥ. loke ca grāhyeṇaiva sati samprayoge pratyakṣam iti siddham. na
GSP28mimsvtku:3465: hy[618]anyasamprayuktacakṣuṣo 'nyat pratyakṣam iti dṛṣṭam. tad iha grāhyeṇaiva vartamānasamprayogajatvaṃ vidyamānopalambhanatve hetur uktaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:3466: na ca tad anumānādiṣu sambhavati. na hi tatra grāhyeṇa vṛṣṭyādinendriyasannikarṣo vartate. lakṣaṇapakṣe tu yāvacchrutamātraparatantratvād āpadyetaiva bhrāntyādi pratyakṣam. tatrāpi tu lokapāratantrye vṛthā lakṣaṇa[619]karaṇam iti. nanu pratyakṣam animittaṃ vidyamānopalambhanatvād ity atra ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ.{1,212}yadi
GSP28mimsvtku:3467: pratyakṣam eva, tan na. pakṣasapakṣayor abhedāpātāt. tac cāyuktaṃ siddhasādhyayor bhedāt. sādhyo hi pakṣaḥ siddhaś ca sapakṣaḥ. na caikam eva siddhasādhyasvabhāvam ity upapadyate. siddhaṃ cāsmadādipratyakṣasya dharme 'nimittatvaṃ, kiṃ[620]tatsādhanena. ata āha -- asmadādāv iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- pratyakṣaviśeṣaṃ pakṣīkṛtya pratyakṣāntaraṃ sapakṣīkriyate iti na pakṣasapakṣayor ekatā. nāpi siddhasādhyateti || 21 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3472: evaṃ svamatena sūtraṃ vyākhyāyedānīṃ parapakṣoktān doṣān iha pariharati -- prakṛteneti. parapakṣe hi prakṛtāsaṅgatir uktā. seha nāsti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3473: codanaiva pramāṇam iti hi pratijñātam. tac ca pratyakṣānimittatvapratipādanenaiva[621] śeṣāṇām apy anumānādīnām
GSP28mimsvtku:3474: aprāmāṇyadarśanenāvadhāritarūpaṃ sidhyatīti. kathaṃ punaḥ pratyakṣānimittatve satyanumānādīnām apy animittatvam. na hi pratyakṣam
GSP28mimsvtku:3476: meghonnatinadīpūrābhyām anāgatātivṛttāyā vṛṣṭer ananumānaprasaṅgād ata āha
GSP28mimsvtku:3477: -- tad iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- vyāptisaṃvedanādhīnajanmatvād anumānasya nityaparokṣeṇa ca dharmeṇa vyāptisaṃvedanāsambhavād anumānodayābhāvaḥ. na ca vṛṣṭyādau prasaṅgaḥ. teṣāṃ dṛṣṭapūrvakatvena vyāptisaṃvedanopapatteḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:3478: ādiśabdena dharmasādṛśyam upādatte. etac copariṣṭāt prapañcayiṣyata eveti
GSP28mimsvtku:3482: nanv evam api pratyakṣavaditareṣām apy animittatvaṃ kiṃ sūtrair na nibaddham ata āha -- śakyam iti. ekalakṣaṇakaraṇe hītaralakṣaṇāsiddheḥ sarveṣāṃ lakṣaṇakaraṇam āpāditam. animittatve tu pratyakṣasyokte tatpūrvakatvād itareṣām apy{1,213}animittatvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3483: śakyāvagamam iti na pṛthaṅ nibadhyate. yathā vakṣyati --
GSP28mimsvtku:3485: lakṣaṇānupayoge[624]'pi yaḥ paryanuyogo dattaḥ, so 'py atra lakṣaṇānabhyupagamād eva nāstīty āha -- na ceti || 23 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3488: tathā grāhyaviśeṣaṇānupādānād anumānādyanupasaṅgrahāc ca nyūnaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ, sarvasaṃvidāṃ ca
GSP28mimsvtku:3489: satsamprayoganirdeśo 'tiricyata ityādy api yad uktaṃ tad apy atra nāśaṅkyata ity āha -- na ceti. lakṣaṇakaraṇasya hi nyūnātirekādayo doṣāḥ nālakṣaṇe prasajantīti. etad dhy atra sarvathā pratipādyaṃ yallokaprasiddhaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tad evaṃdharmakam iti. sampūrṇaṃ tu pratyakṣasya svarūpam anenābhidhīyatāṃ mā vā. na nas tatra tātparyam. ataś cānyaparatvāt sūtrasya lakṣaṇapakṣoktā mṛgatṛṣṇādisaṃvidām api pratyakṣatā nāpadyate ity āha -- sarvatheti || 25 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3491: sādhyam, evaṃ tarhi pratyakṣam animittaṃ vidyamānopalambhanatvād ity
GSP28mimsvtku:3492: etāvad eva vaktavyam. kiṃ satsamprayogajatvādyupanyāsena, ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:3493: atīteti sārdhadvayena. ayam arthaḥ -- satyam etāvatāpy animittatā
GSP28mimsvtku:3494: pratipāditaiva.[625]kin tu vidyamānopalambhanatvam evāsiddhaṃ yogināṃ muktātmanāṃ cātītānāgatādiviṣayajñānotpatter iti ye manyante, tān prati hetusiddhyarthaṃ satsamprayogajatvam api hetvantaram upanyastaṃ, na punaḥ pratyakṣasvarūpavivakṣayā. tathā vidyamānopalambhanatvād iti hetum abhidadhatā avidyamāno[626]bhaviṣyaddharmo bhaviṣyattvād eva na
GSP28mimsvtku:3495: pratyakṣeṇānubhūyata iti yo hetur antarṇītaḥ, tasyāpi yogim uktātmanāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3496: grāhyair arthāntarair bhaviṣyadbhir vyabhicāritā mā bhūd ity etad artham api satsamprayogajatvasyopādānam. etad dhy{1,214}anenocyate -- sarvam eva pratyakṣaṃ saty evendriyasamprayoge jāyate. ato na kiñcid bhaviṣyadviṣayam iti nāsti vyabhicāraḥ. asiddhatāvyabhicārite samāhṛtya mā bhūtām iti dvivacanābhidhānam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3500: idaṃ tv iha vaktavyaṃ - nirākṛtam eva aśakyaṃ hi tat puruṣeṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:3501: jñātum ṛte vacanād ity atra yogipratyakṣasyānāgatādiviṣayatvam. atra kiṃ punar upanyāseneti. tatraike vadanti -- tatra hi vacanādṛte puruṣāṇām atīndriyānubhavaśaktir nirākṛtā. atra punarvacanād eva pratītya ciraṃ bhāvayato dharmādharmau pratyakṣau bhaviṣyata iti pratyavasthānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3502: nirākriyata iti. tad ayuktam. sarvaṃ hi tadanāgatāvekṣaṇena
GSP28mimsvtku:3503: bhāṣyavārttikakārābhyām uktam, ihaiva sūtrakāreṇa svayam uktatvāt. na caiṣa pareṣām api siddhāntaḥ yad akasmād eva buddhasya[627]vānyasya vā tadbhūmim adhirūḍhasyājātātivṛttapratyutpannasūkṣmavyavahitaviprakṛṣṭādayaḥ sākṣād bhāvā bhāsanta iti. api tarhi āgamād eva sāmānyato viditān dharmāṃś ciraṃ bhāvayataḥ sphuṭam avikalpakāś ca prakāśanta iti. bhāvanābalajam eva jñānaṃ divyaṃ cakṣur ity ācakṣate. yat tu bhautikenaiva cakṣuṣā sarvam aparokṣīkriyata iti, tadatisthavīyaḥ. prauḍhipradarśanaparatayā tair uktam. tādṛśam api cātraiva nirākāryam, ihaiva sūtrakāreṇa nirākṛtatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:3504: tasmād atratyam evānāgatāvekṣaṇena tatroktam ity uktam eva. nanu ca pūrvapūrvahetvasiddhyāśaṅkayottarottarahetupradarśanam iti yato 'sti tatra dharmo 'yam ityādinā pratyakṣatvamadohetur ity evamantenoktam iti gatārtham idam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3508: avidyamānopalambhanam eva hi yogajadharmabalena yogināṃ pratyakṣam iti hi te pratipannāḥ. ata eva atītānāgate 'py arthe ityādinā hetvasiddhibījam
GSP28mimsvtku:3509: upadarśitam. pūrvaṃ tv asiddhyāśaṅkayā hetukramāśrayaṇam ity etāvad
GSP28mimsvtku:3510: evoktam. katham asiddhir ity atra na kiñcid uktam. yogyartham abhidhīyate ity atrāpi yoginām atiśayaviśeṣo 'ntarṇītaḥ. sa eva atītānāgatetyādinā
GSP28mimsvtku:3511: prakaṭīkṛtaḥ. kaḥ{1,215}punaratītānāgatādiviṣayatve pratyakṣasya teṣām abhiprāyaḥ. śrūyatām. evaṃ hi manyante -- yad vidyamānopalambhanam asmadādipratyakṣaṃ tena mā nāma dharmo 'nubhūyatām. bhāvanābalabhuvā tu sakalātītā[628]nāgatādiviṣayeṇa kiṃ nānubhūyate. tadasiddher anupapannam iti cet. na. anumānād upapatteḥ. tatraitat syād -- na tasya bhāvanābalabhuvaḥ pratyakṣasyāsmadādāv adṛṣṭacarasya sadbhāve kiñcana pramāṇam astīti. tac ca na. evam anumānād upapatteḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:3513: dṛśyate. tathā hi -- kim anyat. iha khalu nitāntaduradhigamam ātmānam eva nirdhūtanikhilakāyakaraṇoparāgopaplavaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3514: vigalitasakalamitimātṛmeyamānavibhāgodgrāhamayam[630]aham iti viśadataram avalokayante kṛtinaḥ kecid iti vedāntavādino vadanti. na hi tadasmadādivedyaṃ neti yogino 'pi na budhyante. tadvad vā vayam api
GSP28mimsvtku:3515: vijānīmaḥ. bhavati cātra kāraṇaprakarṣo hi kāryaprakarṣeṇa vyāpto dṛṣṭaḥ citrakārādiśilpaprakarṣa iva citrādikarmaprakarṣeṇa. prakṛṣyate ca kasyacid yogino bhāvanābalabhuvaḥ pratyakṣasya kāraṇam iti svabhāvahetuḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:3516: athāpi syāt kutaḥ kāraṇaprakarṣo 'vagamyata iti. svabhāvahetor eva. yo yadabhiniviśamāno 'bhyasyati sa tasya prakarṣakāṣṭhām āsādayati citrakārasyeva śilpam. abhyasyati ca kaścid avahito dhyānam iti
GSP28mimsvtku:3518: prakarṣaḥ. kaś ca jñānasyāparaḥ prakarṣaḥ sphuṭāvikalpakaprakāśāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:3524: tasmād bhūtam abhūtaṃ vā yadyad evātibhāvyate |
GSP28mimsvtku:3526: iti. nanu jīvanāya śilpināṃ śilpābhyāso yuktaḥ. na tu dhyānābhyāsasya
GSP28mimsvtku:3527: kiñcinnibandhanam asti. kathaṃ nāsti. karuṇā hi dhyānābhyāse nibandhanam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3528: kaścit khalu bhavāntarīyāt saṃskārāt kāruṇiko bhavati.{1,216}sa karuṇām
GSP28mimsvtku:3529: evābhiniviśate. abhyāsātiśayāc ca sā tasya prakarṣakāṣṭhām āsādayati. sa kāṣṭhāprāptaprakarṣakaruṇo duḥkhottarān saṃsāriṇo dṛṣṭvā dūraṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3530: dūyamānamānasaś cintayati katham etān uddhareyam iti. tataḥ sa puruṣārthasādhanam anvicchan dhyānāya prayasyati. tataś cirābhyāsān niṣpannadhyāno dharmādharmāv apy aparokṣam īkṣate. anyan mataṃ - saṃsāriṇo
GSP28mimsvtku:3532: ato yuktaṃ yaddehendriyānuvidhāyisaṃvedanā bhavantīti. yadā punar amī
GSP28mimsvtku:3533: yogābhyāsād eva prakṣīṇanikhilajñānakarmāśayā bhavanti, tadā dehendriyair vimucyante. tadā niyāmakābhāvāt svayaṃ ca prakāśasvabhāvatvāt sarvam
GSP28mimsvtku:3534: atītādi budhyante. atas tān prati vidyamānopalambhanatvam asiddham iti
GSP28mimsvtku:3535: tatpratibodhanāya lokaprasiddhaṃ sad ityādy ayaṃ jaiminir āheti. tān indānīṃ pratibodhayati -- na lokavyatiriktam iti. ayam arthaḥ -- teṣām api pratyakṣaṃ na lokottaraṃ bhavitum arhatīti __________NOTES__________
GSP28mimsvtku:3537: atra kāraṇam āha -- pratyakṣatveneti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- tad yogināṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ navā. yady apratyakṣaṃ na tarhi pramāṇaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3538: pratyakṣānumānavyatiriktapramāṇānabhyupagamād anumānalakṣaṇābhāvāc ca. na cāpramāṇam arthavyavasthāpanāyālam. ataḥ kiṃ tad abhyupagamena. atha
GSP28mimsvtku:3539: pratyakṣam, anvarthatvāt pratyakṣaśabdasya avaśyam eva tenendriyajanmanā bhavitavyam. na hy anindriyajaṃ pratyakṣam iti laukikānām upacāro dṛśyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:3542: abhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsāpratītiḥ kalpanā. tayā rahitaṃ timirāśubhramaṇanauyānasaṃkṣobhaṇādyanāhitavibhramam abhrāntaṃ jñānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3543: pratyakṣam iti. idaṃ ca lakṣaṇaṃ yoginām api jñānaṃ vyāpnoty eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:3544: tad[632]dhi nirvikalpakam abhrāntam. ata eva pratyakṣaṃ caturdhā vibhajante tac caturvidham indriyajam indriyajasamanantarapratyayodbhavaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3545: mānasaṃ sarvacittacaittānām ātmasaṃvedanaṃ yogijñānaṃ ceti. yadi hīndriyajatvam eva pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ syāt, tritayam apratyakṣaṃ syāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:3546: mānasaṃ ca mīmāṃsakair api pratyakṣam iṣyata eva. ataḥ sarvānugatāparokṣāvabhāsitvamātravacana
GSP28mimsvtku:3547: pratyakṣaśabdo{1,217}niścīyate. yathā gamerḍor iti ḍopratyayānto vyutpādito gośabdo 'gacchaty api prayogadarśanāt sarvānugatagojātimātravacano niścīyate, evaṃ naṣṭāvayavārthavibhāgaḥ pratyakṣaśabdo 'parokṣāvabhāsini samudāyaśaktyaiva[633]vartata iti. tan
GSP28mimsvtku:3549: ātmānaṃ labhate. na ca pratyakṣaśabdavācyam indriyānvayaṃ vyabhicarati.
GSP28mimsvtku:3550: mānase vyabhicāra iti cet. na. manaso 'pīndriyatvāt. atha nāsti mano
GSP28mimsvtku:3551: nāmendriyam, indriyajam eva tu jñānaṃ dhārāvāhikeṣu santanyamāneṣūttarakṣaṇagrāhiṇo jñānasya kāraṇaṃ mana iti gīyate. uttaraṃ ca mānasam iti. tad ayuktam. atīte hīndriyaja[634]jñāna uttarakṣaṇo
GSP28mimsvtku:3552: 'nubhūyate. sa katham asambaddhena tenāvabhāsayituṃ śakyate. akṣavad iti ced, na. prāpyakāritvasyākṣāṇām ihaiva vakṣyamāṇatvāt. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:3554: tasyāpīndriyānvayavyatirekānuvidhānāt. na hi nimīlitanayanasya rūpabuddhir anuvartamānā dṛśyate. ato 'vayavānvayāvyabhicārān na samudāyaśakter ātmalābhaḥ. ato 'nindriyajaṃ sad yogināṃ muktātmanāṃ vā jñānaṃ na
GSP28mimsvtku:3555: pratyakṣam. pratyakṣaṃ sanniyataṃ vidyamānopalambhanam, apratyakṣaṃ tu pramāṇāntarānabhyupagamād eva nirastam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3561: yac ca bhāvanābalaṃ yogijñānajanmani kāraṇam uktam. tan na,
GSP28mimsvtku:3562: avagataviṣayatvād bhāvanāyāḥ. na cākasmād evāvagater utpattiḥ sambhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:3563: sarvotpattimatāṃ kāraṇavattvāt. atha pramāṇāntarāvagataṃ bhāvyate kiṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3564: bhāvanayā, tata eva tatsiddheḥ. kiñ ca tat pramāṇaṃ na tāvadanumānaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3566: jagadvaicitryārthāpatter api kim api kāraṇam astīty etāvad unnīyate. na tu kaścid viśeṣaḥ. na cānirdiṣṭaviśeṣaviṣayā bhāvanā bhavati. yogaśāstreṣv api viśeṣā eva dhyeyatayopadiśyante dhyeya ātmā prabhur yo 'sau hṛdaye dīpavat sthitaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:3567: ityādibhiḥ. tarhy āgamād avagataṃ bhāvayiṣyate. yadi pramāṇāt, tata evāvagateḥ kiṃ bhāvanayā. hānopādānārthaṃ hi vastu jijñāsyate. te ca tata
GSP28mimsvtku:3568: eva siddhe iti vyarthā bhāvanā. kāruṇiko 'pi dharmāgamān eva prayatnataḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:3569: śiṣyebhyo vyācakṣīta. na bhāvanā[636]parikhedam anubhavet. atha vipralambhabhūyiṣṭhatvād āgamānāṃ pramāṇam āgamo na veti vicikitsamāno bhāvanayā jijñāsa[637]te. tan na.{1,218}tato 'pi tadasiddheḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:3570: bhāvanābalapariniṣpannam api jñānam anāśvāsanīyārtham eva, abhūtasyāpi bhāvyamānasyāparokṣavat prakāśāt. tathā tair evoktaṃ - tasmād bhūtam abhūtaṃ veti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3574: api ca bhāvanābalajam apramāṇaṃ gṛhītagrahaṇāt. yāvad eva hi
GSP28mimsvtku:3575: gṛhītaṃ tāvad eva hi bhāvanayā viṣayīkriyate. mātrayāpi tv adhikaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3576: bhāvanayā na gocarayati. yogābhyāsāhitasaṃskārapāṭavanimittā hi smṛtir eva
GSP28mimsvtku:3577: bhāvanety[638]abhidhīyate. sā ca na pramāṇam iti sthitam eva. na ca taduttarakālaṃ sākṣātkārijñānam udetīti pramāṇam asti. indriyasannikarṣam antareṇārthasākṣātkārasya kvacid apy adarśanāt. bhavati cātra[639]prayogaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:3578: -- yogināṃ dharmādharmayor aparokṣāvabhāsi jñānaṃ nāsti indriyasannikarṣābhāvād, asmadādivat. yac ca kāraṇaprakarṣāt kāryaprakarṣa ity uktaṃ, tad ayuktam. kāraṇaprakarṣānupapatteḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:3579: bhāvanāprakarṣānupapattiś ca varṇitaiva prayojanābhāvād, anālambanatvād anadhikaviṣayatvāc ca. na ca tathāvidhātiśayavataḥ kasyacid adyatve darśanaṃ, yena dṛṣṭatvād abhyupagamyeta. nityanirdoṣavedāntapramāṇake tu brahmātiśaye na kiñcid anupapannam. tatrāpi tu nānindriyajaṃ pratyakṣam
GSP28mimsvtku:3580: upapadyate. samucchinnasakalamitimātṛmeyamānaprapañcā hi sāvasthā. yatrāpi cābhyāsāt prakarṣo dṛśyate tatrāpi smṛtir eva prakṛṣyate, na punarabhyāsato 'nindriyasannikṛṣṭam api ca vastvaparokṣaṃ bhavati. na hy abhrāntasyāsannihitam avartamānaṃ ca puraḥsthitavadavabhāsata ity utprekṣitum api śakyam ity alam aneneti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3584: nanu ca śeṣahetuprasiddhaye pratyakṣatvaṃ hetur iti pūrvam
GSP28mimsvtku:3585: uktam. katham idānīṃ tena vidyamānopalambhanatvaṃ sādhyate, ata āha -[640]satsamprayogajatvam iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- nāyaṃ śāstrīyo hetukramaḥ, yena tadatikrame doṣo bhavati. ato vyāptibalena śakyam
GSP28mimsvtku:3586: anenāsmadādipratyakṣavad ubhayaṃ sādhayitum iti yatheṣṭābhidhānam iti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3589: atra sūtrakāreṇa pratyakṣatvābhyupagamena yogipratyakṣasyānimittatāṃ pratipādayatā nimittatvābhyupagame vā na pratyakṣatvam ity arthād āveditam. tat{1,219}prayogadvayena darśayati -- teṣām iti dvayena. tatas tv eveti. avartamānaviṣayatvād evety arthaḥ. yadi tu nirākṛtasvapakṣo
GSP28mimsvtku:3590: bauddho 'pratyakṣaśabdavācyam eva tat pramāṇāntaram iti brūyāt, tadarthaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3592: satsamprayogagrahaṇasāmarthyād evopāttam iti sad ity etena kathyate ity uktam iti || 30-31
GSP28mimsvtku:3593: anyan mataṃ - siddhānāṃ khalu dharmānugrahavaśenānāgatādiviṣayā pratibhaiva jāyate. sā cādyatve kvacid
GSP28mimsvtku:3594: asmadādīnām apy utpadyate yathā śvo me bhrātāganteti. prāyeṇa tv ṛṣīṇāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3595: tajjñānam utpadyata ity ārṣam ity ucyate. yathāhuḥ -- ārṣaṃ siddhadarśanaṃ ca dharmebhyaḥ iti. tan nirākaroti laukikīti. ayam arthaḥ -- yoginām ṛṣīṇāṃ vā pratibhā nārthaniścayāya prabhavati, pratibhātvād
GSP28mimsvtku:3596: asmadādipratibhāvat. asmadādīnāṃ hi visaṃvādabhūyiṣṭhā pratibhopalabhyata iti || 32 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3597: evaṃ tāvad vidyamānopalambhanatvasya hetor asiddhim āśaṅkya satsamprayogajatvād iti yad uktaṃ tad vivṛtam. idānīṃ bhaviṣyattvasya hetor anaikāntikaśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ yad uktaṃ tad vivṛṇoti --
GSP28mimsvtku:3598: avidyamāneti. ayam arthaḥ -- yadi satsamprayogajaṃ pratyakṣam iti nocyeta,
GSP28mimsvtku:3599: tato 'vidyamāne 'pi saṃyoge yogināṃ kvacit pratyakṣaṃ jāyata iti tasya bhaviṣyaty api dharme śaktir anivāritā syāt. tataś ca bhaviṣyattvasya
GSP28mimsvtku:3603: {1,220} nanu bhaviṣyattvād dharmo na pratyakṣa ity ucyate, tad yadāsau bhaviṣyaṃs tadā mā nāma pratyakṣo bhavatu. yadā tu pravartate tadā kin nāma na pratyakṣeṇānubhūyate, ata āha -- pratyakṣa iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:3604: anuṣṭhānārthaṃ hi pramāṇam anviṣyate. tadanuṣṭhānāt prāg evānveṣyam. na cānuṣṭhānāt prāg dharmo 'stīti kathaṃ pratyakṣo bhaved iti. kim idānīm anyenānuṣṭhito vidyamānaḥ pratyakṣo[642]dharmaḥ nety āha -- anuṣṭhita iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3605: na pratyakṣa iti sambandha iti. atra kāraṇam āha -- phalasādhanarūpeṇeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3606: bhaved etad evaṃ yadi dravyādayaḥ svarūpeṇa dharmā bhaveyuḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:3607: phalasādhanarūpeṇa caite dharmā iti tādrūpyeṇa ca dharmatvam ity atroktam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3608: tac ca rūpam anuṣṭhānakāle nāsti. āmuṣmikaphaleṣv atra phalasyābhāvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:3609: aihikaphaleṣv api cireṇa. nirantarayor hi sādhyasādhanayoḥ sādhanaṃ pratyakṣaṃ bhavati mardanasukhayor iva. iha tu phalakāle sādhanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3610: cirātivṛttaṃ, sādhanakāle phalam ajātam iti na phalasādhanaṃ pratyakṣam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3611: śaktis tu sarvabhāvānāṃ nityaparokṣaiva. tena na tadviśiṣṭo dharmaḥ pratyakṣo bhavatīti || __________NOTES__________
GSP28mimsvtku:3613: prakṛtam idānīṃ vidyamānopalambhanatvena pratyakṣasya dharme 'nimittatvam upasaṃharati - asmad[643]iti dharmentena. dhyāyināṃ pratyakṣaṃ vidyamānopalambhanaṃ sad dharme na pramāṇam asmatpratyakṣavat.
GSP28mimsvtku:3614: vakṣyamāṇahetvapekṣayā caśabdaḥ. neṣyata iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3615: ayaṃ ca sūtrakāreṇopapattikramoktyā sarveṣāṃ cittaṃ bhāvayituṃ[644]hetukramo darśitaḥ. śakyate ca pratyakṣatvamātreṇaivānimittatā sādhayitum ity āha -- pratyakṣatvād iti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3620: tatrāpi{1,221}sacchabdam ādau cintayati. atra bhikṣuṇoktaṃ sadviśeṣaṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:3622: sad ity asadvyudāsāya na niyogāt sa gaṃsyate |
GSP28mimsvtku:3624: iti. etad anabhyupagamena nirākṛtya karmadhārayasamāsam eva darśayati --
GSP28mimsvtku:3625: avidyamāneti. asyārthaḥ -- nāyam arthaḥ sūtrasya satā samprayogaḥ satsamprayoga iti. kiṃ tarhi. saṃś cāsau samprayogaś ceti karmadhārayo 'yam. sacchabdaś ca vidyamānavacanaḥ. tad ayam artho bhavati --
GSP28mimsvtku:3626: vidyamānasamprayogajaṃ pratyakṣam iti. tataś ca yat teṣām avidyamāne 'rthe
GSP28mimsvtku:3627: ityādinā yogijñānasya pratyakṣatvanirākaraṇam uktaṃ tad evaṃ labhyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:3628: vartamānārthavācino hi sacchabdasyāsad[645]vyudāsaḥ. sa katham asati
GSP28mimsvtku:3629: tasmin sidhyet. ayaṃ ca sūtrārthaḥ satīndriyārthasambandhe iti vyācakṣāṇena bhāṣyakāreṇokta iti draṣṭavyam iti || 36 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3632: nanv ayam artho nimittasaptamyaivātra labhyate. na hy asatsamprayogo nimittaṃ bhavati. ata āha -- sasamyeti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:3633: satyam avartamānaḥ samprayogo nākṣaje jñāne kāraṇam. api tu tam api kecit kāraṇatayā manyante. tad iha samprayoga ity etāvati śrute sati bhāviny atīte ceti yatheṣṭaṃ kalpayeyuḥ. atas tatkalpanānirākaraṇārthaṃ vyaktam
GSP28mimsvtku:3635: vyākhyātaḥ sacchabdaḥ. saṃśabdam idānīm anusandhatte -- samyag
GSP28mimsvtku:3636: iti. samyakprayogaḥ samprayogaḥ. tena duṣprayogo nivārito bahvatīti. āha
GSP28mimsvtku:3637: -- viśekṣyati bhavān samā prayogaṃ, prayogam eva[646]tāvadādau bhavān vyākurutām ata āha -- prayoga iti. rūpādisaṃvitkāryonneyam indriyāṇāṃ vyāpāraṃ prayogāparaparyāyam ācakṣata iti __________NOTES__________
GSP28mimsvtku:3639: {1,222} kaḥ punar atra duṣprayogaḥ yaḥ saṃśabdena vyāvartyate, ata āha -- duṣṭatvād iti. kathaṃ punar asau duṣṭaḥ. prayogasya hy atyāsattyādayo
GSP28mimsvtku:3640: doṣāḥ. na ca te śuktisamprayuktacakṣuṣo bhrāmyato doṣā bhavanti. viṣaya eva tu tatra sādṛśyad ūṣito viparītakhyātihetuḥ. ata āha -- rajatekṣaṇād
GSP28mimsvtku:3641: iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- jñānakāraṇaṃ hi samprayogaḥ sa duṣṭo 'nyadanyātmanā bhāsayati, kāraṇadoṣāvinābhāvāt kāryadoṣasya. aduṣṭas tu samyagjñānaṃ janayati. sarvakāraṇadoṣābhāvena ca tasya samyaktvaṃ bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:3642: yadā punar indriyārthayor anyatarad api duṣyati, tadā tadāśritaḥ saṃyogo
GSP28mimsvtku:3643: 'pi duṣṭo bhavati. ataḥ saṃyogasya svadoṣā atyāsattyādayo viṣayadoṣāś ca
GSP28mimsvtku:3644: sādṛśyādayo dūṣakā bhavanti. tad iha śuktau rajatam iti gṛhyamāṇāyāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3645: kāryadoṣāt śuktikāyogo duṣṭa ity avagamyate. ato 'sau samyagarthavācinā saṃśabdena vāryata iti. evañ cāvayavavyākhyāyām āśrīyamāṇāyāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3646: lokasiddhalakṣaṇānuvādenāpy animittatvavidhir na duṣyatīty āha -- evam iti || 39 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3647: tathā yad api bauddhaiḥ prāptivacanaṃ prayogaśabdaṃ manvānaiḥ śrotracakṣuṣor aprāpyakāritvād avyāpakaṃ lakṣaṇam ity uktaṃ, tad api vyāpāramātravacanaṃ prayogaśabdaṃ vyācakṣāṇair asmābhiḥ parihṛtam ity āha
GSP28mimsvtku:3648: -- tataś ceti. vyāpāramātravācitvād aviruddham ity uparitanena sambandha iti || 40 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3650: prāpyeti nontena. evaṃ hi tair uktaṃ -
GSP28mimsvtku:3651: sāntaragrahaṇaṃ na syāt prāptau jñāne 'dhikasya ca |
GSP28mimsvtku:3652: iti. yadi cakṣuśśrotre viṣayaṃ prāpya gṛhṇītaḥ, yad idaṃ dūre śabdo dūre 'rtha iti sāntaragrahaṇaṃ yac ca sumahatāṃ mahīmahīdharādīnām
GSP28mimsvtku:3653: adhiṣṭhānādhikaparimāṇānāṃ{1,223}grahaṇaṃ tat kilobhayam api na syāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:3654: prāpyakāriṣu tvagādiṣv adarśanāt. tad etad uktaṃ bhavati -- yat prāpyakāri na tat sāntaram adhikaṃ ca vedayati, yathā kāyaḥ na ca tathā śrotracakṣuṣī
GSP28mimsvtku:3655: ity āvītahetuḥ. upālambhe kilaśabdaḥ. ubhayasyāpi samādhāsyamānatvād iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3656: ārjavāvasthānaṃ vā samprayogo 'bhimata ity āha -- yadi veti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3659: upalabdhaḥ. tad idam ārjavāvasthānam api taddhetutayā tathā vyapadiśyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:3661: kāryalakṣitayogyatālakṣaṇo vā yaḥ śabdārthayor iva rūpādicakṣurādyoḥ sambandhaḥ samprayoga ity āha -- yogyateti. athavāstu sāṅkhyādisiddhāntasiddhaḥ prāptirūpa eva sambandhaḥ. nātrāpi kiñcid duṣyatīty āha -- sāṅkhyādīn iti. nirjitya hi sāṅkhyādīn prāptipakṣo 'tra
GSP28mimsvtku:3662: dūṣyate. na ca te nirjetuṃ śakyāḥ. aprāpyakāripakṣe hi sūkṣmavyavahitaviprakṛṣṭādīnām aprāptatvāviśeṣeṇa grahaṇaprasaṅgād iti bhāvaḥ || 43 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3663: anumānenāpi śrotracakṣuṣoḥ prāpyakāritvam avagamyate ity āha
GSP28mimsvtku:3664: -- tayor iti. tayoḥ śrotracakṣuṣor ity arthaḥ. cakṣuśśrotre prāpyakāriṇī,
GSP28mimsvtku:3665: bāhyendriyatvāt tvagindriyavad iti. nanu ca karṇaśaṣkulī cakṣurgolakaṃ ca śarīrastham evopalabhyate, kathaṃ tat prāpyakārīty ucyate. tad etad eteṣāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3666: tāvat prāpyakārivādināṃ sāṅkhyānāṃ matena samādadhāti -- kecid iti. evaṃ hi sāṅkhyā manyante -- āhaṅkārikayoḥ śrotracakṣuṣor vṛttiḥ śarīrād bahir bhavati arthadeśaṃ prāpnoti. sā ca kāryadarśanonneyā yathākāryam avatiṣṭhata iti || 44 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3668: tatroddharaṇapūraṇādinigrahānugrahadarśanāt. itarathā tadasambhavāt. yadi hy adhiṣṭhānātiriktam akṣaṃ bhavet, tarhy adhiṣṭhānasaṃskāro 'narthakaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:3669: syāt, ata āha -- cikitsādīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yadīndriyam adhiṣṭhāne na
GSP28mimsvtku:3670: sambaddhaṃ bhavet, tato 'dhiṣṭhānasaṃskāras tasyopakārako na syāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:3671: adhiṣṭhānādhāraṃ tu tat. atas tasyaivādhārabhūtasyādhiṣṭhānasya saṃskāra
GSP28mimsvtku:3673: nanv evam api golakādhikaraṇasyaiva tatsaṃskāra upakārako
GSP28mimsvtku:3674: bhavatu, tasya tv asambaddhasya bhāgasya golakena golakasaṃskāro
GSP28mimsvtku:3675: nopakārakaḥ syāt. tena ca saṃskṛte na prayojanam. tasyaiva prāptatvena prakāśakatvāt. ato yat prakāśakaṃ tat saṃskartum aśakyam asambandhāt. yac ca śakyaṃ na tena saṃskṛtena prayojanam, asambaddhasya hi bhāgasya
GSP28mimsvtku:3676: prakāśayitum aśakteḥ, ata āha -- taddeśa iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:3678: ato 'dhiṣṭhānadeśa eva saṃskāraḥ sarvopakārako bhaviṣyati. yathā pādayoḥ prayuktaḥ saṃskāro dūrasthasyāpi cakṣuṣa upakārako bhaviṣyatīti || 46 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3679: ato nāyam ekāntaḥ yadadhiṣṭhānadeśe saṃskārāt tadvartyevendriyamitīty āha -- tasmād iti. nirantarādhikagrahaṇam upapādayati -- bahir iti syādantena. kāryadarśanabalena hi tadvṛttiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:3682: nirantaradarśanāc ca santatā. ato yatra yādṛśaṃ vṛttibhāge pārthavaṃ pṛthutvaṃ bhavati, tadanurūpam evādhiṣṭhānādhikaṃ mahīdharādi gṛhyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:3683: amūrtāyā api vṛtter aupādhiko vyomna iva bhāgavyapadeśaḥ. yad eva tayā
GSP28mimsvtku:3684: prakāśyate tadaupādhikam eva bhāgavyapadeśaṃ labhate iti. na ca vācyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3685: yadi vṛttir gatvārthaṃ prakāśayati kim iti tarhi nitāntadūravartino 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:3686: bhāvān na prakāśayatīti. yāvati hi dūre kāryam upalabhyate tāvantam
GSP28mimsvtku:3687: evādhvānam asau sarpatīty adhikadarśanavat kalpanīyam ity āha -- dūre
GSP28mimsvtku:3689: nanv evam api yadīndriyavṛttyārthāḥ prakāśyante, sā tarhi nirgatya gatāsty eveti kiṃ na pihitendriyasyāpi bhāvā bhāsante, ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:3690: dīpaprabheti. nāvaśyaṃ pihitendriyasya vṛttir asti kāryābhāvāt tu sā dīpanāśe prabhāvannimīlayato 'pi naṣṭety unnīyata iti || 49 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3691: astu vā adhiṣṭhānapidhāne 'pi vṛttiḥ. ātmaprayatnānugṛhītā tu sā ātmany artham upanayati. adhiṣṭhānapidhāne hy ātmanaḥ prayatnocchedāt prayatnānadhiṣṭhitayā tayānupanīto 'rtho nātmanānubhūyata ity āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:3693: vicchinnabodham idānīm upapādayati -- vicchinna itīti. vibhor apy ātmanaḥ prāgbhavīyaka[647]rmārjitaṃ sakalabhogāyatanaṃ śarīram iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3695: avicchedabodho yukta iti. śabde tu vicchedādhikabodho bhrāntir eveti kiṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3696: tadupapādanena.[648]tathā hi -- svadeśa eva śabdaḥ śrotreṇa prakāśyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:3697: kutas tasya vicchedaḥ. kutaḥ vibhor{1,226}amūrtasya vṛddhihrāsāv ity āha -
GSP28mimsvtku:3698: śabde[649] tv iti. etat tu svamatenoktam. sāṅkhyamate tu śrotravṛttiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:3699: śabdadeśaṃ gacchaty eva. tatra śarīrāpekṣayaiva vicchedabodho vaktavyaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:3705: ayaṃ ca sāṅkhyasiddhāntasiddho vṛttigamanapakṣo vārttikakāreṇa prāptisādhāraṇyamātreṇoktaḥ, na punarabhipretaḥ. na hīndriyavṛttir nāma
GSP28mimsvtku:3706: kācit pramāṇenāvagamyate. tathā hi -- āhaṅkārikāṇīndriyāṇīti kāpilā manyante. yathāhuḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:3708: iti. kaś cāyam ahaṅkāraḥ. yadi yo 'yam ātmānaṃ prakāśayati, sa tarhi jñānamitīndriyāṇāṃ kathaṃ prakṛtir bhaviṣyati. ātmādhāram āntaraṃ jñānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3709: kathaṃ tena bāhyendriyāṇyārabdhuṃ śakyante. atha mataṃ tattvāntaram
GSP28mimsvtku:3710: ahaṅkāra iti. tan na. pramāṇābhāvāt. api ca tattvāntaram api tat kāpilair
GSP28mimsvtku:3711: vibhuḥ saṅgīryate. tatas tanmayānīndriyāṇy api vibhūni bhaveyuḥ. na ca vibhūnāṃ vṛttir upapadyate. vṛttir nirgamanam. na ca tad vibhūnāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3712: sambhavati. syān matam -- na ca brūmo vibhūnīndriyāṇi gacchantīti, kiṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3713: tarhi. tadādhārā vṛttir iti. keyaṃ vṛttir iti vaktavyam. yadi śrotrādīnāṃ śabdādigrahaṇayogyatā, sā tarhy amūrtā śaktiḥ kathaṃ gacchet. api ca trīṇy
GSP28mimsvtku:3714: antaḥkaraṇāni mahānahaṅkāro mana iti kāpilā manyante. na ca karaṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3715: karaṇāntarāṇāṃ prakṛtir upapadyate karaṇatvāt manovat. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:3716: nāhaṅkārikāṇīndriyāṇi. na ca tadvṛttir amūrtā prāpyakāriṇīti pramāṇavatī
GSP28mimsvtku:3717: kalpanā. tathā śabdādhikaraṇe vakṣyati śrotrāgamanapakṣe cety atra
GSP28mimsvtku:3720: kiṃ punarbhautikatve pramāṇam indriyāṇām. dṛṣṭānusāraḥ. tathā hi -- bahirbhūtānām eva yathāyathaṃ rūpādyabhivyañjakatvam upalabdham.
GSP28mimsvtku:3721: tejasā hi rūpaṃ prakāśyate yathā dīpena. raso 'dbhiḥ. śuṣkāṇām[650]api
GSP28mimsvtku:3722: dravyāṇāṃ sann api raso na vyaktam upalabhyate yathārdrāṇām. na ca śuṣkeṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:3723: raso nāsti, yāvaddravyabhāvitvāt. ato 'dbhī raso 'bhivyajyate. pārthivaṃ ca kiñcid dravyaṃ{1,227}gandhasyābhivyañjakaṃ dṛṣṭam. yathā nimbatvak candanagandhasya. tatkaṣāyapariṣiktasya hi candanasya sphuṭataraṃ gandho 'bhivyajyate. na cādbhir asāv abhivyajyate, kevalānām anabhivyañjakatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:3724: vāyunāpi bahiḥ sparśābhivyaktir upalabdhā, yathā hemantaśiśirayor viyati
GSP28mimsvtku:3725: vitatānām apāṃ sūkṣmatvād anupalakṣyamāṇānāṃ vāpi vāte śītasparśo
GSP28mimsvtku:3726: 'vagamyate. na cāsau vāyoḥ. anuṣṇāśītasparśatvād vāyoḥ. ato rūpābhivyañjakaṃ cakṣus taijasam. āpyaṃ rasanam abhivyañjakaṃ ca rasasya.
GSP28mimsvtku:3727: ghrāṇaṃ pārthivaṃ gandhasya. vāyavīyaṃ tvagindriyaṃ sparśasya. śrotram idānīṃ kiṃprakṛtikam. tad api bhautikam indriyatvāt. kiṃ punarbhūtaṃ tasya
GSP28mimsvtku:3728: prakṛtiḥ. ākāśa iti vadāmaḥ. tathā hi -- dvividhaṃ kāryaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3729: śarīram indriyaṃ ca. ākāśasyāpy avakāśadānena śarīropakārakatvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:3731: tatrendriyāntarāṇāṃ bhūtāntaraprakṛtitvād ākāśam eva śrotrasya prakṛtir iti niścīyate. api ca svaguṇam eva bhūtāntarāṇi vyañjayanti. na ca teṣāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3732: śabdo guṇaḥ, ākāśaguṇatvāt. ata ākāśam eva tasyābhivyañjakam iti yuktam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3733: evañ ca dṛṣṭānusāriṇī kalpanā kṛtā bhavati. santi hi deheṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:3734: pṛthivyādibhūtabhāgāḥ kḷptagandhādyabhivyaktiśaktayaś ca bahir iti śarīre
GSP28mimsvtku:3735: 'pi vartamānānāṃ teṣām eva vyañjakatvānumānaṃ yuktam. evañ ca prāptir api
GSP28mimsvtku:3736: sa(?mi/ma)rthitā bhavati. tvagghrāṇarasanānāṃ hi sthitam eva
GSP28mimsvtku:3737: prāpyakāritvam. śrotrasyāpi karṇacchidraparimitanabhaso dharmādharmopagṛhītasya svadeśa eva vibhuṃ śabdaṃ prakāśayataḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:3738: prāpyakāritvam eva. tejaso hi visaraṇasvabhāvasya cakṣuṣo nirgatasyārthadeśaprāptir upapannaiva. anudbhūtarūpatvāc ca tasya
GSP28mimsvtku:3739: rūpānupalambhaḥ. ata evāgnitejasaḥ pṛthvagrādikalpanā ca tasya kāryadarśanānusāreṇa mūrtatvād upapattimatī. sarvatra ca yathākāryadarśanaṃ yogyatāsanāthā prāptir indriyārthayoḥ sambandha iti
GSP28mimsvtku:3740: darśayitavyam. ato na kācid atiprasaktir vaktavyā yathā vakṣyati --
GSP28mimsvtku:3741: prāptimātraṃ hi sambandhaḥ iti. ataḥ siddham indriyāṇi bhautikāni prāpyakārīṇi ceti || 51
GSP28mimsvtku:3744: evaṃ tāvat satsamprayogaśabdāḥ vivṛtāḥ. padānvayam ataḥ param
GSP28mimsvtku:3745: anusandhāsyāmaḥ. atra kila puruṣasya samprayoga indriyāṇāṃ buddhijanmety
GSP28mimsvtku:3746: ucyate.{1,228}tac cāyuktaṃ, vibhoḥ puruṣasya sarvabhāvair eva samprayogāvyabhicāreṇa viśeṣaṇopādānavaiyarthyāt. indriyāṇāṃ ca bhautikānām acetanatvāt. cetanā hi buddhir iti sarvalaukikāḥ parīkṣakāś ca
GSP28mimsvtku:3747: manyante. na punarindriyavyāpāro buddhir iti. sāṅkhyā hīndriyavṛttau buddhiśabdam upacaranti. tatra teṣām eva paribhāṣāmātram. ato 'tra
GSP28mimsvtku:3748: vaktavyaṃ kīdṛśo 'tra padānvaya ity ata āha -- puruṣendriyaśabdāv iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3749: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- kim atra vaktavyam. bhāṣyakāreṇa puruṣendriyaśabdau vyavahitakalpanayā vyākhyātau yenaivam āha satīndriyārthasambandhe puruṣasya yā buddhir jāyate tat pratyakṣam iti. kaḥ punar ayaṃ puruṣaḥ yasya buddhijanmanā sambandhaḥ, ata āha -- puruṣa iti. nātra tātparyamanyaparatvāt sūtrasya. paramārthatas tu puruṣo 'trātmābhipretaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:3750: ya ātmavāde prasādhayiṣyate. na śarīraṃ, tasya bhautikatvenācetanatvād iti
GSP28mimsvtku:3751: nanv evam api yannityam ātmānaṃ mīmāṃsakā manyante, tan na sidhyet. jñānajanmani vikārāpattyā
GSP28mimsvtku:3752: jñānajanmanā tv avikṛtasya pūrvāvasthāyām ivāpramātṛtvaprasaṅgaḥ, ata āha -- vikriyeti. evaṃ hi manyante -- na kiñcid vikārmātreṇa vastu naśyati,
GSP28mimsvtku:3753: tatpratyabhijñānāt. etac cātmavāda eva bhāṣyakāreṇa vakṣyate. ato duruktaṃ paraiḥ buddhijanmani puṃsaś ca vikṛtir yady
GSP28mimsvtku:3756: iti. atra buddhijanma pratyakṣam ity ucyate. tasya ko 'rthaḥ. kiṃ buddher janmātiriktam anatiriktaṃ vā, yady atiriktaṃ tad vācyaṃ kīdṛśam iti. na ca svamate janmasvarūpam abhihitam. yadi vaiśeṣikoktasvakāraṇasamavāyo janmābhidhīyate, tasya nityatvenākṣānadhīnatvāt pratyakṣaśabdābhidheyatvānupapattiḥ. anatiriktatve tu punaruktataiva
GSP28mimsvtku:3757: doṣaḥ, ata āha -- buddhijanmeti. ayam arthaḥ -- nāyaṃ buddhijanmeti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ. kin tu buddhiś cāsau janma ceti karmadhārayaḥ. janmaśabdaś ca kartari maninpratyayāntaḥ. tena jāyamānā buddhiḥ{1,229}pramāṇam ity uktaṃ bhavati. na punarvaiśeṣikādivannityam atyantabhinnaṃ samavāyam
GSP28mimsvtku:3758: ācakṣmahe. kāraṇadaśāviśeṣa eva kāryajanmety ucyate. nāsāv atyantaṃ kāryakāraṇābhyāṃ vyatiricyate. ataḥ kim anyadoṣodbhāvaneneti || 53 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3760: kārakāntarāṇi janitvā kiyantañcit kālaṃ sthitvā svakāryeṣu vartamānāni
GSP28mimsvtku:3761: dṛṣṭāni. tad buddhāv api pramāṇe mā bhūd iti janmavivakṣā sūtrakāreṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:3763: kiṃ punaḥ kārakāntarasādharmye duṣyati, ata āha -- na hīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3764: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na kiñcid duṣyati. kin tu nendriyādivad jātā satī buddhiḥ kṣaṇamātram apy āste. ataḥ kathaṃ tadvad eva sthitvā pravartata
GSP28mimsvtku:3765: iti. na kevalaṃ jātā nāste, kin tu jāyamānāpi nodāste. sā hy utpadyamānaiva svārthaṃ prakāśayanty evotpadyata iti na kṣaṇāntaraṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3766: pratīkṣate. na hy arthaprakāśanād anyad buddhe rūpam upalabhyata ity āha
GSP28mimsvtku:3767: -- jāyata iti. kārakāntaravaidharmyapratipādanenātra nityabuddhivādino nirākartuṃ buddher anaticiravināśitvam uktam. tatra cāyaṃ hetuḥ. yadīyam utpattimatī tasyā vināśenāvaśyaṃ bhavitavyam. na cāhaituko vināśaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:3768: sambhavati, utpattimattvād eva. na ca prahārādirasyā vināśahetuḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3769: amūrtatvāt. ato jñānāntareṇa vā nāśyate, tajjanmanā vā saṃskāreṇa. tac cobhayam api sahasaiva niṣpannam. asti hīndriyādikā sāmagryapratibandhā.
GSP28mimsvtku:3770: sā kim aparaṃ vijñānaṃ na janayati. smṛtihetur api saṃskāro 'nayaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:3771: jātamātrayā janita iti karmavat kāryavirodhitvād api tādātviko vināśo buddher iti yuktam. na ca saiveti buddheḥ pratyabhijñānam asti. na ca bhedānadhyavasāyamātrād ekatvasiddhiḥ. api cārthāntaradarśane sphuṭa
GSP28mimsvtku:3772: evāśutaravināśo buddheḥ, evañ ca vyavasthitaikadarśane 'pi tadvad eva tadanumānam. api ca tatrāpi vyavahite jñānaṃ nivartate, taccirāvasthāyitve
GSP28mimsvtku:3773: 'nupapannam. evaṃ hi vyavahite kumbhe pratyakṣajñānam anuvarteta. na
GSP28mimsvtku:3774: caivam. smṛtis tu parastād dṛśyate. sā pratyakṣajñānavyāptatve{1,230} na
GSP28mimsvtku:3775: syāt.[651]parokṣāparokṣayor ekagocarayor ekadā virodhāt. syād etad avyaktagrahaṇam anavasthāyitvād[652]vidyutsampāte
GSP28mimsvtku:3776: iti. na. pratiṣeddhavyābhyanujñānāt. yadi manyate buddher[653]anaticirānuvṛttau prakāśasya gatvaratvād vidyutsampāta iva na vyaktaṃ bhāvāḥ prakāśeran, ato nāśutaravināśinī buddhir iti. tan na.
GSP28mimsvtku:3778: utpannamātrāpavargitāṃ buddher bruvāṇo niṣedhyam evāśutaravināśam abhyanujānāti.[654]api ca viśeṣāgrahaṇe sāmānyamātragrahaṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:3779: avyaktagrahaṇam. na tu svagocare kiñcid avyaktaṃ nāmāsti,
GSP28mimsvtku:3781: eva, na tu buddher anavasthānāt. vidyutprakāśe[655]'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:3782: yāvadāśutaravināśinyā dhiyā viṣayīkṛtaṃ tad vyaktam eva. viśeṣās tu tatra
GSP28mimsvtku:3783: grahaṇahetvabhāvād agṛhītā eva, na punaravyaktaparicchinnāḥ. na hi gṛhītam
GSP28mimsvtku:3785: avyaktagrahaṇāpattiḥ. nityabuddhivādinaś cāyam abhiprāyaḥ śabdādhikaraṇe bhāṣyakāreṇa vakṣyata iti || 55 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3792: nanu pramāṇaṃ nāma kārakaviśeṣaḥ. na cākurvat kriyāṃ kārakaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3793: bhavati. yadi tu buddhir janitvā na vyāpriyate, katham asau kārakaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3794: pramāṇam iti ca sāmānyaviśeṣaśabdābhyām abhidhāsyate, ata āha -- teneti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3795: satyaṃ, na vyāpārasambandham antareṇa kārakatvaṃ bhavati. janmaiva tu buddher vyāpāraḥ, vyāpārāntarāsambhavāt. tad eva ca vivakṣāvaśāt pramety upacaryate. janmanā hi tasyāḥ pramāṇatvaṃ bhavati. atas tayaiva kriyayā
GSP28mimsvtku:3796: kārakaṃ pramāṇam iti ca sāmānyaviśeṣaśabdābhyām abhidhānasiddhiḥ. caśabdāt pramāṇaṃ cety arthaḥ ayaṃ ca janmāvyatirekapakṣo yā buddhir jāyate iti vadatā bhāṣyakāreṇaiva varṇita ity āha -- jama[656] ceti. aparam api jāyamānāvasthāviśeṣaṇopādānasya{1,231}prayojanam āha -- tac ceti. buddhiḥ pramāṇam ity etāvaty ukte bhūtā bhaviṣyantī vā pramāṇam ity api kecit
GSP28mimsvtku:3797: sambhāvayeyuḥ, yathā sadviśeṣaṇopādāne varṇitam. atas tadāśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ jāyamānaviśeṣaṇopādānam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3802: astu vā vaiśeṣikasiddhāntasiddhaḥ svakāraṇe kāryasamavāyo vyatirikta eva janma, tathāpi na kiñcid duṣyatīty āha -- yadā tv iti. sa khalu nityo 'pīndriyādhīnābhivyaktir iti pratyakṣam apekṣyata iti || 58 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3803: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa buddhir vā janma vetyādinā pramāṇāniyamo
GSP28mimsvtku:3804: darśitaḥ, tatrābhiprāyam āha -- pramāṇaphalabhāvas tv iti. ayam abhiprāyo bhāṣyakārasya -- ekam idaṃ sūtraṃ nobhayam utsahate kartuṃ yat pramāṇaṃ ca
GSP28mimsvtku:3805: niyacchati, animittatāṃ ca vidadhātīti. bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam. tad atrānimittatāmātram eva vidyamānopalambhanāt pratipādyam. pramāṇaṃ tu vivakṣāvaśena buddhyādīnām anyatamaṃ bhaviṣyati. karaṇaṃ hi pramāṇaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3806: sādhakatamaṃ ca karaṇaṃ, vivakṣādhīnaś ca sādhakatamabhāvaḥ. ato yad eva
GSP28mimsvtku:3807: tu bāhyāpekṣayā phalaṃ pratyāsannam iti vivakṣyate tad eva pramāṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3808: bhaviṣyati. tataḥ paraṃ cābhyarhitatvavivakṣayā phalam iti || 59 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3809: yatheṣṭakalpanām eva darśayati -- yadveti. asatīndriye jñānodayābhāvāt tad eva pramāṇam. sad api cendriyam asaṅgatam arthena na
GSP28mimsvtku:3810: jñānaṃ janayatīti tadarthasaṅgatiḥ pramāṇam. sambaddham api cendriyam
GSP28mimsvtku:3811: arthena manasānadhiṣṭhitaṃ na pramāṇam iti tanmanassaṃyogaḥ pramāṇam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3812: sarvasminn api ca satyasatyātmamanassaṃyoge jñānānudayāt sa ca pramāṇam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3813: athavā sarveṣām ekatarāpāye 'pi na jñānaṃ{1,232}jāyata iti sarva eva
GSP28mimsvtku:3814: saṃyogaḥ pramāṇam. ātmanā vā manaso yoga iti yojanīyam iti || 60 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3816: indriyādiprāmāṇyapakṣe jñānaṃ phalam ity arthaḥ. nanu yadīndriyādi pramāṇaṃ, tena tarhi sadā jñānaṃ janayitavyam eva. na ca tad asti, asti khalu pihitacakṣuṣo 'pi cakṣuḥ. na ca tad jñāpayati. saṃyuktaṃ jñāpayatīti ced, na. vyabhicārāt. saṃyujyate khalv asya nānārthair nāyanaṃ tejaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:3817: kiñcid eva tu jāpayati. ato vyabhicārād akāraṇam indriyādi jñānajanmanīti,
GSP28mimsvtku:3818: ata āha -- tatreti. uktam idam asmābhir vyāpāravacanaḥ prayogaśabda iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3819: phalānumeyaś cāsau vyāpāraḥ. ato yatraiva phalam upalabhyate tatraiva vyāpāravattvāt teṣāṃ pramāṇatvam iti. asati tu vyāpāre na phalam utpadyata
GSP28mimsvtku:3820: iti nātiprasaṅga ity āha -- vyāpāra iti || 61 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3822: prāptivacanatve 'tiprasaṅgo duṣpariharaḥ. asti hi cākṣuṣasya tejaso nānārthaiḥ samprayogaḥ. na ca tāvad jñāpayati, kiñcid eva tu kadācit. api ca kā ceyaṃ prāptiḥ. yadi saṃyogaḥ, sa ca dravyeṇaiveti rūpasaṃvinna syāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:3823: atha tenāpi saṃyuktasamavāyād asti sannikarṣa ity ucyate, samāno 'sau
GSP28mimsvtku:3824: rasādiṣv apīti te 'pi cakṣuṣānubhūyerann iti sarvātmakārthagrahaṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:3825: itīndriyasaṃyogapramāṇapakṣe parair uktaṃ yat tat pariharati -- na ceti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3826: kaḥ punaḥ sarvātmanā sambandho nāstīti vadato 'bhiprāyaḥ -- yadi guṇaiḥ saṃyogo na rasādibhiḥ sambhavatīti, sa tarhi rūpeṇāpi guṇatvāviśeṣān na syād eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:3827: saṃyuktasamavāyas tv aviśiṣṭaḥ sarveṣām ity uktam eva, ata āha -{1,233}
GSP28mimsvtku:3828: prāptīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ - bhaved ayaṃ doṣaḥ yadi prāptimātram evendriyārthayoḥ sambandhaḥ pramāṇam āśrīyata iti. sa tu yogyatāsahāyaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:3829: yogyatā ca kāryadarśanonneyā. ato yad eva yadindriyasaṃyogānantaram anubhūyate tatraiva tatsamprayogasya yogyatvaṃ, netaratra, pramāṇābhāvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:3830: ata eva jighṛkṣitasūkṣmarūpādigrahaṇaprasaṅgo 'pi parihartavya iti kim iti
GSP28mimsvtku:3831: nābhyupeyate, ata āha -- mā bhūd iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yo hi jñānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3832: pramāṇam iṣṭvā satsamprayogaṃ pramāṇakāraṇam ātiṣṭhate na tu pramāṇaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3833: tenāpi prāpter aviśeṣāt tvacā rūpāvadhāraṇaṃ mā bhūd iti na prāptimātraṃ sambandho 'bhyupagantavya iti || 63 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3834: atha tu pramāṇaniṣpattau yogyatāsahitā prāptir iṣyate, śakyaṃ tat phalaniṣpattāv api vaktum iti doṣaprasaṅgaparihāratulyatvān naikaḥ paryanuyojyo bhavatīty āha -- yatheti. niyatā hi kācid eva svaviṣayeṇa rūpādinā cakṣurādīnāṃ saṅgatir iti. yogyatvād iti. tatraiva kāryadarśanayogyatvād ity arthaḥ || 64 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3836: 'bhihitaḥ. idānīṃ dvyāśrayo yogaḥ katham akṣeṇaiva vyapadiśyata iti codyaṃ pariharati -- yogasyeti. asyārthaḥ -- nedam adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ yadanekair api sambaddham ekenaiva vyapadiśyata iti. bhavati hi ḍitthaḍavitthayor mātur ḍitthamāteti vyapadeśa iti. āha -- astv anyatarāśrayo vyapadeśaḥ. iha tu niyamenaivākṣeṇa vyapadeśo dṛśyate nārthena. mātus tu ḍavitthenāpi kadācid vyapadeśo bhavaty ata āha -- athaveti. asādhāraṇena hi vyapadeśo bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:3837: jñānasyāsādhāraṇam akṣaṃ, tadartham evākṣāṇāṃ nirmāṇāt. arthas tu kāryāntarasādhāraṇaḥ nāsau vyapadeśahetur iti || 65 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3839: pramāṇaphalayor nāsty eva, sambandhasyārthāśrayatvād jñānasyāpi tadviṣayatvād iti. ātmamanassambandhapramāṇapakṣe tarhi viṣayabhedo
GSP28mimsvtku:3840: bhavet. sa hy ātmamanaāśrayaḥ jñānaṃ cārthaviṣayam iti śaṅkate tāvat --
GSP28mimsvtku:3841: saṃyoge tv iti[658]phalayorantena. pariharati -- neti. kāraṇam āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:3842: arthe hīti. asyārthaḥ -- yady apy ātmamanassambandho nārthāśrayaḥ, tathāpy arthe vyāpriyate. jñānam api tadviṣayam evotpadyata iti vyāpārataḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:3846: atha punarāśrayo viṣayo 'bhipretaḥ, tadubhayor apy ātmasthatvāt sutarāṃ samānaviṣayatvam ity āha -- athāpīti || 67 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3847: ayam evātmamanassaṃyogo jñānotpatteḥ pratyāsannatayā kārakāntarebhyo viśiṣṭa ity ayam eva pramāṇam ity āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:3851: tasyārthaprāptyā jñānasya ca tadviṣayatvena sphuṭaṃ viṣayasāmyam ity āha -- pramāṇam iti evaṃ tāvadindriyādiprāmāṇyapakṣe pramāṇaphalayor viṣayasāmyam
GSP28mimsvtku:3852: uktam. idānīṃ jñānaprāmāṇyapakṣe 'py evam eva darśayitavyam ity āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:3853: pramāṇeti.{1,235}sarvasavikalpakajñānāni viśeṣaṇajñānapūrvakāṇi, yathā daṇḍy ayaṃ gaur ayaṃ śuklo 'yaṃ gacchaty ayaṃ ḍittho 'yam iti. tad iha viśeṣaṇajñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ viśeṣyajñānaṃ ca phalam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3854: viśeṣyajñānasiddhyarthatvāc ca viśeṣaṇajñānasya. tatrāpi vyāpārataḥ samānaviṣayatvam iti yadā tu viśeṣaṇam eva boddhavyaṃ pramitsitaṃ bhavati, tadā tarhi kaḥ pramāṇaphalayor vivekaḥ, kathaṃ vā samānaviṣayatvam ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:3855: viśeṣaṇe tv iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- tatrāpi vijñānadvayam upalabhyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:3856: ālocanājñānaṃ hi tatra viśeṣaṇe niścayaṃ prasūte. tādarthyāc ca samānaviṣayatvam iti viveka iti || 71 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3857: ālocanājñānamātraparyavasāne tarhi ko vivekaḥ, ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:3858: niścaya iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- ālocanājñāne 'pi hi tad idam iti pratyabhijñānātmakam īdṛśo 'yam iti vā niścayātmakaṃ jñānāntaraṃ śabdayojanāśūnyam asty eva, yathā tiraścām anyeṣāṃ vā asmṛtaśabdānāṃ vācakarahitam asādhāraṇaṃ vastu pratipadyamānānām. ato 'sty eva jñānadvayapradarśanāt pramāṇaphalavivekaḥ. yadā punarālocite 'rthe niścayo na jāyata eva, tadā pramāṇatvam eva nāstīty āha -- nāsāv iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3859: arthāvadhāraṇaphalatvāt pramāṇatvasya, tasya ca tadānīm abhāvād iti || 72
GSP28mimsvtku:3860: viśeṣyajñāna idānīṃ kā vārtā. na tāvadaprāmāṇyaṃ, sarvatra
GSP28mimsvtku:3861: prasaṅgāt. na cāsati phale pramāṇatvam api śakyaṃ samarthayitum. atha tad eva pramāṇaṃ phalaṃ ceti dvirūpam iṣyate, astu tarhi viśeṣaṇajñānādiṣv api dvirūpatvam eva, kiṃ bhedopanyāsena. yuktaṃ caitad evam. evaṃ hi pramāṇaphalayor atyantapratyāsattir{1,236}āśritā bhavati. saiva
GSP28mimsvtku:3862: copapattimatī. na hy anyatra sādhanam anyatra sādhyaṃ dṛṣṭam. na hi paraśau khadiraṃ prāpte palāśe chidā bhavati, ata āha -- hānādīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yat tāvad idam atipratyāsattitṛṣṇayaikatvaṃ pramāṇaphalayoḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3863: tadanantaram eva nirākariṣyāmaḥ. yat tu viśeṣyajñānasya phalāntaraṃ na dṛśyata iti. tan na. asti tatrāpi taduttarakālabhāvi hānādi phalam. atha jñānasya jñānam eva phalam, evam ihāpi hānādidhīr eva phala[ṃ]
GSP28mimsvtku:3864: bhaviṣyatīti. athopakārādismṛtivyavahitā hānādibuddhir na phalam iti kiṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3865: manyase, astu tarhīyam evopakārādismṛtiḥ phalam ity āha -- upakārādīti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3866: yas tu viṣayaikatvam icchatā pramāṇaphalayor ekatvam āśritaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3868: yac cedam uktaṃ paraśau khadirāśrite palāśe na chidā dṛśyate
GSP28mimsvtku:3869: iti. idaṃ vā kiṃ dṛśyate yat paraśucchedanayor ekatvam iti. ato yatra sādhanaṃ vyāpriyeta tatra phalaṃ niṣpadyate. tac ca pūrvaṃ pratipāditam
GSP28mimsvtku:3870: eva, na tu sādhanam eva phalam ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- chedana iti || 75 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3871: yadi tūcyate -- sādhyasādhanayor viṣayabhedo[659]na dṛṣṭaḥ ekatvaṃ ca, tadanyatarasmin nāśrayitavye 'smabhyaṃ viṣayābhedo rocata iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3872: tan na. śakyam idam itareṇāpi vaktum iti sāpahāsam āha -- bhavata iti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3875: {1,237} yadi tūcyate -- phalabhūtasyaiva jñānasya karaṇatvam aupacārikaṃ kathañcit kalpyate, na tu pāramārthikam. pāramārthikaṃ hi dvirūpatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:3876: ekasya na sambhavati. tadaupacārikaṃ karaṇatvam āśritya tadubhayam upapādayiṣyāma iti. evaṃ tarhi bhinnayor eva pramāṇaphalayoḥ kathañcid
GSP28mimsvtku:3877: viṣayaikatvaṃ kim iti na kalpyate, tathā saty ubhayaṃ pāramārthikaṃ bhaviṣyatīty āha -- karaṇatveti. tac ca kathañcid viṣayaikatvaṃ pūrvam uktam eva. parair iti. bauddhāpekṣayā svātmani paraśabda iti || 77 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3879: paricchedeti. arthaparicchedaphale ātmamanassaṃyogādyānantaryavivakṣayā pramāṇam. jñāne ca pramāṇe pūrvam ālocanādijñānaṃ pramāṇam. paraṃ tu viśeṣaṇādijñānaṃ phalam iti prakaraṇārthaḥ. sarvaṃ cedam evaṃ saty anuvādatvam ity etat pakṣāśrayaṇenoktam iti draṣṭavyam iti || 78 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3880: yadi tūcyate -- nedam aupacārikaṃ karaṇatvam, api tarhi dvirūpam ekam eva jñānaṃ svasaṃvittyā viṣayākāreṇa ca. tad atra svasaṃvittiḥ phalaṃ, viṣayākāraḥ pramāṇam. yathāhuḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:3882: svasaṃvittiḥ phalaṃ cātra tadrūpo hy arthaniścayaḥ ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3883: iti. sa tu viṣayākāraḥ svayam anākārasya na svābhāviko jñānasya kevalam
GSP28mimsvtku:3884: arthenādhīyata iti sautrāntikamatam upanyasya nirasyati -- svasaṃvittīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3885: idaṃ nīlam iti bahirviṣayānubhavasamartham eva jñānaṃ na
GSP28mimsvtku:3886: svarūpānubhavakṣamaṃ, svātmani kriyāvirodhād iti vijñānavāde vakṣyāma iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3887: yac cedam uktaṃ viṣayākāraḥ pramāṇam iti. tan na, pramāṇābhāvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:3888: viṣayākāro{1,238}nāmārthena jñānam ādhītyata iti na[660]naḥ pramāṇaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3889: tadadhīnajñānavaicitryānupapatteḥ. yadi tv ayaṃ viṣayākāro viṣayastha eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:3890: tadā tasmin pramāṇe bhinnārthatvam aparihāryam evety āha -- pramāṇa iti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3894: anādivāsanopaplāvitānekanīlādyākāram ātmānam ātmanaiva gṛhṇāti. tad asya svākāraḥ pramāṇaṃ, viṣayākāraḥ prameyaṃ, svasaṃvittiḥ phalam iti. yadāhuḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:3897: iti. tad etad upanyasya dūṣayati -- svākāraś ceti. svasaṃvittis tāvanniṣedhyata ity uktam. yaś cāyaṃ svākāraḥ pramāṇatayā kalpitaḥ so 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:3898: svasaṃvitter anyo nāvagamyate. saṃvidrūpataiva jñānasya svākāraḥ. tac ca phalam eva kim anyat pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti. viṣayākāras tu bahir
GSP28mimsvtku:3900: naivam api samānaviṣayatvam upapādayituṃ śakyam iti bhāvaḥ || 80 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3903: astu vā svasaṃvitter anyaḥ svākāraḥ. sa tu paricchinno vā pramāṇam aparicchinno vā. na tāvadaparicchinnaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:3904: sattvāyogāt. paricchedaś ca na tenaiva tasyety aparāparākārakalpanāyām
GSP28mimsvtku:3905: ākārānantyaprasaṅga ity āha -- svākārasyeti. asañcetitasya svākārasya na
GSP28mimsvtku:3906: sattā sidhyatīty āha -- na ceti. idaṃ cānāgatāvekṣaṇena pūrvam asmābhir uktam eva. yaś cāyaṃ viṣayākāro jñānād abhinno grāhya iti kalpitaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3907: tasyāpi svātmani{1,239}vṛttivirodhena jñānena grahītum aśakyatvād anyasya ca grāhakasyānupalambhanād abhāvaḥ syād ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- grāhya iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3908: tad evaṃ parapakṣe tritayam eva mānameyaphalātmakaṃ lupyata iti darśitam iti || 82 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3910: phalam abhyupagantavyam, jñānātiriktānāṃ sukhādīnām asambhavāt. tāny api jñānasamānahetukāni. jñānaṃ hi samanantarapratyayād vāsanāsahāyād bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:3911: sukhādy api rūpādijñānebhyo vāsanāsahāyebhyaḥ pariniṣpadyate. atas tad api
GSP28mimsvtku:3917: iti. evaṃ jñānānāṃ satāṃ grāhyāntarābhāvāt saṃvedanatvam eva, ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:3918: manasaś ceti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na sukhādisaṃvedanāny api
GSP28mimsvtku:3919: vijñānāntaravidhām ativartante. tāny apy antaḥkaraṇena manasendriyeṇa saṃyuktāny ātmaguṇāntarbhūtāny evātmanā pratipadyante. ato mātṛmeyamānamitayas tatrāpi bhidyante. yat tu jñānakāraṇatvena jñānatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:3920: uktaṃ, tatra kiṃ samavāyikāraṇaṃ sukhasya jñānamāhosvinnimittam. na tāvat pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ, teṣāṃ jñānavadātmasamavāyitvāt. nimittatvaṃ tu sarvārthakriyāsvaviśiṣṭaṃ jñānasyeti tāsām api jñānatvāpātaḥ. tasmān na kiñcit svasaṃvedanam iti. yad uktaṃ paraiḥ -- sarvacittacaittānām ātmasaṃvedanaṃ pratyakṣam iti, tat pratyuktaṃ bhavatīti || 83 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3921: nanu samasto 'yaṃ pramāṇaphalaprapañco lakṣaṇābhyupagamena bhavatā darśitaḥ. tad iha viṣayaviśeṣo 'pi darśayitum ucitaḥ. yathānyaiḥ kalpanāpoḍham abhrāntaṃ pratyakṣam iti pratyakṣalakṣaṇam uktvā tasya svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvaṃ darśitam ata āha -- sambaddham iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- sa nāma viṣayaṃ darśayatu[663]yasya kiñcid{1,240}vyāvartyam asti, yathā bauddhasyaiva sāmānyam. asmākaṃ tu sambaddhavartamānaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3922: na sāmānyaviśeṣayor anyatarad api vyāvartyam iti kiṃ viṣayanirdeśeneti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3925: nanv atra bhāṣyakāreṇa pratyakṣam animittam, evaṃlakṣaṇakaṃ hi tat ity uktam. ato yad evaṃlakṣaṇalakṣitaṃ tannāmānimittaṃ bhavatu.
GSP28mimsvtku:3926: bauddhādilakṣitaṃ tu kiṃ nimittaṃ na bhavatīty āśaṅkyāha -- lakṣaṇam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:3927: evaṃ hi manyate -- bauddhādilakṣaṇalakṣitam api yadi laukikaṃ pratyakṣaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:3928: tarhi niyataṃ vidyamānopalambhanam. no cet pratyakṣam eva na bhavatīti
GSP28mimsvtku:3930: ye ca nirvikalpakapratyakṣavādino bauddhāḥ teṣāṃ sutarāṃ dharme pratyakṣasyānimittatety āha -- nirvikalpaketi. atra kāraṇam āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:3931: sādhyasādhaneti. svargayāgādisādhyasādhanasambandha eva dharmaḥ, nāsāv avikalpya grahītuṃ śakyata iti || 86 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3932: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa pratyakṣasyānimittatāṃ pratipādya tatpūrvakatvāc cānumānādīnām apy animittatvam uktam. tac ca tatpūrvakatvāsambhavenākṣipati -- katham iti. kim iti na bhavatīty ata āha
GSP28mimsvtku:3933: -- yadeti. evaṃ hi manyate -- indriyārthasāmarthyamātrajanmā hi dhīḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:3934: pratyakṣam. sā ca smṛtyākṣiptanām ajātiguṇadravyakarmavikalparahitā. na hīndriyāṇi smartuṃ śaknuvanti. nāpy arthaḥ. yathāhuḥ -- na hīndriyamiyato vyāpārān kartuṃ samarthaṃ,{1,241}sannihitaviṣayabalenotpatter iti. ato naivaṃvidhapratyakṣapūrvakatvam anumānādīnām upapadyata iti || 87 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3935: nanu nirvikalpakapratyakṣapūrvakāṇi kim ity anumānādīni na
GSP28mimsvtku:3936: bhavanti, ata āha -- na ceti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- liṅgādivikalpapūrvakāṇy
GSP28mimsvtku:3937: anumānādīni. na teṣāṃ nirvikalpakād evātmalābhaḥ sambhavati. na ca vikalpasambhinnānāṃ jñānānāṃ pratyakṣatvam upapadyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:3938: āntarālikaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyārthasmaraṇenendriyārthavyāpārakhyavadhānāt. na ca nirvikalpakodaye vyāpṛtaṃ sadarthendriyaṃ punaḥ savikalpakotpattāv api
GSP28mimsvtku:3939: vyāpriyata iti pramāṇam asti, viśeṣaṇādismaraṇasamanantaram sambhavat savikalpakaṃ tadbhāvabhāvāt tatkāraṇakam eva bhavet. api ca yadi
GSP28mimsvtku:3940: tadindriyaṃ punaḥ savikalpakotpattāv api kāraṇaṃ, tat prāg apy āsīd iti kiṃ na sahasaivaṃ savikalpakapratyayān api janayet. ato nendriyārthasāmarthyajanmānaḥ savikalpakapratyayā iti na pratyakṣam.
GSP28mimsvtku:3941: indriyavyāpārāsattimātreṇa tu pratyakṣatve nimīlitanayanasyāpi vikalpaḥ pratyakṣo bhavet. yac ca nāmāvikalpakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na talliṅgādivikalpakam
GSP28mimsvtku:3942: iti na kathañcit pratyakṣapūrvakatvam anumānādīnām. upamāne 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:3944: sādṛśyagrahaṇaṃ,[666]tad api nāvikalpya bhavatīti sambandha iti || 88 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3949: arthāpattir apy atīndriyeṣu viṣayeṣv eva śaktā śrotrādiṣu na paraṃ pratyakṣeṇa anyenāpi pramāṇenādrṣṭapūrveṣu pravartate. sā kathaṃ pratyakṣapūrvikā bhaviṣyatīty āha -- arthāpattir iti. kvacit pūrvadṛṣṭe 'pi sanniveśaviśeṣaviśiṣṭe pravartate, yathā gṛhābhāvadṛśaḥ puruṣasya
GSP28mimsvtku:3950: devadattasya bahirbhāvāvagama iti prāya iy uktam. nanu bhavatv atīndriyaviṣayā arthāpattiḥ. yat tu anupapadyamānam upalabhya pravartate tat pratyakṣapūrvakaṃ bhaviṣyatīty ata āha -- pravartate{1,242}ceti. yo
GSP28mimsvtku:3951: 'pi dāhādiḥ śaktyādyarthāpatter nimittaṃ so 'pi yāvat katham idaṃ kadācit kāryam akasmāj jātam iti na vikalpyate, na tāvadarthāpatter nimittaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3953: api ca yatra deśāntaraprāptyā sūryasya gatim anumāya gatisādhanaṃ liṅgy anumīyate, tatra kathaṃ pratyakṣapūrvakatvam ity āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:3954: yatra ceti. liṅgaṃ sūryagatyādīti sambandhaḥ. liṅgi tu gatisādhanam atra darśayitavyam iti pratyakṣapūrvakatve ca gṛhītagrāhitvād anumānādīnām aprāmāṇyaṃ prasajyata ity āha -- pratyakṣeti. nanv anyadā pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:3955: bhavati, anyadā cānumānādīni pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyantīty ata āha -- tair
GSP28mimsvtku:3956: yadeti. yady anumānādipravṛttikāle na pratyakṣaṃ pravartate, tadā so 'rtho
GSP28mimsvtku:3958: pratyakṣāvagativelāyāṃ tu gṛhītagrāhitvenāpramāṇam ity uktam eveti || 91
GSP28mimsvtku:3959: athocyeta -- na brūmaḥ prameyam evānumānādīnāṃ pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyata iti pratyakṣapūrvakatvam. api tu liṅgāder anyatarasyādau pratyakṣeṇa jñānāt, tad idam āśaṅkate -- atha kasyacid iti. sarvasya hi jātamātrasya prathamaṃ kiñcit pratyakṣaṃ, tato 'numānādīti sadṛśaṃ tatpūrvakatvam iti. etad api dūṣayati -- tadeti. atra hi bhaviṣyaṃś caiṣo
GSP28mimsvtku:3961: kāraṇam uktam. tan na prāpnotīty arthaḥ || 92 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3962: kim iti na syād ata āha -- vartamāna iti. evaṃ hi manyate --
GSP28mimsvtku:3963: pramāṇāntarāvedyatāsiddhyarthaṃ hi dharmasya pratyakṣatvaṃ vinivāryate, na punaḥ pratyakṣamātreṇa{1,243}nivāritena kiṇcit prayojanam. tāvatāpi codanaiveti pratijñāyā asiddheḥ. tad yadi kvacid eva pratyakṣeṇa gṛhīte
GSP28mimsvtku:3964: 'numānādīni pravartanta itīdṛśaṃ tatpūrvakatvam anumānādīnāṃ, tadā pratyakṣeṇa vartamāna eva kvacid arthe vijñāte anumānenāvidhyamāna eva
GSP28mimsvtku:3965: dharmo 'vagamyate. evaṃ pramāṇāntarair api. tataś ca bhaviṣyattvena
GSP28mimsvtku:3966: pratyakṣāgrahaṇam akiñcitkaram eva syāt. yadi pratyakṣaviṣaya eva tāni pravartanta itīdṛśaṃ tatpūrvakatvaṃ bhavati, tadā pratyakṣāviṣaye tāny api na pravartanta iti pramāṇāntarāvedyatā sidhyati. codanaiveti ca pratijñātārthaḥ. liṅgād iti pradarśanamātram. tair anumānādibhir ity
GSP28mimsvtku:3970: evaṃ dūṣitam anyeṣāṃ matena samarthayate -- kecid iti. kiṃ nāmedam ata āha -- tatpūrveti. evaṃ hi manyate -- nātra tatpūrvakatvaṃ pramāṇāntarāṇām animittatve hetur ucyate, kin tu pratyakṣānimittatve
GSP28mimsvtku:3971: pratipādite yat tāvat tatpūrvakatayā prāmāṇyasambhāvanam anumānādīnāṃ, tat tāvan nāstīty etad anena bhāṣyeṇoktam iti || 95 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:3972: atra cānumānādyanimittatve hetvanabhidhānād aparituṣyan samādhānāntaram āha -- pratyakṣeṇeti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:3973: pratyakṣadṛṣṭagocarāṇy evānumānādīni. tathā hi -- nāgṛhīte 'gnau dhūmasya tadvyāptir avadhārayituṃ śakyata iti dhūmadṛśāpi nāgnir anumīyata eva.
