GSP28mimsvtku:4644: pravṛttiviṣayavyāpāraphalavattā(dhya)vasāyaḥ. śabdas tv acetano nāsmin pravartayaty api puruṣārthaphalapratilambhaḥ. na hi prabalapavanābhihato
GSP28mimsvtku:4645: 'vaṭe nipatat phalaṃ pratilabhate. api ca pramāṇaṃ śabdaḥ. pramāṇānāṃ prameyopadarśanād anyatra vyāpāraḥ. pratyakṣaṃ hi rūpādīn upadarśayati na tu pravartayati. tredhā hi prāmāṇikāḥ pramāṇaphalaṃ vibhajante. hānam upādānam upekṣā ceti. tad idaṃ pramāṇānāṃ pravartakatve nopapadyate. tadā hy upādānam evaikaṃ pramāṇaphalam āpadyeta. kaṇṭakapratyakṣeṇa hi kaṇṭakeṣu pravartyamāno jihāsann api tān{2,8}mṛdnīyāt. syād etat --
GSP28mimsvtku:4646: śabdapramāṇadharmo 'yaṃ na pramāṇāntarāṇām iti. na, pramāṇatvāviśeṣāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:4647: evaṃ hi prayogo bhavati. śabdo na pravartakaḥ pramāṇatvāt pratyakṣādivat.
GSP28mimsvtku:4648: astu vā pravartakaḥ. niyamena .......pravṛttiprasaṅgaḥ. na ca liṅādiśrāviṇo niyamena pravartamānā dṛśyante. prathamaśrutād apravṛtteḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4649: aviditasamayatvād apravṛttir iti cet, kim idānīṃ sambandhasaṃvidapekṣayā
GSP28mimsvtku:4650: yadi śabdaḥ pravṛtteḥ kārakaḥ. na hi kārakāṇi svarūpasaṃvidam apy apekṣante. (prāg eva samayasaṃvidaṃ?) mṛtsalilapracchannaṃ hi bījam
GSP28mimsvtku:4651: aviditasvarūpasāmarthyam api svakāryam aṅkuram ārabhamāṇaṃ dṛṣṭam. evam eva śabdavyāpāro vidhir ity api nirasanīyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4652: syān matam -- abhidheya eva liṅādīnāṃ vyāpāro vidhiḥ. ato na pūrvoktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ iti. na, anirūpaṇāt. sa khalu preṣaṇādilakṣaṇo vā
GSP28mimsvtku:4653: syād, anyo vā. na tāvad preṣaṇādilakṣaṇaḥ śabde sambhavati. acetanatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:4655: kārīṣasya hi vahneḥ śītāpanodano 'dhyayane dṛṣṭa(?mu/u)pakāraḥ. na śabde tathā sambhavati. pramāṇāntarābhāvāt. śabdasya
GSP28mimsvtku:4656: cāgṛhītasambandhasyāpratyāyakatvāt. yadi brūyād vyāpārāntarakalpane syād ayaṃ doṣaḥ, kḷpta eva tu liṅādīnām abhidhābhidhānalakṣaṇo vyāpāraḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4657: śabdāntarāṇām iva svārthaprakāśanānyathānupapattipramāṇakaḥ pravṛttihetutvapratilabdhapravartanāparanāmā vidhir iti pratibrūyād enam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4658: sa khalu vyāpārabhedo 'bhidheyo vā syād anabhidheyo vā syāt. anabhidheye
GSP28mimsvtku:4660: evānumānena svārthagocaro vyāpāra unnīyate. na ca tathāvagataḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4661: pravṛttihetubhāva......pārāḥ pravartayantīti ced, viśeṣahetur vācyaḥ. yady arthaviśeṣagocaratā viśeṣahetuḥ, sa tarhy arthabhedo vidhiḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4663: tasyā vartamānāpadeśeṣv apy aviśeṣāt. anyaś cet nainam upalabhāmahe
GSP28mimsvtku:4664: pramāṇābhāvāt. abhidhīyata eva liṅādibhir ātmīyam abhidhānam iti cet.
GSP28mimsvtku:4665: ..........sarvaśabdebhyaḥ pravṛttiprasaṅgaḥ śakyate vārayitum. na ca kāryonneyam abhidhānam abhidhīyata iti sāmpratam. ananyalabhyaṃ hi śabdābhidheyam upāgaman dhīrāḥ. kiñ ca yadi vyāpārasvarūpābhidhānaṃ sa ................pravartakatvaprasaṅgaḥ. sopaśleṣo viśeṣa iti ced, na.
GSP28mimsvtku:4666: svarūpābhidhānaprasakteḥ. na hy anabhidhāya viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyābhidhānaṃ sambhavati. api{2,9}cābhidhābhidhānābhyupagamena
GSP28mimsvtku:4667: abhāvāt. astu tarhy arthabhedo vidhiḥ. kaḥ. kāryam. kiṃ punaḥ kāryam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4668: kāryam eva hi kāryam. na hīdaṃ rūpāntareṇānubhūyate. nanu na kriyātireki
GSP28mimsvtku:4669: kāryaṃ pramāṇāntarair avagamyate. satyam. ata eva śabdaprāmāṇyasiddhiḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4670: anyathā pramāṇāntaragocaratvena sāpekṣatvād aprāmāṇyaṃ codanāyāḥ. api ca kālatrayaviparivṛttyarthagocarāṇi mānāntarāṇi. kāryaṃ ca parāmṛṣṭakālabhedaṃ svapramāṇād avagamyata iti na pramāṇāntaragocaraḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4671: kārakavyāpāro hi yāgādiḥ kālatrayāvacchedyo nādhikāraḥ. yady evam asatkāryaṃ kālatrayāparāmarśāt śaśaviṣāṇavad āpadyeta. na. kālenānekāntāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:4672: kālo hi na tāvat kālāntaraparicchinnaḥ. na ca nāsti kālaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4673: kālāntarāvacchede tv anavasthāpātaḥ. alabdhakālāntarasambandho 'pi kālaḥ pramāṇasāmarthyād astīti cet. samānaṃ hi kārye 'pi. tad api svapramāṇebhyo
GSP28mimsvtku:4674: liṅādiśabdebhyaḥ kālānavacchinnam avagamyamānaṃ katham asad bhaviṣyati.
GSP28mimsvtku:4675: pramāṇasambandho hi sattā, na kālasambandhaḥ. kāryam eva tu manasi vartamānaṃ niyuṅkta iti niyoga ity ucyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:4676: nanu niyogo niyuktiḥ. sa ca niyoktṛvyāpāraḥ. na ca vede niyoktāsti
GSP28mimsvtku:4677: apauruṣeyatvāt. śabdasya cāniyoktṛtvān na tadvyāpāro niyogaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4678: adūraviprakarṣeṇa tu niyogādipadaprayogaḥ. yāthātmyavedanāyāṃ tu liṅ eva
GSP28mimsvtku:4679: paṭhitavyaḥ. sā hy asya pramāṇam. kim ātmakas tarhy ayam. uktaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4680: kāryātmeti. na ca dravyādyanātmakatvād abhāvaḥ, tadvad eva kāryam api tadvibhaktam eva deśakālanarāvasthāntarāviparyayāt svasaṃvitsaṃvedyaṃ nāstīti śakyate 'vagantum. udīyate khalv api liṅādiśrāviṇāṃ kāryasaṃvit.
GSP28mimsvtku:4681: na ceyam anālambanā, na ca svāṃśālambaneti vijñānavāde varṇitam. ato nirviṣayā saṃvidātmānam alabhamānā svaviṣayabhūtaṃ kāryam upakalpayati. na ca pratibhāmātram idam iti vācyam. aniyatanimittā hi pratipattiḥ pratibhā.
GSP28mimsvtku:4682: na ceyam aniyatanimittā, śabdanimittatvāt tadanantaram utpatteḥ. katham ananyagocare kāryātmani vyutpattiḥ. tadabhāve vā śabdāt pratipattiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4684: yadaviditasama(?yā/yā a)pi svārthaṃ gamayanti. athavā sarvasyākumāramāsthaviraṃ ca kāryāvagatiḥ pravṛttihetur iti
GSP28mimsvtku:4686: upalabhyākalayati nūnam itaḥ sakāśād asya kāryasaṃvidāsīt katham aparathā pravartata iti. nanv evaṃ kriyām eva kāryatayā ajñāsīd iti parasyāpi tadgocarām eva kāryadhiyam unnayati. na. vartamānāpadeśeṣu saty api
GSP28mimsvtku:4688: pravṛttāvahetutvāt. etad eva phale 'pi darśayitavyam. ato nirmuktākhilaphalādivikalpam avyabhicaritapravṛttisambandhaṃ kāryamātraṃ liṅādibhyaḥ prayojyavṛddhenāvagatam iti vyutpadyamāno jānāti. na hi kāryāvagatir bhavati pravṛttiś ca neti sambhavati. ataḥ kāryam eva
GSP28mimsvtku:4689: kāryavidhir ity ācāryāḥ pratipedire. nanu ca preṣaṇādayo liṅarthāḥ. na,
GSP28mimsvtku:4690: svasantāne pravṛttihetutvena teṣām anupalabdheḥ. vede ca vyabhicārāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:4691: (nanu tar)hīṣṭābhyupāyatā liṅādīnām artho bhaviṣyati. sarvo hi samīhitopāyam ākalayya tatra tatra pravartata iti param api ceṣṭamānam
GSP28mimsvtku:4692: upalabhya jānāti nūnam iṣṭo .......mavyāpāraḥ śabdaśravaṇānantaraṃ cāyaṃ ceṣṭata iti śabdeneṣṭābhyupāyatā pratipāditā bhavati. sa eva vidhiḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4693: pravartanārūpo hi saḥ. pravṛttihetuṃ dharmaṃ ca pravadanti ...... . ataḥ preṣaṇādhyeṣaṇābhyanujñātiriktam
GSP28mimsvtku:4694: niyojyārthakarmagocaraṃ lokavedasādhāraṇaṃ codanopadeśaparyāyapadavācyaṃ liṅādīnām artho vidhir iti yuktam. hi ........tya jaimininoktam upadeśa iti. bhāṣyakāreṇa ca upadeśa iti viśiṣṭasya śabdasyoccāraṇam iti vivṛtam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4695: puruṣārthopāyaṃ kilānavagatam avagamayan śabdāntare dūram utkrṣṭo liṅādiśabdo 'viśiṣṭa ity uktam. ato lokavedatantrāntarānugato 'yam eva siddhānta iti kaiś cid unnītam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4696: tad idam anupapannam. tathā hi -- saṃvid eva tāvat
GSP28mimsvtku:4697: paripanthinī. na hi liṅādiśravaṇasamanantaram iṣṭābhyupāyo 'yaṃ vyāpāra iti bhavati matiḥ. api tarhi, pravartanāvagatiḥ. nanu ceṣṭābhyupāyataiva pravartanā pravṛttihetutvāt. tan na. evaṃ sati yasya parṇamayī juhūr bhavati ity atrāpi vidhitvaprasaṅgaḥ. tarati mṛtyum ity atrāpi. bhavati hi tatrāpi parṇamayatā apāpaślokaśravaṇasya aśvamedho vā brahmahatyātaraṇasya
GSP28mimsvtku:4698: sādhanam iti pratipattiḥ. yadi matam -- asyedaṃ bhavatīty anvayamātram
GSP28mimsvtku:4699: atrāvagamyate na vyatirekaḥ, na ca tam antareṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:4701: yajetety atrāpi svargayāgayoḥ sādhyasādhanasaṃvit. na hi tatrāpi sati yoge svargo bhavati asati neti matiḥ. yāgeneti hi tṛtīyā sādhanabhāvam avagamayatīti ced, na. tṛtīyāśravaṇāt. vidher ayaṃ mahimā yadatṛtīyānto
GSP28mimsvtku:4702: 'pi yajiḥ karaṇatayā nirdiśyate. sa ced anyo nābhyupagamyate kathaṃ svabhāvasādhyo yajiḥ karaṇatayā nirdiśyate. api ca yatra spaṣṭam iṣṭābhyupāyatvam avagamyate yāgasya yatheṣṭābhyupāyo 'yaṃ yāgaḥ yāgena svargaḥ sidhyatīti vā, tatrāpi vidhitvaprasaṅgaḥ. kiñ ca taddveṣīti
GSP28mimsvtku:4703: tatkāri cāyam evaṃ bruvāṇo dṛśyate. tathā hi pratibhā vidhir iti nirasyataitad uktaṃ -
GSP28mimsvtku:4706: iti. tad idaṃ tavāpi samānam iti varṇitam. api ca evaṃvādinā sādhu samarthitaṃ vidhāv anāśrite iti. atra hi vidhyadhīnā yāgāder iṣṭābhyupāyatā na tu saiva vidhir iti darśayati. tasmād atikuśalair upadeśāpadeśayor aviśeṣa evopapādita iti nirmuktākhilopādhividhitattvam atīndriyam anyadeveti pūrvoktam eva sādhīyaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4708: sādhyasādhanasambandhasiddhiḥ. niyogo hi tadā sādhyaḥ. na ca sādhyadvayam
GSP28mimsvtku:4709: ekatra samavaiti, samatvād asambandhāt. nanu niyogasiddhināntarīyakī svargasiddhiḥ. ata eva sādhyavivṛddhir iyaṃ na tu svargo 'pi svatantratayā
GSP28mimsvtku:4710: sādhyaḥ. nirapekṣaṃ ca sādhyadvayam ekatra virudhyate, nānuguṇam. yathāha
GSP28mimsvtku:4711: -- niyogasiddhau sarvaṃ tadanuguṇam iti. kena neṣyate. tasmād avirodha iti. tad asat. kiṃ hi svargasiddhim antareṇa niyogasya na sidhyati. na hi nityādhikāreṣu niyogaḥ sādhyāntaram ākāṅkṣati. kāmādhikārāḥ kāmyaparyantā iti cet, ko hetuḥ. kamisādhyatvāgavatiḥ. tathā hi svargakāmo yajeteti sādhyasvargaviśiṣṭādhikārisādhyo niyogo 'vagamyate. sa katham asidhyati
GSP28mimsvtku:4712: svarge sidhyet. ataḥ svargasiddhir avagamyata iti naḥ sādhyasvargaviśiṣṭo
GSP28mimsvtku:4714: puruṣo niyogaṃ sādhayiṣyati. anyadicchato 'nyatra kriyā nopapadyata iti
GSP28mimsvtku:4715: ced, na. niyogasāmarthyād upapatteḥ. niyogo hi pradhānabhūtaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4716: sādhyatayāvagataḥ svargam api kāmayamānam ātmany ākarṣatīti kim
GSP28mimsvtku:4717: anupapannam. api ca sidhyann api svargo yāgāt sidhyatīti na naḥ pramāṇam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4718: svargayāgau hi yugapadaruṇaikahāyanīvadekapradhānakāryānvayinau nānyonyānvayam anubhavataḥ. na cāruṇimna iva dravyāvachedaśaktir yajer api
GSP28mimsvtku:4719: svargasādhanaśaktir avadhṛtā pramāṇāntareṇa. nanu kim atra pramāṇāntareṇa.
GSP28mimsvtku:4720: svarge yāga eva pramāṇam. sa hi svargakāmaṃ yāge niyuṅkte. na cākāmopāye kāmī niyoktuṃ śakyate. uktottaram idam. kiṃ hi bhagavato
GSP28mimsvtku:4722: pravartayati. tasya hy anupāye kāminaṃ niyuñjānasya kim iva hīyeta. yāge niyogo niyuṅkte iti vadatā nūnam idam avadhīritam. ārambhe hi puruṣo
GSP28mimsvtku:4723: niyujyate na karmaṇīti. tasmān na svargayāgayoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4724: sādhyasādhanasambandhasiddhiḥ. yad api ca kriyādikārye vyabhicārād anupādhike vyutpattir ity uktaṃ, tadayuktam. pratītaviṣayatvād vyutpatteḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4725: na hi kriyādivyabhicārāt śaśaviṣāṇaṃ liṅādyartha iti śakyate vaktum. yad api manyate kriyākārya eva loke vyutpannaḥ phalasamabhivyāhārād vede
GSP28mimsvtku:4726: 'nyadavināśi kāryaṃ liṅādyartha iti pratyeṣyate. loke tu saṃmugdhenāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:4727: vyavahārasiddher na śabdārthatattvanirūpaṇam. bahava eva gauṇalākṣaṇikaśabdanibandhanā loke vyavahārā dṛśyante. vede tu svargakāmo
GSP28mimsvtku:4728: yajeteti kriyātmanaḥ kāryasya bhaṅguratvād āmuṣmikasvargādiphalasādhanāśakteḥ kālāntarasthāyikriyāto bhinnaṃ kāryam upeyate. vākyaśeṣāc caikatra samunnītaḥ śabdārtho yavavarāhādyarthavadanyatrāsaty api vākyaśeṣe 'vagamyate. nityādhikāreṣv asaty api phalapadasamabhivyāhāre tathāvidham eva kāryaṃ liṅādīnām artho
GSP28mimsvtku:4729: bhaviṣyatīti. tad idam anyad evābhyastam anyac copanipatitam. kriyākārye
GSP28mimsvtku:4730: (viṣpanna?) sthāyikāryaṃ pratipadyate. na ca kriyāyāḥ phalasādhanatāśakter aśabdārthaḥ san yuktaḥ kalpayitum. kāmaṃ karmaṇa evāphalaniṣpatteḥ samasti rūpam iti kalpayitum ucitam. na ca pūrvāvagataśabdārthānyathākaraṇam. na hi karmaṇy anuśiṣṭā dvitīyā saktuṣu tadasambhavād viparivartya karaṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:4731: abhidhatta iti yuktam abhidhātum. sarvaśabdeṣv anāśvāsapraṅgāt. ata
GSP28mimsvtku:4732: eva{2,13}tatra tatra yathāśrutārthasamanvayānupapatteḥ kvacid guṇavādaḥ kvacillakṣaṇā kvacid viniyogabhaṅga iti tantre vyavahāraḥ. na tu viniyogabhaṅgād abhidhānam eva śabdānām anyathā nīyate. api ca śrutakarmaphalasambandhānupapatter anavagatapūrvam apūrvaṃ kāryaṃ liṅartham upayatā sādhu śrutam upapāditam. kiṃ hi liṅāparāddhaṃ yat tasyālaukikam artham atikramya karmaphalasambandha upapādyate. nanu nādyāpi liṅartho niścīyate. ayam eva hi nirṇayasamayaḥ. atra ca śrutaphalapadāntarasamabhivyāhāropapattaye 'tīndriyam eva kāryam iti
GSP28mimsvtku:4733: niścīyate. ato na kiñcid virotsyata iti. kim idānīṃ svargakāmo yajeteti śruter apratītir eva, liṅarthe saṃśayo vā. apratītau kriyātmanaḥ kāryasya
GSP28mimsvtku:4734: phalasambandhānupapattir ity etad eva durbhaṇam. saṃśayas tu pakṣadvayāvalambī. na cālaukike kriyātirekiṇi kārye liṅādayo nirūpitaprayogāḥ. na cātyantāparidṛṣṭāpūrvārthagocaraḥ saṃśayo dṛṣṭacaraḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4735: yavādiṣu tv āryamlecchaprayoganibandhano dṛṣṭapūrvārthagocaraḥ saṃśayo yukta eva. ata evātra na vākyaśeṣān nirṇayaḥ. sandigdhe hi sa varṇitaḥ. na ca liṅarthe saṃśayaḥ. kin tu loke vyutpattyanusāreṇa kriyātmany eva kārye
GSP28mimsvtku:4736: niścayaḥ. yad apy ucyate karmaphalasambandhopapattaye 'nyat kāryam upalabhyata iti. kena vā karmaphalasambandho darśitaḥ. na hy ayaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4737: vainiyogikaḥ. niyoga evātra pramāṇam. sa cet tadadhīnasiddhiḥ duruttaram
GSP28mimsvtku:4738: itaretarāśrayam, siddho hi niyogo viṣayībhūtasya bhāvārthasya karaṇatām
GSP28mimsvtku:4739: āha. tatsiddhyā ca niyogātmalābha ity alam anenāpi.
GSP28mimsvtku:4741: bhāvārthādhikaraṇe uktaṃ liṅādiśabdānāṃ puruṣaṃ prati prayojakavyāpāro
GSP28mimsvtku:4742: 'bhidhātmikā bhāvanā vidhir iti. dve kila bhāvane mīmāṃsakāḥ saṅgirante śabdātmikām arthātmikāṃ ca. tatrārthātmikā sarvākhyātasādhāraṇī svargādiphaladharmikā yāgādidhātvarthakaraṇikā svavākyaprakaraṇānyaprakaraṇānārabhyavādasmṛtilokācāraprāptatattad iti kartavyatāvatī tatra tatra sidhyati. śabdātmikā tu liṅādiśabdānāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4743: prayojakānāṃ prayojyapuruṣakarmikābhidhāsambandhajñānakāraṇikārthavādoditaprāśastyeti kartavyatāvatīti vivecanīyam. kathaṃ punarabhidhā śabdātmikā. śabdavyāpāro hi saḥ. na. vyāpāratadvator anatibhedād upapatteḥ. dravyam{2,14}eva hi pūrvāvasthātaḥ pracyutaṃ parām avasthām aprāptaṃ pūrvāparībhūtaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4744: vyāpāraśabdavācyam. kathaṃ liṅādīnām abhidhā puruṣakarmikā. na hi te
GSP28mimsvtku:4745: puruṣam abhidadhati bhāvanāvacanatvāt. satyam. bhāvanaiva tair abhidhīyamānā na svarūpamātreṇa vartamānāpadeśavad abhidhīyate. kin tu kuryād (iti) pravṛttiviṣayatayā. na ca śabdaśaktayo 'nuyoktum arhanti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4746: tathā hi -- liṅādiśravaṇānantaraṃ prayojyavṛddhaṃ ceṣṭamānam upalabhya tataḥ pravṛttihetupratyayaḥ prayojyasyāvagamyata iti tāvat
GSP28mimsvtku:4747: sarvavādisiddham avivādam. pravṛttihetusvarūpe tu bahudhā vivādaḥ. tatra kriyāphalādīnāṃ vyabhicārād apravṛttihetutvāt, pramāṇāntarāgocare tu pravṛttihetau vyutpattyasambhavāt, karmaphalasambandhānupapatteś ca sakaletaraprakārāsambhavād avivādasiddham abhidheyapratyayabalonnīyamānasvarūpaṃ liṅādīnām abhidhānam eva pravṛttihetur iti sāmpratam. sā ca pravartaneti sthitam. sā ca pravartyakarmikā. pravartyaś ca puruṣa iti yuktaṃ puruṣakarmatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:4749: puruṣaṃ ca pravartayan pravartaneti gīyate. na ca sarvābhidhāsu prasaṅgaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4750: śabdaśaktivaicitryād ity uktam. śaktir hi kāryadarśanasamadhigamyā. tad yataḥ pravṛttidarśanaṃ tadvyāpāraḥ pravartanā, pravṛttihetutvāt. na ca śabdāntarebhyaḥ pravṛttir upalabhyata iti na tadabhidhāyās
GSP28mimsvtku:4751: tathātvaprasaṅgaḥ. yaś cābhidhāyā anabhidhāne doṣaḥ uktaḥ, so
GSP28mimsvtku:4753: anabhidhānatvam uktaṃ tad apy ayuktam. kiṃ hi kāryam anupapadyamānaṃ pravartanām avagamayati. na tāvad bhāvanāvagatiḥ, vartamānāpadeśeṣv api prasaṅgāt. ato 'nanyapramāṇatvād upapannam abhidheyatvam abhidhāyāḥ. yat tu ananyapramāṇake vyutpattyasambhava ity uktam. na,
GSP28mimsvtku:4755: abhidhāyā rūpam unnīyate. na ca tāvanmātraṃ pravartanā laḍādibhyo 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:4756: pravṛttisaṃvedanaprasaṅgāt. asādhāraṇas tu ko 'pi viśeṣo liṅpravṛtteḥ pramāṇāntarāgocara eveti duṣpariharo vyutpattivirahaḥ. maivam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4757: pravṛttihetutvenārthāpattitas tadavagamāt. tathā hi -- yatra tāvat liṅādibhyaḥ pravṛttir upalabhyate, tatra mayā pravartitavyam ity antaḥsaṅkalpamūlātmā liṅpravṛttiviśeṣa unnīyate. apravartamānā api pravartasveti māmayamāheti liṅśrāviṇo vaktāraṃ nirdiśanti. tad avasīyate pravṛttihetur abhihito liṅā. sa ca narte vāpārāt sidhyatīty uktam eva. na ca kim ātmako liṅvyāpāra{2,15}iti vācyam. antaḥsaṅkalpamūlātmā hy asāv iti
GSP28mimsvtku:4758: vakṣyati. nāsāv udāsīnaḥ kadācid avagamyate. pravṛttijanana eva hi
GSP28mimsvtku:4759: bhāvabhede vyutpattir āsīd iti svayam api pravartitavyam iti pratipadyamāna eva hi liṅarthaṃ pratipadyate. nodāsīnam ākhyātāntaravat.
GSP28mimsvtku:4760: no hi phalādayaḥ svarūpeṇāvagatāḥ pravartayanti. asya tvayam evātmā yat pravṛttidhiyaṃ janayati. aparyanuyojyatvād vastusvarūpāṇāṃ nāmākhyātavibhāgavadupapatteḥ. so 'yam evamātmani liṅarthe vyutpannaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4761: svapratipattikāle na śabdādṛte tam arthaṃ budhyata ity
GSP28mimsvtku:4762: ananyapramāṇakatvam. na tu pravartanāsvarūpam evānyato nāvagataṃ, yena matāntaravad vyutpattivirahaś codyeta. samprati tu na jāter iva vyaktim
GSP28mimsvtku:4763: anyataḥ pravartanāṃ pratipadyāmaha iti śābdīm abhidadhmahe. na cābhidhā nābhidhīyata iti vācyam. abhidhāśabdavadupapatteḥ. yad eva hi
GSP28mimsvtku:4765: tathā ca liṅādīnām abhidhānam iti kiṃ nābhidhīyate. uktaṃ hi liṅādibhyaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4766: pravṛttiheturupalabhyata iti. na ca liṅādīnām abhidhātmano vyāpārād anyaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4767: pravṛttihetuḥ śakyate nirūpayitum iti. ata eva nānavasthā. na hi pravartanāvat tadabhidhānam api śabdād avagamyate, yat tadgocaram aparam
GSP28mimsvtku:4768: abhidhānam upeyate. na ca liṅādisvarūpābhidhānaprasaktiḥ, svayam eva tadvyāpāravailakṣaṇyāt. liṅupaśleṣe hi viśeṣake viśeṣaṇābhidhānam
GSP28mimsvtku:4769: āpāditam. svagate tu viśeṣe tadanavakāśam eva. sarve śabdavyāpārāḥ khalv
GSP28mimsvtku:4770: api svarūpeṇaiva vyatibhidyante. ata eva vilakṣaṇābhidheyapratyayahetubhāvabhājaḥ ekasyā api vidhivibhakteḥ kriyākālādivannābhidhābhidhānam anupapannam. ato liṅādīnām abhidhā
GSP28mimsvtku:4772: abhidhāṃ bhāvanām āhur anyām eva liṅādayaḥ |
GSP28mimsvtku:4773: iti. tad anenaivamātmanā vidhinā sambaddhā bhāvanā pravṛttiviṣayatayāvagatā phalavattayā niścīyate, svasantāne phalavataḥ pravṛttiviṣayatayāvagateḥ. tathā cāvagatānuṣṭhīyata iti vidhiśaktim upakrāntām avasīdantīm uttabhnāti phalavattā, na tu saiva vidhir iti. ata evāpuruṣārtheṣu sāgaraṃ tared ity evamādiṣu vidhyavagatiḥ. tathā tatra na
GSP28mimsvtku:4774: syād itarathā tatra na syāt apuruṣārthatvāt(?). liṅvyāpāras tu tatrāpy
GSP28mimsvtku:4775: aviśiṣṭaḥ, nirvāhikāyās tu phalavattāyāḥ pramāṇābhāvād na{2,16}nirvahati.
GSP28mimsvtku:4776: tadabhāvaś cānāptavākyatvāt. vede tv apauruṣeyatvān na puruṣadoṣāśaṅkāpīty upapāditam. vidhau tu tam atikramyeti prapañcitaś ca vidhir api manāg ity uparamyate iti || 15 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4778: svapratyayeti. anāptavākye hi dṛṣṭavyabhicāritvāt tajjanitāt pratyayāt pratyayāntaraṃ svīyam arthāvadhāraṇāyāpekṣate. na ca tatrāpy anāptavacaḥ pramāṇam anuvādatvāt. āptoktīnāṃ tu pramāṇaviṣayagocarāṇāṃ prāmāṇyāt tasyaivāptasya narasyāpekṣā kim ayam artho 'nena pramāṇenopalabdho na veti. na ceyam ubhayy apy apekṣā codanāṃsu sambhavati, apauruṣeyatvasya vedādhikaraṇe vakṣyamāṇatvāt. tata upapannaṃ codanāyāḥ prāmāṇyam iti || 16
GSP28mimsvtku:4779: atrānantaraṃ vṛttikāramatārambhabhāṣyaṃ - vṛttiāras tv anyathemaṃ granthaṃ varṇayāñ cakāra tasya nimittaparīṣṭiḥ ityevamādim iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4780: tatrādiśabde tāvad dvaividhye sādhvasādhuvivekārtham āha -- ādiśabda iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4781: makārānto 'yamādiśabdaḥ na luṅanta iti. kāraṇam āha -- likīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4782: sāmānyavivakṣāyāṃ tu napuṃsakaliṅgatā. atra ca prathamam eva granthātmake viśeṣe 'vagate na sāmānyavivakṣā yukteti. bhittvā tu vākyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4783: sāmānyavivakṣāyāṃ kleśo bhavatīti. aparam api vṛttikāramatena
GSP28mimsvtku:4784: parīṣṭisūtravyākhyānārthaṃ bhāṣyaṃ na parīkṣitavyaṃ nimittam iti. tad
GSP28mimsvtku:4785: ayuktam. sūtre naño 'śrutatvāt, ata āha -- nañ iti. idaṃ hi sūtraṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4787: prasiddhasyadharmanimittasya parīkṣāvidher ayogyatvād iti vyākhyāte tu nañadhyāhāreṇa parīṣṭisūtre pratyakṣasūtram avatārayituṃ bhāṣyakṛtoktaṃ -
GSP28mimsvtku:4788: nanu vyabhicārāt parīkṣitavyaṃ nimittaṃ śuktikā hi rajatavat prakāśate yataḥ iti. evaṃ hy atra{2,17}paricoditaṃ - na prasiddhatvaṃ nimittāparīkṣāyāṃ hetuḥ, prasiddhatarasya pratyakṣasya śuktirajatavedane
GSP28mimsvtku:4789: vyabhicārād iti. tad ayuktaṃ, na hi pratyakṣaṃ vyabhicarati api tarhi
GSP28mimsvtku:4790: tadābhāsam. na cābhāsavyabhicāre pramāṇavyabhicāraparicodanā yujyate. ata āha -- saṅkarād iti. pratyakṣatadābhāsayor akṣajatvena sādṛśyān mohād ābhāsavyabhicāre 'pi pratyakṣavyabhicāraṃ codayatīti || 17 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4793: codayati. etat paricodanottaratayā pratyakṣasūtram upavarṇitaṃ naitad evam. yat pratyakṣaṃ na tad vyabhicarati. yad vyabhicarati na tat
GSP28mimsvtku:4794: pratyakṣam. kiṃ tarhi pratyakṣam. tatsamprayoge puruṣasyendriyāṇāṃ buddhijanma satpratyakṣam. yadviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ tenendriyāṇāṃ puruṣasya samprayoge yad buddhijanma tat satpratyakṣam. na cedṛśasya vyabhicāro
GSP28mimsvtku:4795: 'sti. tad idaṃ vārttikakāro darśayati -- naitad iti. parīṣṭisūtreṇāparīkṣā pratijñātā pratyakṣasūtreṇopapādyopasaṃhṛteti kathaṃ punar evaṃlakṣaṇake 'parīkṣā sidhyatīty ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:4796: tatreti. tatra hi pratyakṣalakṣaṇe. yad anevaṃlakṣaṇakaṃ tad ayathārtham.
GSP28mimsvtku:4797: pratyakṣaṃ tu yathārtham eva. ayathārthāśaṅkā tu parīkṣāyāṃ hetur iti yuktam aparīkṣyatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:4798: kiṃ punar ayathārthajñānam. śuktau rajatam iti. sā khalu doṣavaśād anyākāreṇāvabhāsata iti bhavati tadgocarajñānam ayathārtham. tad idam ayuktam. na hi śuktī rajatam iti bhāsate. kiṃ tarhi idam iti śuktirajatasādharaṇātmanā purovarti dravyaṃ gṛhyate. anantaraṃ ca sadṛśadarśanodbodhitaprācīnarajatānubhavaprabhāvitabhāvanābījajanmā doṣavaśāl luptatadavamarśā rajatam iti smṛtir udeti. tad ete dve eva grahaṇasmaraṇātmake vijñāne. tadgocarayoś ca doṣavaśād eva
GSP28mimsvtku:4799: bhedakadharmānavadhāraṇam. bhedāgrahaṇād eva vibhramavyavahāraḥ, na punar anyasyānyathābhāsanāt. idam iha bhāsata iti pratītisākṣikam. ataḥ kathaṃ rajatarūparūpitasya śuktir ālambanam. idam eva hy ālambanasyālambanatvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4800: yadātmākārajñānajananam.{2,18}ato nātadākārasya tadālambanam iti jñānam eva sākāram iti balād āpatitam. na khalu rajatam iti śukter ākāraḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4801: rajataṃ tu nāsannihitam akṣajajñānālambanam iti yuktam. ato bāhyarahitaṃ nirālambanam eva jñānam iti balād āpannam. evañ ca mudhaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:4803: doṣāś ca svakārye śaktivighātahetavaḥ. ato yuktaṃ tadvaśena
GSP28mimsvtku:4804: bhedakadharmānavadhāraṇaṃ, na punar anyasyānyathā bhānam. api ca evam ayaṃ viparītakhyātivādī vaktavyaḥ rajatadhiyaḥ śuktigocarāyāḥ kiṃ nibandhanam
GSP28mimsvtku:4805: iti. na tāvad indriyaṃ prāpyakāritvād, asannihitarajataprāptyasambhavāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:4807: anupanyasanīyam. ato grahaṇakāraṇābhāvāt smṛtir iyam iti niścīyate. asti hi smṛteḥ kāraṇaṃ pūrvānubhavaprabhāvitobhayavādisiddhā bhāvanā. nanv asati tatparāmarśe smaraṇam api nopapannam. na nopapannam. anubhūtaviṣayaṃ hi jñānaṃ smṛtiḥ. na tad iti parāmarśaḥ. tasmād idaṃ rajatam iti grahaṇasmaraṇayor ubhayor api yathārthatvād yathārthāyathārthajñānavibhāgo
GSP28mimsvtku:4809: atra vadāmaḥ -- yadi dve apy ete yathārthe, na tarhi bhrāntiḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4810: ayathārthajñānaṃ bhrāntir iti laukikā manyante. smarāmīty agraho bhrāntir
GSP28mimsvtku:4811: iti cet. tan na. bhāṣyakāro hi sa evāsamīcīnaḥ pratyaya iti pratyayam asamīcīnaṃ darśayati. api ca ko 'yam agrahaḥ. grahaṇābhāva iti cet. abhāvo nāma na kaścid āyuṣmatāṃ yo bhrāntir ity ucyate. nanu smaraṇam eva
GSP28mimsvtku:4812: smarāmīty ullekhaśūnyam agrahaṇam ācakṣmahe na tattvāntaram. evaṃ tarhi rajatam iti smṛtir bhrāntiḥ. na ca tad yuktam. mithyā bhrāntir iti
GSP28mimsvtku:4814: pūrvānubhūtadeśakālāgraho bhrāntir iti cet. na. anyānavabhāso
GSP28mimsvtku:4816: bhāsamāne sarvaṃ bhāsate. ato yady api rajatasya deśakālau na smaryete,
GSP28mimsvtku:4817: rajataṃ tu yathāvasthitaṃ smṛtyā viṣayīkṛtam iti na bhrāntiḥ. atha sāpekṣatvāt smṛter aprāmāṇyam, ato bhrāntir iti cet. yady evaṃ sarvasmṛtīnāṃ bhrāntitvāpātaḥ, aviśeṣāt. na ca smaran bhrāmyatīty ucyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:4818: atha mataṃ - gṛhyamāṇasmaryamāṇayor vivekāgraho bhrāntir iti, uktam asmābhiḥ nāgraho nāma kaścidṛte grahaṇasmaraṇābhyām. tayoś ca na grahaṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4819: bhramaḥ, pramāṇatvāt. na ca{2,19}smṛtiḥ. vyabhicārād atiprasaṅgāc ca.
GSP28mimsvtku:4820: vivekāgrahe ca vibhrame sarvasaṃvidāṃ bhrāntitvaprasaṅgaḥ. avaśyaṃ hi yena
GSP28mimsvtku:4821: kenacid viveko na gṛhyate. syān mataṃ - vyavahāravisaṃvādo mithyātvam iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:4822: tan na. taddhetor abhāvāt. yadi khalv idam iti grahaṇaṃ rajatam iti deśakālānavacchinnaṃ rajatasmaraṇaṃ, ko vyavahārahetuḥ. no khalu rajatapadād anadhiṣṭhānaṃ rajataṃ smaran rajatam iti vyavaharaty atredam iti tadvidvān. yo yadarthī sa tadupāditsayā ceṣṭate. anadhiṣṭhānaṃ tu rajataṃ jānato na vyavahārahetum upalabhāmahe. api ca ko 'yaṃ niyamaḥ smṛtarajatas tadarthī śuktāv eva pravartata iti. yadi hy ayaṃ tām eva rajataṃ jānīyāt, tatas tatra pravartata iti yuktam. itarathā loṣṭādāv api
GSP28mimsvtku:4823: pravarteta. na hy ayaṃ śukter iva rajataṃ tato 'pi vivinakti. avaśyaṃ sthūlo 'pi viveko jighṛ(?kṣi/kṣa)to nānubhūyate. athocyeta -- jñānadvayam apy etad vivekāgrahaṇāt satyarajatasaṃvido bhinnam iti nāvabhāsate. sā ca vyavahārahetutayāvagatā. tato 'trāpi pravartata iti. aho durūham idam
GSP28mimsvtku:4824: ūhitam. idaṃ tu brūmaḥ -- kim iha satyarajatasaṃvido viveko nāvabhāsate,
GSP28mimsvtku:4825: tadabhedo vā bhāsate iti. pūrvasmin kalpe pūrvavat pravṛttyabhāvaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4826: uttarasmin viparītakhyātivādaḥ. saṃvittī bhinne abhinne bhāsete vastunī ceti na viśeṣaḥ. atha satyarajatabodhatulyatāṃ manyate na tattvaṃ, na tarhi tadvadbhāve tadvyavahāraḥ. na hi gavā sadṛśaṃ gavayaṃ jānan gaur ayam iti vyavaharati. vyavahāravisaṃvāde ca bhrāntihetāv atadarthino vyavahārābhāvād bhrāntyabhāvaḥ. tasyāpi śabdaprayogo 'stīti ced, na.
GSP28mimsvtku:4827: nirvikalpakabhrāntau tadadarśanāt. svatantrasmṛtaṃ ca rajatam aprasaktaṃ kathaṃ śuktau niṣidhyate nedam iti. prāptipūrvako hi pratiṣedho bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:4828: sa katham asatyāṃ prāptāvātmānaṃ labhate. nanu nātra kiñcid bādhyate. kin tv anavagato viveko 'vagamyate nedaṃ rajatam iti. ko 'rthaḥ. śukter viviktaṃ rajatam iti. aho vyākhyānakauśalaṃ tatrabhavatāṃ yat saṃvido 'py
GSP28mimsvtku:4829: anyathā vyavasthitā anyathā vyākhyāyante. rajatavyavahāro bādhyata iti
GSP28mimsvtku:4830: ced, na. tasyāpy aprasakter uktatvāt. aprasaktavyavahārasya
GSP28mimsvtku:4831: bādhavirahaprasaṅgāt. vyavahārabādho 'pi na rājājñayā. api tarhi,
GSP28mimsvtku:4832: prasaktatādrūpyanivāraṇena. ato 'nyad anyākāreṇa prasaktaṃ bādhyata iti
GSP28mimsvtku:4833: sāmpratam. api ca spaṣṭīkṛtā tādrūpyaprasaktir idaṃ rajatam iti. nanv anālambanatā prāpnotīty uktam. satyam. yad anyathāsantam anyathā
GSP28mimsvtku:4834: pratipadyate tannirālambanaṃ jñānam{2,20}iṣyate. kim ihādbhutaṃ bāhyānālambanatā hi yatnato naḥ pratiṣedhyā, sarvatra
GSP28mimsvtku:4836: utpādayatīti cet. kim ayaṃ pratyakṣadharmaḥ sarvajñāneṣv āropyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:4837: pratyakṣaṃ hi sannihitavartamānagocaraṃ, na jñānāntarāṇi. na cedaṃ pratyakṣam ābhāsatvāt. yad apy uktaṃ - katham anyasamprayuktam indriyam
GSP28mimsvtku:4838: anyākārasya jñānasya hetur iti. uktam atra bhāṣye -- doṣo mithyājñānasya kāraṇam iti. tadbhāve hi mithyājñānaṃ bhavati. asati tasmin samyagjñānadarśanāt. nanu doṣāḥ kāryaṃ vighnanti, na kāryāntaraṃ janayanti. na. svapne manodoṣād avartamānasyāpi vartamānavad bhānāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:4839: kāraṇādhīnātmalābhaṃ hi kāryaṃ taddoṣe duṣyatīti nānupapannam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4840: eṣa ca jñānasya doṣo yady anyagocarasyānyākāratvam. ataḥ sannihitam asannihitarajatākāreṇāvalambate duṣṭakāraṇajaṃ jñānam ity ubhayālambanasya jñānālambanatvam. ātmendriyamanorthasannikarṣo hi jñānasya hetuḥ. so
GSP28mimsvtku:4841: 'satsu doṣeṣu samyagjñānahetuḥ, satsu tu viparītajñānahetur iti sūkto yathārthāyathārthajñānavibhāga iti. kiṃ punaḥ pratyakṣasya lakṣaṇaṃ yena tad yathārtham ata āha -- yadābhāsam iti. yadākāraṃ jñānaṃ tenendriyāṇāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4842: samprayoge yat puruṣasya buddhijanma tat pratyakṣam iṣyate. kathaṃ tadayathārthaṃ bhaviṣyatīti nanu lakṣaṇaparatve sūtrasyātiprasaktir uktā. na cāpy etena
GSP28mimsvtku:4843: sūtreṇa pratyakṣaṃ lakṣyata iti vadatā katham idānīṃ lakṣaṇaparatayā sūtraṃ varṇyate. ata āha -- sampūrṇeti. yathāvasthitaṃ sūtram ābhāsasaṅkarād alakṣaṇam. vṛttikāramate tu vyatyastaṃ śaknoti lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣayitum iti, kathaṃ punaḥ sampūrṇam ata āha -- tatsator iti. yathāśrute hi sūtre indriyasamprayogajatvamātraṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇam. tac cābhāse 'py
GSP28mimsvtku:4844: aviśiṣṭam ity atiprasajyate. vyatyastena tu tadā buddhyākāraparāmarśanād bhāsamānākārendriyasamprayoge yā buddhiḥ sā pratyakṣam ity upaskāre śuktirajatajñāne bhāsamānendriyasamprayogābhāvān na pratyakṣam atiprasajyata iti. utkṛṣṭasya sacchabdasyārtham āha -- śobhanārtha iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4846: vyākhyātaḥ. katham idānīṃ śobhanārtha ity ucyate. yuktaṃ ca samprayogaviśeṣaṇam. aviśiṣṭe hi tasminn anāgatādisamprayogajaṃ yogipratyakṣam anirākṛtaṃ syād iti prāg evoktam. tadvṛttenāpi vyavahitapraṭhitena samāso duṣpratipādataraḥ. punar api cedṛśaṃ yat tatsamyakpratyakṣam iti tadapekṣā vidyata eveti vyatyaye 'parituṣyan
GSP28mimsvtku:4847: prakārāntaram āha -- yadveti. dvayor api tatsator atrādhyāhāraḥ. tatra bhāsamānākāraparāmarśārtho 'dhyāhṛtas tacchabdaḥ. paras tu pratyakṣarūpaparāmarśārthaḥ. sacchabdas tu samprayogasannidhipaṭhitas
GSP28mimsvtku:4848: tadviśeṣārtha eva. adhyāhṛtas tu śobhanārtha iti vivecanīyam iti || 20 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4849: nanu ca ābhāsalakṣaṇākathanān na pratyakṣatadābhāsaviveko darśayituṃ śakyate, ata āha - arthāpattyeti. īdṛśaṃ pratyakṣam ityukte
GSP28mimsvtku:4850: arthād anīdṛśam ābhāsaṃ bhavatīti. atra bhāṣyakāreṇa kathaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4851: tadatadyogajatvaviveko 'vagamyata ity āśaṅkyoktaṃ bādhakaṃ hi yatra jñānam
GSP28mimsvtku:4852: utpadyate naitad evam iti tadanyasamprayoge. viparītas tatsamprayoge iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4853: tad ayuktam. kiṃ hi kāraṇaṃ yaduttareṇa pūrvaṃ bādhyate, pūrveṇaiva jaghanyam uttaraṃ bādhyata iti yuktam ata āha -- bādhaketi. tad dhi bādhakaṃ yadanyābādhakam ātmānam eva na labhate. tathācottaram. atas tat pūrvaṃ bādhata iti yuktam. jaghanyam api pūrvānapekṣaṃ balavad iti ṣaṣṭhe
GSP28mimsvtku:4854: vakṣyate. yatra pūrvāpekṣam uttaraṃ, tatra pūrvaṃ balavad iti tṛtīya uktam
GSP28mimsvtku:4856: kiṃ punaruttareṇa mithyā sataḥ pūrvasya bādhaḥ pramāṇasya vā.
GSP28mimsvtku:4857: pramāṇasya bādhe 'tiprasaṅgaḥ. mithyātvaṃ tu narte bādhāt sidhyati,
GSP28mimsvtku:4858: tadadhīno bādha iti itaretarāśrayam ata āha -- sa ceti. na khalu pūrvamithyātvāvadhāraṇād uttarasya janma, api tarhi. tannirapekṣam uttaraṃ svakāraṇād evotpannam. ato notpattāv anyāpekṣatvam. na ca kāryakḷptau.
GSP28mimsvtku:4860: ato nānyonyāśrayatvam iti. yadi tarhi pūrvānapekṣam uttaram iti tad
GSP28mimsvtku:4861: bādhakaṃ, pūrvaṃ vā kim uttaram apekṣate yena bādhyate.{2,22}tad api hi nirapekṣam eva, ata āha -- na ceti. yady api taduttarānapekṣaṃ, tathāpy anāgatottarabādhakātmakatvenānavabhāsān na bādhakam iti || 22 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4862: yatra tarhi naitad evam iti na bādhakodayaḥ, api tarhi nimittedāṣajñānaṃ, tatretaretarāśrayam aparihāryam. nimittadoṣeṇa tatrotthāpyo bādhaḥ. sa ca pūrvāpramāṇatve śakyata utthāpayituṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4863: tadutthāpanāc ca tadapramāṇam iti nāvakalpate, ata āha -- nimitteti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4864: prāyeṇa hi śaṅkhādiṣu pītādivibhramāḥ pittādidoṣebhyaḥ samutpannāḥ paścād
GSP28mimsvtku:4865: bādhyante. nedaṃ pītaṃ śuklo 'yam iti hi sampratipattiḥ sambhavati. ato na tatra nimittadoṣabodhamātrān mithyātvam. yatra tu jñāte 'pi nimittadoṣe tadrūpapratyayānuvṛtteḥ paścād abādhanam eva, yathā diṅmūḍhasya jānato 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:4866: nimittadoṣād diṅmoho na nivartate. tatrāpi narāntaraviparyayād anyataḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4868: yatra tarhi na narāntarādiṣu viparyayaḥ tatra kathaṃ yathā jātyādivijñāne. na ca tat satyaṃ, teṣāṃ vyatirekāvyatirekavikalpākṣamatvād ata āha -- sarveṣām iti. yad dhi deśāntarādiṣu na viparyeti tadabādhyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4869: samyag eveti. nanu tatrāpy anupapatter bādhikā dhīr utpādyā, kathaṃ samyaktvam ata āha -- na hīti. pratyakṣo hy avikalakaraṇasya piṇḍāt piṇḍāntareṣu pūrvarūpāvamarśaḥ. sa kathaṃ yauktikena bādhena bādhyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:4870: yasya hy avyutpadyamānasya balavatā mukhaṃ nirudhyate na tadātmānaṃ labhate. uktaṃ ca svayūthyair api -- na pratyakṣaviruddhakāraṇaviṣayam anumānam ātmānaṃ labhate agnāv iva śaityānumānam iti || 24 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4871: ayam asāv itaretarāśrayasya vyakto viṣaya ity āha -- jātyādiṣv
GSP28mimsvtku:4872: iti. atra hi jātyādijñānamithyātvād bādhakabuddhyudayaḥ. tadudaye
GSP28mimsvtku:4873: tanmithyātvam. na ca vyaktoditā śuktirajatajñānādiṣv iva bādhikā dhīr
GSP28mimsvtku:4874: astīti.{2,23} yadi tarhi bādhakajñānam antareṇa na kāraṇadoṣamātrān
GSP28mimsvtku:4875: mithyātvam avagamyate, katham ucyate yasya ca duṣṭaṃ karaṇaṃ yatra ca mithyeti pratyaya iti bhedena. tadā hi mithyātvapratyaya evāsamīcīnatāyāṃ hetur uktaḥ syāt. tasmād vaktavyo viṣayaḥ. sa ucyate -- yena tarhi prāg
GSP28mimsvtku:4876: ekaś candro 'vadhāritaḥ sampratyaṅgulīnipīḍitalocano dvau paśyati. tasya prācīnajñānānusāreṇa jātavicikitsasyādhunā ca vyaktaṃ kāraṇadoṣam
GSP28mimsvtku:4877: avagatavato bhavati nirṇayaḥ. yathā pūrvajñānam aduṣṭakāraṇajam. idaṃ ca vyaktāvagatakāraṇadoṣaprabhavam. kāraṇadoṣaniyataś ca kāryadoṣaḥ. tasmād
GSP28mimsvtku:4878: asamīcīnam. tad iha pūrvānubhavo vicikitsodayahetuḥ. kāraṇadoṣāvadhāraṇād eva mithyātvāvadhāraṇam. evaṃ bāhyāgamānām api kāraṇadoṣāvadhāraṇād eva mithyātvāvadhāraṇam. na hi tadarthāḥ sākṣād bādhyante. pauruṣeyatvāt kāraṇadoṣāśaṅkayaiva mithyātvaṃ bhavatīti yuktam eva dvaividhyam nanu mā bādhi jātyādijñānam. pramāṇatvaṃ tu tasya kathaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4879: pramāṇatadābhāsasādhāraṇaṃ hi jñānatvam. ato vyabhicāradarśanāt saṃśayo
GSP28mimsvtku:4880: yuktaḥ. vṛttyādivikalpāś cāprāmāṇyam anāpādayanto 'pi tadvat prāmāṇyaṃ vighnanti. ata āha -- svata iti. yadi jñānatvānubandhinī pramāṇatvāpramāṇatve dve api syātāṃ, syād evānirṇayaḥ. svatas tu pramāṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:4881: ity upapāditam. ato jātyādyastitvabodhād anapodito nirṇayo yuktaḥ. sa cāyaṃ bodho na param asmākam eva. ye 'pi tu jātyādīn apalapanti, teṣām apy asti. te 'pi hi na tadbodham anapalapanto jātyādīn apalapitum arhantīti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4883: {2,24} atra bhāṣyakāreṇa nanu sarva eva nirālambanaḥ svapnavat pratyayaḥ ityākṣepapurassaraṃ jāgrato hi buddhiḥ supariniścitā kathaṃ viparyasiṣyatīti bāhyārthasadbhāvaḥ pratipāditaḥ. tasya prakṛtavedārthavicāropayogaṃ darśayati -- pramāṇatveti caturbhiḥ. sarvo hy ayaṃ mīmāṃsāprapañco bāhyārthāśraya eva. yathā tāvaccodanaiva dharme
GSP28mimsvtku:4885: tadasati bāhye codanāpadārthe duḥsthitam eva. pramāṇatvopanyāsenaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:4887: apramāṇatvopanyāsena ca pratyakṣasūtranirdiṣṭānyāpramāṇatvakāraṇopādānam iti darśayitavyam. tathā yad api codanāsūtra eva śrutyārthena ca puṇyapāpāparanāmnor dharmādharmayoḥ svarūpaṃ pratijñātaṃ, tad api nāsati
GSP28mimsvtku:4888: bāhye 'rthe śakyaṃ darśayitum. tatra hi vidhiniṣedhātmakacodanāpramāṇakaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4889: puṇyapāpayoḥ svarūpam iti varṇitam. ādiśabdena puṇyapāpobhayarūparahitam aśubhebhyo nivartanam upādatte. yadarthasādhanaṃ vastu tadviparītaṃ vā tat puṇyapāpapadayor aspadam. aśubhebhyo nivartanaṃ tu na sukhāya na
GSP28mimsvtku:4891: pratipāditam. tatphalam iti ca trividhasya puṇyapāpodāsīnātmano vedaprameyasyeṣṭāniṣṭātmakaṃ phalam upādatte. etad api svarūpapratijñāntargatam eva. na hy anāśritaphalasambandhaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4892: dharmādisvarūpam anubhavituṃ śakyam iti. tad evaṃ{2,25}tāvad
GSP28mimsvtku:4893: bāhyārthasiddher asti prathamapādoktasamastopayogaḥ. tathā vakṣyamāṇopayogo 'pi. na hi vidhyarthavādamantrāṇāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4894: sādhyasādhanasambandhavidhividheyastutuvihitasmṛtirūpārthā arthavādapādagocarā bāhyārthaṃ vinā sidhyanti. audumbarādhikaraṇe hi audumbaro yūpo bhavaty ūrjoparudhyā ity atra vidhyabhāvān na phalapadasmbandhaḥ sidhyaty audumbaratvasyeti vakṣyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:4895: tathārthavādādhikaraṇe 'rthavādānāṃ stutyupayogo darśitaḥ. evaṃ hi tatroktam āmnāyasya kriyārthatvādānarthakyam atadarthānām (1.2.1) iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4896: asyārthaḥ -- yāni hi kriyāṃ kriyāsambaddhaṃ vā kiñcidarthaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4897: pratipādayanti, tāni santu pramāṇam. yāni tv akriyārthāni so 'rodīd
GSP28mimsvtku:4898: yadarodīd ityādīni tāni na kañciddharmaṃ pramimate iti pūrvapakṣite uktaṃ vidhinā tv ekavākyatvāt stutyarthena vidhīnāṃ syuḥ (1.2.7) iti. asyāyam arthaḥ -- vidheyānāṃ stutirūpeṇārthenārthavādāḥ pramāṇaṃ syur iti. kathaṃ punaḥ stutyarthatā. na hy anapekṣitā stutir arthavādānām artho bhavitum
GSP28mimsvtku:4899: arhati. na. apekṣitatvāt. apekṣyate khalv api śabdabhāvanāparanāmadheyena vidhinā stutiḥ. sa hi puruṣaṃ pravartayan pravṛttiviṣayaprāśastyajñānam apekṣate. arthavādāś ca svādhyāyavidhyadhyāpitās
GSP28mimsvtku:4900: tadbalenaivāprayojanasampado na paryavasyanti. tatraiva kiṃ kartavyam ity apekṣite tacchaktinirūpaṇāyām akṣaragrahaṇādikrameṇa kathañcit prarocanāyāṃ buddhāv utpannāyāṃ tatkāryatvam arthavādānāṃ niścīyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:4901: vidhir hi prarocanām apekṣate, te ca tāṃ śaknuvanti kathañcidutpādayitum ity ananyaprayojanatayā manasi viparivartamānāsta eva tatprayojanatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:4902: niścīyante. tad eṣa śāstrārtho bhavaty arthavādair eva prarocitaṃ karmābhyudayāya ghaṭata iti. vidhisvarūpaṃ ca prāg evoktam iti neha
GSP28mimsvtku:4903: pratanyate. mantrārtho 'pi mantrādhikaraṇe vakṣyate. tatra barhirdevasadanaṃ dāmītyādimantrānudāhṛtya vicāritaṃ - kim amī uccāraṇamātrādevādṛṣṭārthāḥ, utārthaprakāśanārthā iti. tatra tadarthaśāstrāt (1.2.31) ityādyupapattibhir adṛṣṭārthatayā pūrvapakṣitaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4904: yam eva hy arthaṃ mantraḥ prakāśayati tatraivāyaṃ brāhmaṇena viniyujyamāno
GSP28mimsvtku:4905: dṛśyate. yathā prathamamantraḥ uru prathasveti puroḍāśaṃ prathayatīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4906: yadi cāyam arthaparaḥ, liṅgenaiva tatra viniyoge siddhe
GSP28mimsvtku:4908: abhihitam -- aviśiṣṭas tu{2,26}vākyārthaḥ (1.2.40) iti. yathā hi brāhmaṇavākyānām arthaḥ pratīyamāno nāvivakṣito bhavati tathā mantrāṇām
GSP28mimsvtku:4909: api. te 'pi hy anuṣṭhānaupayikam arthaṃ prakāśayantaḥ kim avivakṣitavacanā
GSP28mimsvtku:4912: mantrāś cārthavādavad eva svādhyāyādhyayanavidhibalapratilabdhādhyayanasaṃskārasambandhāt kiṃsvid asmābhiḥ kartavyam ity apekṣamāṇā vilambante. tatrāśaktike viniyogāsambhavāt tacchaktinirīkṣaṇāyāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4916: iti. yat tu viniyogānarthakyam uktaṃ, tan na. arthavādārthatvād vākyasya.
GSP28mimsvtku:4917: prathanaṃ hi tatra śrūyate. īdṛśam idaṃ prathanaṃ praśastaṃ yat kriyamāṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:4918: anena mantreṇa kriyata iti. so 'yaṃ vidhyarthavādamantrāṇām artho nāsati
GSP28mimsvtku:4919: bāhye 'rthe sidhyati. tathā udbhidā yajeta paśukāmaḥ ity udāhṛtya
GSP28mimsvtku:4920: vicāritaṃ kim ayaṃ guṇavidhiḥ uta karmanām adheyam iti saṃśayya,
GSP28mimsvtku:4921: pravṛttiviśeṣakaratayā guṇavidhir iti pūrvapakṣitam. guṇaṃ hi vidadhatāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4922: pravṛttiviśeṣakaratvam. itarathā nāmamātram anarthakam. śaknuvanti codbhedanakriyāyogavaśena kiñcit khanitrādyartham abhidhātum iti
GSP28mimsvtku:4923: guṇavidhaya iti prāpte uktaṃ - na guṇavidhayaḥ. karmasamānādhikaraṇā hy ete, tṛtīyānirdeśāt. karma khalv iha udbhidā yajeta paśukāmaḥ iti paśubhāvanākaraṇatvenābhihitaṃ yajeta paśukāma iti. kim uktaṃ, yāgena paśūn bhāvayed iti. ata udbhidā yāgeneti vyaktam eva sāmānādhikaraṇyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4924: guṇavidhau tu yāgasyodbhittvābhāvād udbhidvatā yāgeneti matvarthalakṣaṇayā sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ syāt. tatra ca lakṣaṇaiva doṣaḥ. nanv evaṃ vrīhibhir
GSP28mimsvtku:4925: yajetety evamādāv api bhāvanākaraṇena yajinā samabhivyāhṛtā vrīhyādiśabdāḥ karmanām adheyatāṃ pratipadyeran. na. teṣāṃ nirūḍhārthatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:4926: ajñātasandigdhārthasya hi padasya prasiddhasāmānādhikaraṇyād evārtho niścīyate. nirūḍhaṃ tu svārthān na pracyāvayituṃ śakyate. āha ca --
GSP28mimsvtku:4928: nirṇīyate nirūḍhaṃ tu na svārthād apanīyate ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4929: {2,27}iti. ataḥ paśūnām udbhedanaṃ prakāśanam anena karmaṇā kriyate iti yogād udbhicchabdena karmābhidhīyate. guṇaphalasambandhavidhānenāmnātānām apy upayogo 'stīti nānarthakyam. ataḥ siddhaṃ karmanām
GSP28mimsvtku:4930: adheyatayaivañjātīyakānāṃ kriyopayoga iti. citrādiśabdānāṃ nāmadheyatvahetavo vistarabhayān nānukramyante. kvacit karmaṇaḥ prāpakaśabdāntarābhāvād guṇavidhitvam eva. yathā āgneyo 'ṣṭākapāla ity āgneya iti saguṇakarmavidhāyinaḥ śabdasya. na hi tatra
GSP28mimsvtku:4931: dravyadevatāsambandhavidhānāt prāk karmaṇo rūpam avagamyate yasyāgneyaśabdo nāmadheyaṃ bhaved ityevamādi nāmadheyapādoktam ādiśabdenānukrāntaṃ veditavyam adhyāyāntam. yāvatsmṛtipādoktārtho 'py
GSP28mimsvtku:4935: aśrūyamāṇavedānaṣṭakādīn udāhṛtya teṣāṃ dharmādharmatvasaṃśaye, dharmasya śabdamūlatvādaśabdam anapekṣyaṃ syāt (1.3.1.) iti pakṣaṃ parigṛhya
GSP28mimsvtku:4936: vedamūlatayā siddhāntitaṃ - sarvāḥ smṛtayo hi nāsati pūrvajñāne ātmānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4937: labhante. pūrvajñānaṃ ca mūlabhūtaṃ vibhramo vā syāt, pratyakṣānubhavo vā,
GSP28mimsvtku:4938: pauruṣeyāgamajanyaṃ vā, vipralambho vā, codanājanitaṃ vā. tatra tāvad bhrāmyatām āptānāṃ manvādīnāṃ smṛtinibandhanapraṇayanam ayuktam. te hi tāvad ṛṣayo bhrāmyantīty etad eva durbhaṇam. bhrāmyatāṃ tu yanmahāprabandharacanaṃ tat smṛtibhyaś cādyayāvadāryaiḥ paśyadbhiḥ pari(?graha/gṛhyate) iti naitad utprekṣitum api śakyam. anubhavaś cātīndriyagocaraḥ pratyakṣasūtre nirākṛtaḥ. puruṣavākyam apy asambhavanmūlam apramāṇam eva. vipralambho 'pi bhrāntivannirākāryaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4939: codanā tu sambhavadvedasaṃyogināṃ traivarṇikānāṃ smṛtimūlaṃ bhavatīti tatkalpanaiva laghīyasīti. nanv evam agnihotrādicodanāvadaṣṭakādicodanā
GSP28mimsvtku:4940: api kiṃ nopalabhyante. nedam anupapannam. viprakīrṇānekaśākhāśrayā hi śrutayaḥ kratupuruṣārthopadeśasaṅkīrṇāḥ pramādyadbhir adyatanair na vivicyopalabhyanta iti kiṃ nopapadyante. ato yad aśrūyamāṇam apy aṣṭakādidharmasya nimittaṃ codaneti siddham aṣṭakādayo dharmā iti. tad evaṃ pratyakṣaśrutyaviruddhābhyaḥ śrutyanumānam. pratyakṣaśrutivirodhe tu na śrutir anumātuṃ śakyata iti virodhādhikaraṇe{2,28}uktam. upariṣṭāc cācāraprāmāṇyaṃ smṛtyā ca saha balābalaparīkṣetyādi darśayitavyam. sarveṣu ca bhedādilakṣaṇeṣu svapramāṇagaṇaiḥ śabdāntarādibhiḥ siddhāntasthiti(?ḥ/r) sati bāhye 'rthe na sambhavati. somena yajeta dākṣiṇāni juhoti hiraṇyamātreyāya dadātīti yāgahomadānabhāvanānāṃ śabdabhedād eva bhedo vakṣyate. tathā ca samidho yajatītyevamādīnāṃ pañcānāṃ prayājānām asaty api śabdabhede 'bhyāsānarthakyaprasaṅgād bhedo
GSP28mimsvtku:4941: darśitaḥ. tisra āhutīr juhotīti pṛthaktvaniveśitvāt saṃkhyāyā āhutīnāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4942: bhedo darśitaḥ. athaiṣa jyotir etena yajeteti jyotiṣṭomāj jyotir iti saṃjñāntareṇa karmabhedaḥ. vaiśvadevyām ikṣā vājibhyo vājinam iti ca
GSP28mimsvtku:4943: utpattiśiṣṭaśrautām ikṣāvirodhād vājinaṃ vaiśvadeve karmaṇi niveśam alabhamānaṃ svāśrayaṃ yāgāntaram upakalpayati. so 'yaṃ vājinaguṇād bhedaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4944: kuṇḍapāyināmayane māsam agnihotraṃ juhotīti naiyamikāgnihotrāt prakaraṇāntareṇa kauṇḍapāyinahomasya bhedaḥ. tad evaṃ ṣoḍhā karmabhedo
GSP28mimsvtku:4946: tṛtīye tu pārārthyalakṣaṇasya śeṣatvasya ṣoḍhaiva viniyogasiddhir uktā. yathā tāvadaruṇimnaḥ tṛtīyāśrutyā kriyāṅgabhāve sāmānyato 'vagate aruṇayā krīṇātīti kriyāviśeṣalābho vākyāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:4947: liṅgaviniyogas tu -- yathāprakaraṇāmnānasāmarthyāvadhṛtasāmānyāṅgabhāvasya bahirmantrasya sāmarthyāparanāmno liṅgād barhirlavane viniyogaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4948: prakaraṇaviniyogas tu -- iṣṭiprakaraṇāmnātānāṃ prayājādīnāṃ sādhyākāṅkṣiṇām upakārākāṅkṣiṇyā tayā saha sambandhaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4949: ubhayākāṅkṣālakṣaṇam eva hi prakaraṇam ācakṣmahe. kramaviniyogas tu --
GSP28mimsvtku:4950: prākṛtopakāranirākāṅkṣāyāṃ vikṛtau sannidhisamāmnātānām aṅgānām. na hi tatra prakaraṇaviniyogaḥ sambhavati. ubhayagāminī hy ākāṅkṣā prakaraṇam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4951: anākāṅkṣā ceha vikṛtiḥ prākṛtopakāradvārapariprāptapadārthapariṣvaktā vaikṛtam eva tv aṅgānāṃ sannihitasamāmnānam anarthakaṃ mā bhūd iti tatsannidhipāṭhād eva teṣāṃ tatra viniyogo niścīyate. samākhyāviniyogas tu -- ādhvaryavasamākhyāteṣu padārtheṣv adhvaryor anenāmī kartavyā iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4952: caturthe 'pi śrutyādibhir evāvadhṛtāṅgāṅgibhāvānāṃ dadhyānayanām ikṣādīnāṃ prayojyaprayojakatve vakṣyete. yad dhi śrutyādibhir yaccheṣatayāvagamyate tat tena{2,29}prayujyata iti sthāpitam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4953: tad iha prayuktilakṣaṇe 'pi śrutyādir eva pramāṇagaṇaḥ, śeṣalakṣaṇe 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:4954: śeṣiṇāṃ śeṣāṇām ubhayeṣāṃ vā kramaniyamaḥ kiñcinmātraviśeṣabhinnaśrutyādibhir eva kriyate. yathā tāvad adhvaryur
GSP28mimsvtku:4955: gṛhapatiṃ dīkṣayitvā brahmāṇaṃ dīkṣayati iti ktvāśrutyā kramaniyamaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4956: agnihotraṃ juhoti yavāgūṃ pacati iti pāṭhād anyādṛśe 'pi krame
GSP28mimsvtku:4958: kriyamāṇo 'narthakaḥ syāt. homo 'pi nāsati haviṣi saṃ(pra)vartata ity arthāt pākottarakālam eva niścīyate. tad idaṃ liṅgam evārtha iti nāmamātrabhinnaṃ, sāmarthyam eva hi bhāvānāṃ liṅgam iti niścīyate. ihāpi dravyakriyayoḥ śaktinirīkṣaṇād eva kramaniyamāvadhāraṇam. pañcānāṃ tu prayājādīnāṃ samidho yajatītyevamādīnāṃ pāṭhāt kramaniyamaḥ. bahūnāṃ hi padārthānāṃ yugapadekena kartrānuṣṭhātum aśakter avaśyambhāvini krame
GSP28mimsvtku:4959: 'vagamādhīnatvād anuṣṭhānasya krameṇa tūcyamāneṣu tathaivāvagamād anuṣṭhāne kramāpekṣāyāṃ sa eva kramo niścīyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:4961: sthānenaiva kramaniyamaḥ. sthānāt kramaniyamo yathā -- sādyaske karmaṇi saha paśūnālabhate ity agnīṣomīyasavanīyānubandhyānāṃ savanīyasthāne sahopalambhe codite kaḥ prathamaṃ prayujyatām ity apekṣāyāṃ sthānāt savanīyo buddho bhavan prathamaṃ niyamyate. tasya tadanuṣṭhānasthānam. so
GSP28mimsvtku:4966: iti. pravṛttyā ca kramaniyamo yathā -- saptadaśa prājāpatyān paśūnālabhate
GSP28mimsvtku:4967: iti coditeṣu paśuṣu codakaprāptānāṃ prokṣaṇādīnāṃ yatrakvacid ekasminn ekasyānuṣṭhāne dvitīyādiṣu kiṃ prathamapravṛttyaiva athāniyama iti saṃśaye niyamakāraṇābhāvāt prathamapravṛtteś cāniyamātmakatvād aniyamaḥ iti pakṣaṃ parigṛhya prathamapravṛttyaiva niyamo darśitaḥ. prayogavacanabalena hi paśūnāṃ yaugapadyam avadhāritam. tac cāvarjanīyād vilambanān na vyavadhānāntaram aṅgānām anujānīte. sāṅgeṣu hi paśuṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:4970: bhavati. tatra ca vaiṣamyakāraṇābhāvāt sarveṣāṃ sadṛśam evāṅgavyavadhānam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4971: prathamapadārthakartrānuṣṭhite tadaivāṅgāntarānuṣṭhānāya tenaiva pradhānena codyamāne kartari prayogavacanapramāṇakayaugapadyabalena paśvantarair ākṛṣyamāṇe tatpadārthamātrasya paśvantareṣv anuṣṭhānaṃ sa paśuḥ pratīkṣate. tadante ca dvitīyapadārthānuṣṭhānāya kartāram ākarṣati.
GSP28mimsvtku:4972: evaṃ saptadaśānāṃ paśūnāṃ ṣoḍaśabhir ekaikasya vyavadhānaṃ vidhyanumatam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4973: vyavadhānaviśeṣas tu viśeṣāgrahaṇān nāśrayituṃ śakyam. ato dvitīyādīnām apy anuṣṭhānaṃ tata evārabhyeti siddhāntāt kramaniyamaḥ. ayaṃ ca prakaraṇāntargata evākāṅkṣaikapramāṇakatvād ekaiko 'pi paśur avyavadhānena padārthānuṣṭhānam ākṣipati. padārthaś ca tatsannidhāvātmano 'nuṣṭhānam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4974: ata ubhayākāṅkṣayā kramaniyamo jāyamānaḥ prākaraṇiko bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:4975: mukhyakrameṇa cāṃśānāṃ kramaniyamo yathā -- sārasvatau bhavata iti
GSP28mimsvtku:4977: 'ṅgeṣu kramāpekṣāyāṃ mukhyakrameṇaiva kramo niyamyate. na hy aṅgānāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4978: pradhānakālād bahirbhāvo 'sti. sāṅgaṃ pradhānam aikaśabdyād iti vakṣyati.
GSP28mimsvtku:4979: so 'yaṃ vākyenaiva kramaniyamaḥ. sāṅgaṃ hi pradhānam ekavākyacoditam ekopakramāvasānam iti pradhānakrameṇaivāṅgānāṃ kramaniyamo jāyate. atrāpi śrutyādir eva pramāṇagaṇaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4980: evamadhikāravicārādāv api śeṣaśeṣiprapañcārthatvāt śeṣalakṣaṇoktāny eva śrutyādīni siddhāntasthitihetutayā
GSP28mimsvtku:4981: yathā tāvadādya eva svargakāmo yajeteti yāgasvargayoḥ kaḥ śeṣaḥ ko vā śeṣīti cintāyāṃ dravyāṇāṃ karmasaṃyoge guṇatvenābhisambandhaḥ (6.1.1) iti svargasya yāgaśeṣatayā liṅgabalena pūrvapakṣaḥ parigṛhītaḥ. tad dhi bhūtasya dravyasya sāmarthyaṃ yad bhāvyaṃ karma niṣpādayati. dravyaṃ ca svarhaḥ, srakcandanavāsassu tatprayogāt sūkṣmāṇi vāsāṃsi svarga iti yathā.
GSP28mimsvtku:4982: ato dravyam eva karmārthaṃ, kāmapadasambandhaś ca sādhanaviṣayatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:4983: darśayitavyaḥ. yo hi yadarthī sa tatsādhanam api kāmayata eveti liṅgabalena pūrvapakṣite vidhiśrutibalāt siddhāntitam. vidhir hi cetanapravartanātmakaḥ. na cānarthe puruṣaḥ pravartayituṃ śakyate iti
GSP28mimsvtku:4984: yāgārthe svarge karmāsādhakam āpadyate. yathoktam asādhakaṃ tu tādarthyāt
GSP28mimsvtku:4985: (6.1.2) iti. ato vidheḥ pravartanāśaktir mā vyāghānīti karmaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:4987: prītivacanatvāvagamāt. tad eva hi dravyam aprītikaraṃ na
GSP28mimsvtku:4988: svargaśabdenopacaranto dṛśyante iti prītyanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvāt svargapadaṃ tadvacanam iti niścīyate. na ca sarvasyeṣṭatamā prītir anyaniṣpattaye bhavatīti sāmpratam. ato yad eva kiñcit prītyā samabhivyāhṛtaṃ tat tadartham eveti liṅgam api viparītam. ataḥ siddhaṃ yāgaḥ svargārtha iti siddhaś cādhikāra iti. parastād api śeṣabhūtasyaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:4991: uttaraṣaṭke tu śeṣā eva kiṃ sarvatropadeśenaiva sambadhyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:4992: atha yathā prakṛti vyavatiṣṭhanta iti śrutyādibalenaiva nirṇeṣyante.
GSP28mimsvtku:4993: aupadeśike hi dharmasambandhe nātideśaḥ sidhyati, pāriplavā hi tadā dharmā
GSP28mimsvtku:4994: bhaveyuḥ. tad ihātideśopoddhātenaiva saptamādye yajyapūrvaprayuktatvaṃ vicāritaṃ yajyuddeśena dharmavidhānāt yajeś ca sāmānyavacanatvāt sarvatreti prāptam, na ca darśapūrṇamāsapadaṃ niyāmakaṃ, parisaṃkhyānād viśiṣṭoddeśena viśiṣṭānuvādād iti prāpte nirūpitaṃ - nātra darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeteti yāgoddeśenāṅgāni vidhīyante, kiṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4995: tarhi, sāṅgapradhānaviśiṣṭāpūrvabhāvanaiva codyate. paścāt tv ekabhāvanāparigṛhītānām aṅgānāṃ pradhānānāṃ cāruṇaikahāyanīvat
GSP28mimsvtku:4996: parasparānvayasiddhiḥ. bhidhyante ca śabdāntarādibhiḥ pratiprakaraṇam apūrvabhāvaneti kuto dharmasaṅkaraḥ. seyaṃ śrutyādipramāṇakaviniyogaparāmarśād eva vyavasthā sidhyati. yadā hy apūrvabhāvanānvayagarbho viniyogo dharmāṇāṃ na yāgasāmānyoddeśeneti siddhaṃ bhavati, tadā vyavasthā sidhyati. tatsiddhyā cāśrutetikartavyatākeṣu sauryādiṣu vidhyantāpekṣāyāṃ sāmānyātideśasiddhau pratyakṣavacananāmāvyaktacodanātadavayavadravyadevatāsāmānyabāhulyena
GSP28mimsvtku:4997: viśeṣātideśasiddhiḥ. yatheṣṭau samānam itarat śyeneneti śyenavaiśeṣikāṇāṃ vācaniko 'tideśaḥ. māsam agnihotraṃ juhotīti kuṇḍapāyināmayane homanāmnā nityāgnihotradharmātideśaḥ. ekāhāhīnasatrāṇām avyaktacodanācoditatvena somasādṛśyāt taddharmātideśaḥ ityādi darśayitavyam. sarvaś cāyam atideśaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4998: śrutyā viniyogānusāreṇaiva śeṣāṇāṃ sidhyatīti tatpramāṇagaṇakārita eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:4999: ūho 'pi ṣoḍhā vibhaktaḥ. prākṛtopadeśānusāreṇaiva mantrādīnāṃ sidhyatīti
GSP28mimsvtku:5000: so 'pi śrutyādipramāṇaka eva. so 'pi hy apūrvārtho dharmaviniyoga iti siddhe setsyati. ata{2,32}evāpūrvaprayuktir ādye sādhitā. bādho 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:5002: pūrvapakṣite upakārapradhānatvād atideśasya tadabhāve 'nyato vā tallābhe pratiṣedhena vā bādho vakṣyate. yathā kṛṣṇalacarāv avaghātasya,
GSP28mimsvtku:5003: khalevālīśarābhyāṃ yūpabarhiṣor ityādi darśayitavyam. etad api prakṛtāv
GSP28mimsvtku:5004: evopakāraparyantaśrutyādiviniyoga iti nirṇīyate. (?sidhyati) etāvāṃs tu viśeṣaḥ -- prakṛtau padārthaparigrahapurassaryupakārakalpanā, prāk
GSP28mimsvtku:5006: tatparigrahapurassaraṃ padārthaparigrahaḥ. sa eva hi vidhināpekṣyte. sa tu prakṛtāvasiddho ('pi) kalpayitvā gṛhyate. vikṛtau ca prakṛtisiddha
GSP28mimsvtku:5007: evopādīyata iti. ata eva śāstrapadārthayor anatideśaḥ, tayor vidhyanapekṣitatvād iti. tantrāvāpalakṣaṇe 'pi viśeṣā eva pradhānānāṃ kiṃ tantreṇopakārakā utāvṛttyeti śeṣāṇām eva vicāryamāṇatvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:5008: tatpramāṇagaṇānusārī nirṇayo darśayitavyaḥ. tatra hi deśakālaphalādīnāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5009: tantrasambandha āgneyādīn prati prayājādīnāṃ tantrānuṣṭhāne hetur
GSP28mimsvtku:5010: bhaviṣyati. sa ca śrutyādipramāṇaka eveti tatrāpi sa eva pramāṇagaṇaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:5011: prasaṅgalakṣaṇe 'pi paśvarthānuṣṭhitānāṃ prayājādiśeṣāṇāṃ paśutantramadhyapātipuroḍāśopakārakatvaṃ deśāditantranibandhanam eveti
GSP28mimsvtku:5012: pūrvavat pramāṇagaṇaḥ. ata eva bhāṣyakāreṇa prathamasūtre daśādhyāya eva
GSP28mimsvtku:5013: śeṣalakṣaṇaśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ. yo 'pi vacanavyaktibhedena pūrvapakṣasiddhāntavibhāgaḥ yathā svargakāmo yajeteti svargakāmo yāgaṃ kuryād iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ yāgena svargaṃ kuryād iti siddhānta iti, so 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:5014: nārthaśūnyāsu buddhiṣu sidhyati. karmabhyaś ca darśapūrṇamāsakārīryādibhyaḥ paraloke ihaloke
GSP28mimsvtku:5015: bhavatsvargavṛṣṭyādiphalasambandho bāhyāśraya eva, asati tasmin dvaividhyānupapatteḥ. ataḥ sarvam idaṃ bāhyārthasiddhāv asatyām ayuktam
GSP28mimsvtku:5016: āpadyeteti tadupapādanāya dharmārthibhir mīmāṃsakair lokaprasiddhaiḥ pratyakṣādibhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ pūrvottarapakṣavibhāgenārthasya sadasadbhāvayor yatnaḥ kāryaḥ. pūrvapakṣaviśuddhā hi buddhiḥ siddhāntakarī bhavati. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:5019: tatsiddhyartham iti yāvat. anyathā sarvārthakriyāṇām ucchedo bhavet. ataḥ prayojanavad bāhyārthapratipādanam. akriyāṅgasya tu pratipāditasyāpy
GSP28mimsvtku:5020: anartha(tva)m eveti kriyāṃ pratīti yuktam eveti || 4 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5021: atra codayati -- yadeti. jñānamātrapakṣe hi bauddhānām iva sarvo 'yaṃ pramāṇādivyavahāraḥ sidhyaty eva. te hi vadanti --
GSP28mimsvtku:5023: loke saṃvṛtisatyaṃ ca satyaṃ ca paramārthataḥ ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5024: iti. atas tadvad eva vyavahārasiddhau kiṃ pāramārthikārthapratipādanavyasaneneti || 5 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5025: atra dūṣaṇam āha -- saṃvṛter iti. satyam. saṃvṛtisatyena sarvam idaṃ bauddhair āśrīyate. na tv etad yuktam. satyabhedānupapatteḥ. yaḥ khalv ayaṃ satyabhedo bauddhair āśritaḥ saṃvṛtisatyaṃ paramārthasatyam iti, nāyam upapadyate. saṃvṛteḥ satyatvābhāvāt. mithyāparyāyo hi saṃvṛtiśabdaḥ. kathaṃ tasya satyaśabdasamabhivyāhāraḥ. na hy ayam
GSP28mimsvtku:5026: akṣaśabda iva vibhītakādīnāṃ saṃvṛtiparamārthayoḥ sādhāraṇaḥ satyaśabdaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:5027: ataḥ satyabhedānupapattir iti. virodham eva vyanakti -- satyaṃ ced iti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5028: virodhād eva ca mṛṣārthaparamārthayoḥ sāmānyam api satyatvaṃ nābhyupagantuṃ śakyam. samānānāṃ bhāvaḥ sāmānyam. kutas tasya virodhinor
GSP28mimsvtku:5029: avakāśaḥ. na hi bhavati dharmādharmayor dharmatvam adharmatvaṃ vā sāmānyam ity āha -- satyatvam iti virodhādantena. anyamātrayor api tatparāmarśābhāvād durupagamaṃ sāmānyaṃ vṛkṣasiṃhayor iva vṛkṣatvam. kiṃ punarvirodhinos tat syād ity āha -{2,34}na hīti. atra cākṣādivat sādhāraṇaśabdatā pūrvaṃ satyaśabdasya nirākṛtā iha gavādivat
GSP28mimsvtku:5031: ato lokaṃ vañcayituṃ mithyāparyāyo 'pi saṃvṛtiśabdo bauddhavidagdhair anudvegakaratayā mithyātva eva vivakṣite
GSP28mimsvtku:5032: svanāstikyaparijihīrṣayā prayukto lālāyām iva vaktrāsavaśabda ity āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:5033: tulyārthatva iti saṃvṛtirantena. vakṣyamāṇenetikaraṇena sambandha iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5034: kalpanāvācoyuktir api svanāstikyaparihārārtham eva tair āśritety āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:5035: kalpaneti ceti. kalpanāmātrakalpitena bāhyena sarvalaukikavyavahāra ity api nirvastuke jagaty abhinnasya cinmātrasya kalpanāyā bhettum aśakyatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:5036: durbhaṇam. kvacid dhi bhinnam eva kiñcid rūpāntaraṃ kalpanās padaṃ bhavati
GSP28mimsvtku:5037: śuktāv iva rajatarūpam. yasya tu na kiñcid bhinnam asti, tat kena rūpeṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:5039: nanu tridhaiva tattvaṃ vibhajāmahe satyam asatyam saṃvṛtisatyaṃ ceti. saṃvṛtaṃ hi nātyantam asad bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:5040: vyavahārāvisaṃvādāt. nāpi sad eva, pramāṇāntaravirodhāj jātyādivat. ato na saṃvṛtiḥ pramāṇaṃ nāpramāṇam iti vidhāntaram evedam iti yuktas tadāśrayatayā vyavahāra ity ata āha -- tasmād iti. yataḥ khalu saṃvṛtir
GSP28mimsvtku:5041: mithyājñānaṃ na vastukḷptyai prabhavati, tasmād yat paramārthato nāstīti nirūpyate na tat saṃvṛtyā tadrūpaṃ bhavitum arhati. nāsty eva tat. yat tu tāvad vyavahārāvisaṃvādi tad asty eva, na hy asataḥ sarvadā vyavahārahetubhāvaḥ sambhavati. yad evārthakriyākāri tad eva ca paramārthasad iti vaḥ siddhāntaḥ. ataḥ katham arthakriyākāritve saty api jātyādīnām asatyatvam. tasmād yadi vyavahārāṅgatayā bāhyam asti, tat tarhi paramārthata evāsti.{2,35}tad eva satyam ity ucyate. anyat tu saṃvṛtir
GSP28mimsvtku:5042: mithyeti. na tu satyadvayakalpanātmānaṃ labhate. tantreṇa tadvṛttasya pūrvāparābhyāṃ sambandhaḥ. paramārthata iti ca nāstīti pūrveṇa sambadhyata
GSP28mimsvtku:5044: api ca svapnāvagatā apy arthāḥ kecicchokaharṣādivyavahārahetavo dṛśyante. atas te 'pi sāṃvṛtā eva. tadvac ca bāhyārthābhyupagame svapnādibhogatulya eva śubhāśubhakarmaphalopabhogo
GSP28mimsvtku:5045: bhavet. atas tannivṛttyartham api paramārthasatye bāhye prayasyate ity āha -- svapnādīti kaḥ punaḥ svapnatulyatve doṣaḥ, ata āha -- na hīti. kim iti na
GSP28mimsvtku:5046: pravartate ata āha -- yādṛcchikatvād iti. na hi svapnasukhaṃ me bhavatīti vidvāṃsaḥ prayasyanti. yādṛcchikaṃ hi svapnasukham
GSP28mimsvtku:5047: agaṇitasāmparāyikaihikanimittaṃ, na tat prayasyato bhavatīti buddhvā vidvadbhis tūṣṇīm udāsīnair evāsyeta, na kvacit prayatnaḥ kriyetety arthaḥ || 12 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5048: ato 'vaśyaṃ pāramārthikīṃ phalaprāptim icchadbhir upapattyā bāhyavastuviṣayā pratipattir vidhātavyety asti vicārasya prayojanam ity upasaṃharati -- paramārtheti || 13 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5049: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa bāhyārthasadbhāva eva pūrvapakṣapurassaraṃ pratipāditaḥ, na tu jñānasadbhāvaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ. asti hi tatsadbhāvavipratipattir api. mādhyamikā hi jñānam apy apalapanti. atas tannirākaraṇam api yuktam. yat{2,36}punastadupekṣyaiva bāhyārthāpalāpo
GSP28mimsvtku:5050: nirākriyate, tatra kāraṇaṃ vaktavyam ata āha -- tatreti trayeṇa. asyārthaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5051: -- yogācārā hi jñānamātram arthaśūnyaṃ pāramārthikaṃ manyante. mādhyamikās tu jñeyābhāvād akarmakajñānānutpatter jñānasyāpy abhāvam icchanti. tatra dvayor api vādinos tāvad bāhyārthaśūnyatvaṃ sādhāraṇam.
GSP28mimsvtku:5052: arthanivṛttyadhīnatvāt jñānanivṛtteḥ. ato dvayor api sādhāraṇo bāhyārthāpalāpa iti sa eva nirākriyate. api ca tanmūlo jñānāpahnavaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:5053: tatas tasmin nirākṛte nirākṛta eveti bāhyārthasadbhāve pūrvottarapakṣavibhāgena bhāṣyakṛtā prayatnaḥ kṛtaḥ. ādyas tatraśabdo vākyopanyāsārthaḥ. dvitīyas tu pūrvoktadarśanabhedaparāmarśārthaḥ. tatra matabhede ity arthaḥ || 16 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5054: nanu bāhyārthāpahnavo dvidhaiva bauddhair āśritaḥ pramāṇataḥ prameyataś ca. tathā hi -- evaṃ tair uktaṃ - na tāvadaṇavo 'tīndriyāḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5055: pramāṇaviṣayāḥ. na tatsamūhaḥ, tasya tadatirekiṇo 'bhāvāt. nāvayavī.
GSP28mimsvtku:5056: tasyāvayavavyatirekeṇānupalambhāt. avyatireke ca tanmātrāpātāt. evam āntyāvayavebhyo vikalpya avayavī nirākāryaḥ. te tv atīndriyā eva. ato na kiñcana grāhyam avatiṣṭhate iti. tad etat parityāge kiṃ kāraṇaṃ, yat pramāṇata eva bāhyāpahnava upanyasyate nirasyate ceti. ata āha bāhyārtheti sārdhena. ayam arthaḥ -- yady api dvedhā bāhyārthāpahnavo bauddhair āśritaḥ, tathāpi pramāṇāśrita eva mūlabhūtatvād iha vicāryate.
GSP28mimsvtku:5057: pramāṇamūlā hi prameyasthitiḥ. tad yadi pramāṇam anuguṇaṃ, kiṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5058: vastuvikalpaiḥ. na tadbalena tadanupapattiṃ parihṛtyārtho vyavasthāpyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:5059: atha tu{2,37}pramāṇam evārthaṃ pratyācaṣṭe, kiṃ prameyavikalpaiḥ kṛtakarair iti. iha śābare tantre. idānīm asminn avasare. pramāṇastha eva bāhyāpahnavo vicāryata iti || 17 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5060: nanu yadi pramāṇastho vicārayitavyaḥ, tataḥ pratyakṣasya mukhyatvāt tadanusāreṇaiva vicāro yuktaḥ. bauddhair api pratyakṣasāmarthyād evaikaṃ tattvam āśritam. naikasminn ākāre bhāsamāne
GSP28mimsvtku:5061: dvaitam ātmānaṃ labhate iti hi manyante. anumānaṃ tu bhrāmyataḥ pratyuktam iti kiṃ tatpurassarīkriyate ata āha -- prastuta iti. evaṃ hi manyate --
GSP28mimsvtku:5062: yady api pratyakṣaśaktinirūpaṇam eva bāhyārthasadasadbhāvayoḥ pradhānaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5063: tathāpi parair anumānam api bāhyāpahnave darśitam iti tad api nirākāryam.
GSP28mimsvtku:5064: anirākṛte hi tasmiṃs tatraiva kecid āsthāṃ pratibadhnīyuḥ. atra cāyam evopanyāsakramo yuktaḥ yat prathamam anumānam upanyasyate, tatas tasya pratyakṣeṇa bādham upanyasya tasmiṃś cokte punaḥ pratyakṣaśaktyapekṣaṇena
GSP28mimsvtku:5065: pūrvottarapakṣāvā(?dāv e/da e)va pratyakṣaśaktinirūpaṇena nirṇaye kṛte
GSP28mimsvtku:5068: -- tatreti ityantena. saṅgatim āha -- asyeti durlabha ityantena. ayam arthaḥ -- yat sūtrakāreṇa tatsaṃyogajaṃ pratyakṣam uktaṃ tadākṣepeṇaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:5069: saṅgacchate. kālpaniko hy ayam indriyārthasamprayogaḥ, indriyāder abhāvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:5070: kālpanikaś ca sakalamithyājñānasādhāraṇa iti tadatadyogajatvavibhāgo na yukta iti sūtroktākṣepa iti || 21 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5071: {2,38} svoktākṣepeṇa vā saṅgatir ity āha -- mithyātvam iti. yad etadvṛttikāragranthānta uktaṃ - yasya ca duṣṭaṃ karaṇaṃ yatra ca mithyeti pratyayaḥ sa evāsamīcīnapratyayaḥ nānyaḥ iti tadanenākṣipyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:5074: stambhādīti. stambhādipratyaya iti dharminirdeśaḥ. mithyeti dharmavacanaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5075: pratyayatvād iti hetuḥ. tathāhīti dṛṣṭāntavacanam iti || 23 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5076: atra bhāṣyaṃ sarva eva nirālambanaḥ svapnavat pratyayaḥ iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5077: tad yathāśrutaṃ sarveṣām anālambanatvaṃ sādhayati. tatra cāṃśe siddhasādhanatā syāt, vibhramāṇām anālambanatvāt. yadvijñānam anyathā santam anyathā budhyate 'rthaṃ tannirālambanam iṣyata eva. tathā sarvasmin pakṣīkṛte svapnajñānasyāpi tadantarbhāvād dṛṣṭāntābhāvaḥ. sarva eveti caivaśabdānupapattiś ca. sa hi vibhaktapratiṣedhe dṛṣṭaḥ. yathedaṃ devebhya idaṃ brāhmaṇebhya iti vibhakte bhavati vacanaṃ sarvam evedaṃ brāhmaṇebhya iti. tatra vibhāgapratiṣedhapara evakāro dṛśyate. sarvasmiṃs tu pakṣe sarva ity ācakṣīta, naivakāraṃ prayuñjīta. ato jāgradbuddhivivakṣayaiva bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātavyam ity āha -- siddhasādhaneti
GSP28mimsvtku:5079: svāṃśālambanatvaṃ jñānānāṃ bauddhair iṣyata evāta āha -- svāṃśeti. ata eva kāraṇād bāhyaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭam anālambanatvaṃ sādhanīyam ity arthaḥ || 25
GSP28mimsvtku:5080: {2,39} aparam api bhāṣyaṃ pratyayasya hi nirālambanatāsvabhāva
GSP28mimsvtku:5081: upalakṣitaḥ svapne. jāgrato 'pi stambha iti vā kuḍya iti vā pratyaya eva bhavati, tasmāt so 'pi nirālambanaḥ iti. tasyārtham āha -- pratyayasyeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5082: pratyayasya hi nirālambanatāsvabhāva upalakṣitaḥ svapne ity etāvatā bhāgena tāvat sādhyena nirālambanatvena vyāptaṃ pratyayatvaṃ hetur nirdiśyate. dṛṣṭāntavacanam iti yāvad iti. nanu na pratyayatvād iti hetur upāttaḥ, kasya vyāptir nirdiśyate. ata āha -- hetuś ceti. yady api pratyayatvasya na vyaktaṃ pañcamyā hetutvam upāttaṃ, tathāpi upanayanākhyena sādhanavākyāvayavena jāgrato 'pītyādinā hetuḥ pradarśita eva. yadaiva hi sādhyānvitaṃ pradarśitaṃ pratyayatvaṃ punaḥ pratijñārtha
GSP28mimsvtku:5083: upanīyate, tadaiva tad atra hetur iti pradarśitaṃ bhavaty eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:5084: sādhyānvitasyaiva pakṣasthasya hetutvād iti. kaḥ punar ayam upanayaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:5085: sādhanavākyāvayavaviśeṣaḥ. pañcāvayavaṃ hi sādhanavākyaṃ pratijñā hetur udāharaṇam upanayo nigamanaṃ ceti. tatra sādhyanirdeśaḥ pratijñā. yathā anityaḥ śabda iti. utpattidharmakatvād iti hetuḥ. utpattidharmakaṃ sthālyādi dravyam anityaṃ dṛṣṭam ity udāharaṇam. tathā cotpattidharmakaḥ śabda ity upanayaḥ. sa hy udāharaṇāpekṣaṃs tathety upasaṃhāro na tatheti vā sādhyasyopanaya iti varṇitam. kim uktaṃ bhavati. dvedhā hi hetuḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5086: sādhyaṃ sādhayati udāharaṇasādharmyād vaidharmyād vā. tatra sādharmyaṃ pradarśitam. vaidharmyaṃ tu yathā -- tasyām eva pratijñāyāṃ tasminn evotpattidharmakatvād iti hetau anutpattidharmakam ātmādi dravyaṃ nityaṃ dṛṣṭam. na ca tathā śabdo 'nutpattidharmaka iti. tatra yo 'yaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5087: dvividhodāharaṇāpekṣaḥ sādharmyodāhṛte tatheti vaidharmyodāhṛte na tatheti sādhyasya śabdasya
GSP28mimsvtku:5088: upanayaḥ, sa codāharaṇāpekṣa eva. udāharaṇadvaitād eva tadupasaṃhāradvaitaṃ bhavati. vaidharmyodāharaṇena ca viruddhanivṛttyā
GSP28mimsvtku:5089: sādhyasambandhitvena hetor upasaṃhāraḥ. yathātmādi dravyaṃ nityam
GSP28mimsvtku:5090: anutpattidharmakam, na ca tathā śabdaḥ ity anutpattidharmakatvapratiṣedhenotpattidharmakatvam upasaṃhriyate. prakṛte tu sādharmyodāharaṇe{2,40}tathaiveti hetor upasaṃhāra upanayo veditavyaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:5091: nigamanaṃ tu hetvapadeśāt pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanam. tasmād utpattidharmakatvād anityaḥ śabda iti. nigamyante 'nena
GSP28mimsvtku:5092: pratijñāhetūdāharaṇopanayā ekatrārtha iti nigamanam. samarthyante sambadhyante iti yāvat. asati hi tasminn anabhivyaktasambandhānām arthapratipādakatvaṃ na syāt. sati tu tasmin sarveṣām avayavānāṃ tātparyadarśanāt parasparasambandhaḥ sphuṭo bhavati. nigamanaṃ saṅgamanaṃ sambandhanam iti yāvad iti || 26 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5093: nanu nāvyāvṛtto vipakṣād dhetur bhavatīti vaidharmyadarśanena hetor vyatireko darśayitavyaḥ. na cātra tathā darśitaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5094: sādharmyamātravacanāt. ata āha -- vipakṣeti. nirālambanatve hi sādhyamāne
GSP28mimsvtku:5095: sālambanatvaṃ vipakṣaḥ. na ca sarvānālambanatvavādinas tad astīti kiṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5096: tadvyatirekapradarśaneneti. nanu pratyaye pakṣīkṛte tasminn eva hetau
GSP28mimsvtku:5097: pratijñārthaikadeśo hetur ata āha -- sāmānyasyeti. sāmānyaviśeṣātmakā hi pratyayāḥ. tatra viśeṣe pakṣīkṛte sāmānyaṃ hetur iti na pratijñārthaikadeśateti || 27 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5098: atra siddhāntabhāṣyaṃ jāgrato hi buddhiḥ supariniścitā kathaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5099: viparyasiṣyatīti. anena kila supariniścitatvena jāgraddhiyāṃ sālambanatvaṃ sādhyate. na ca supariniścitatvaṃ bāhyālambanasambaddhaṃ parān prati
GSP28mimsvtku:5101: sapratisādhanaṃ vā bhavati. tasyobhayaprasiddhāvayavatvāt. asya ca tadviparītatvāt. ato{2,41}jātyuttaram evedaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa dattam ity ākṣipati -- jāgrajjñāna iti dvayena. vaidharmyavikalpasamayoś ca svarūpaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5103: supariniścitāsupariniścitadharmāntaravikalpanāt sādhyadharmavikalpāpādanena vikalpasamatā. tathā sādharmye vādinā prayukte nirālambanānāṃ svapnajñānānām asupariniścitatvadarśanāt sādhyeṣu jāgrajjñāneṣu supariniścitatvena vaidharmyāt pratyavasthānena
GSP28mimsvtku:5104: vaidharmyasamatā. prapañcas tu paścād bhaviṣyatīty uktam iti || 28 --29 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5105: evam ākṣiptaṃ bhāṣyam ekena[704]matena samādadhāti -- duṣṭatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:5106: iti. evaṃ hi manyante -- duṣṭasādhanaprayoge duṣṭam evottaraṃ deyam iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:5107: evaṃ hi tadā vādī pratibodhito bhavati yathā bhavān madīyaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ duṣṭaṃ manyate tathāham api[705]tvatsādhanam, ato 'sau svasādhanān nivartate iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5109: paryanuyojyopekṣaṇaniranuyojyānuyogātmakanigrahasthānadvayam evaṃvādino bhavet, yaḥ santaṃ doṣam anuktvānyam asantaṃ jalpati. na caivaṃvādinaḥ svasādhanadūṣaṇāvagamo bhavati. param eva tu
GSP28mimsvtku:5111: varjanīyam ity anyathā samādhānam āha -- pratijñeti. nānenānumānam
GSP28mimsvtku:5112: upanyasyate. kin tu paroktānumānasya pratyakṣavirodho varṇyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:5114: jāgradbuddhibhir niścitasadbhāvasya bāhyasya pratyākhyānānumānaṃ pratyakṣeṇa mukhanirodhān na jāyata evāgnāv iva śaityānumānam. yadi paraṃ bāhyasya prayogamātraparyavasitam eva sādhanavacanam, anumimānasyāpi sphuto bahirviṣayabo(?dhe/dho) jāyata eva. tathāvidhasyāpi mithyātve kaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5115: samāśvāsaḥ. nanv evam anumānam anāśvāsanīyam eva, na. tadabhāvāt, uktam etat pratyakṣe paripanthini na tatpratipakṣam anumānam ātmānaṃ labheta
GSP28mimsvtku:5116: śrauta iva viniyoge laiṅgikaḥ. sādhanavākye tv ayogyānvayapadasannikarṣād
GSP28mimsvtku:5117: vandhyāsutavākyavat saṃsargajñānaṃ bhrāntir eva. na tu kasyacid laiṅgikaṃ stambhādiṣv abhāvajñānam utpadyate. nanu vyāptaṃ pratyayatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:5118: anālambanatvena. vyāpyāc ca jñātasambandhasya vyāpakajñānaṃ notpadyata iti{2,42}haṭha evāyam. na. vyāptibhaṅgāt. saṃvidann eva hi vyāptim abādhitena pratyakṣeṇa sarvadeśakālādibhāvinā na pratyayatvaprayuktaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5119: mithyātvam, api tu pūrvoktahetudvayaprayuktam iti niścinoti. tad idam uktam -- anyatas tu svapnapratyayasya mithyābhāvo visaṃvādād avagamyate
GSP28mimsvtku:5123: kathaṃ punar atra pratyakṣabādhaḥ. pratyakṣaṃ hi grāhyam
GSP28mimsvtku:5124: antareṇātmānam alabhamānaṃ tanmātram avasthāpayati na bāhyam. kiṃ hi tasya
GSP28mimsvtku:5125: bāhyena vinā na sidhyati. grāhyaś ca svāṃśo bauddhair abhyupagata eva. ato na bāhyāpahnave pratyakṣatvādivirodhaḥ. ata āha -- śakṣyāma iti dvayena.
GSP28mimsvtku:5126: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- śūnyavāde hi pratyakṣasya svāṃśagocaratvaṃ nirākariṣyāma eva. tannirākaraṇe ca bāhyaviśeṣaṇopādānam anarthakam eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:5127: tadvyatiriktagrāhyāntarāsambhavāt. ato 'nālambanapakṣo grāhyamātranivāraṇa eva bhavati. pratyakṣādeḥ svāṃśanirākara(ṇā)d bāhya eva viṣayo 'vaśiṣyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:5128: ato bāhyaviśeṣaṇena vinā grāhyamātrāpahnave bhavati pratyakṣādibhiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5129: pakṣabādhaḥ. saty api kathañcid bāhyaviśeṣaṇe pratyakṣāder api
GSP28mimsvtku:5130: bāhyaviṣayāvaśeṣāt tanniṣedhaṃ kurvāṇasya vādinas taiḥ pratyakṣādibhiḥ pakṣabādhanaṃ bhavet. pūrvaṃ tu pratyakṣagrahaṇam upalakṣaṇārthaṃ sarvapratyakṣādivirodha eva tv anālambanānumānasya darśayitavya iti || 32
GSP28mimsvtku:5131: yat tu supariniścayena bāhyālambanasambandhaḥ prasiddhaḥ. kiṃ tadupanyāsenety uktam, ata āha -- suniścayeneti. uktam idam asmābhir nāyam anumānaprayoga iti, kin tv anumānena jāgratpratyakṣadhiyāṃ svapnadhīsāmānyaṃ manyamānasya tadvaiṣamyapradarśanārthaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5133: naiṣu paripanthiṣv anumānam ātmānaṃ labhate. etasmād anumānād ity arthaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5134: etad eva prapañcayati -- duṣṭajñāneti. duṣṭenāsupariniścitena gṛhīto 'rthaḥ pratiṣedham arhati netara iti. gṛhītamātrabādhe tu bahavaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5135: sādhanadoṣā bhāṣyakāreṇāntarṇītāḥ. tān pratipādayiṣyan pakṣābhāvaṃ tāvad āha -- gṛhīteti. yadi gṛhītamātraṃ mithyety ucyate, tadā yo 'yaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5136: nirālambanāḥ pratyayā iti svapakṣaḥ so 'pi gṛhītatvān mithyā syāt. ataḥ śakyaṃ vaktuṃ pakṣa evāsmin bhavatsādhane nāstīti || 34 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5137: api ca, nirālambanatvena viśiṣṭāḥ pratyayāḥ sādhyante. tad iha viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhedāvagrahasyāpi mithyātvān na viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayor vivekaḥ sidhyati, tadabhāvāc ca vaktuṃ śakyam aprasiddhaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyaḥ pakṣo
GSP28mimsvtku:5138: 'prasiddhānyataro veti. tad etad āha -- agrāhyatvāc ceti. anyatarasya vā asiddhir vaktavyety
GSP28mimsvtku:5139: dūṣaṇāntaram āha -- vaktṛśrotror iti. pañcadhā svavāgvirodhaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:5141: svavāgvirodhaḥ. dvayor api viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayor nirālambanatvapratyayayor yad vaktuḥ śrotuś ca jñānaṃ jāyate, tad api pratyayatvād anālambanam iti pakṣo na sidhyatīti, tatsālambanatve cānaikāntikatvān na pratyayānām anālambanatvaṃ bhavet. so 'yam ubhayoktyā svavāgvirodha iti {2,44} dūṣaṇāntaram āha -- sambhavo na ceti. evaṃ hi vikalpanīyam. kiṃ nirālambanatvaṃ dharmiṇo bhinnam abhinnaṃ vā. na tāvad abhinnaṃ viśeṣaṇam arhati. na ca bhedagrāhiṇo jñānasya mithyātvād bhettum
GSP28mimsvtku:5143: bauddhānāṃ pratyavasthānam āha -- nirālambanateti. evaṃ hi manyante -- vastuni vyatirekādivikalpo yuktaḥ nāvastuni. yathāhuḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:5144: vastuny eṣa vikalpaḥ syād iti. na cālambanapratiṣedho vastunaḥ kiṃ tadvyatirekādipraśneneti dūṣaṇā[706]ntaram āha -- yadīti tvamantena. yadi tāvad avastu,
GSP28mimsvtku:5145: kathaṃ tad asmān pratibodhayitum icchā bhavataḥ. svayaṃ vā tadviṣayā
GSP28mimsvtku:5146: buddhiḥ. na hy avastu buddhiviṣayo bhavati. tadviṣayatve ca vastutvāpātāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:5147: arthakriyālakṣaṇatvāc ca sattvasya. tallakṣaṇatvāc ca vastutvasyeti. yadi tūcyate - yady api nirālambanatvaṃ nāma na kiñcit paramārthato 'sti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5148: tathāpi tatsattvaṃ kalpayitvānumānavyavahāraḥ kriyate pratimāyām iva devatātvam ārādhanādivyavahāra iti. tad ayuktam. asataḥ kalpanāyogāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:5149: anyatra prasiddhasadbhāvā hi viṣṇvādyā devatā yuktaṃ[707]yad anyatra
GSP28mimsvtku:5150: kalpyante. atyantāprasiddhasadbhāvaṃ tv anālambanatvaṃ na gaganakusumādivat kalpanām arthati. tad etad āśaṅkayā sahāha -- kalpiteti
GSP28mimsvtku:5153: {2,45} api ca keyaṃ kalpanā. yadi jñānaṃ, kiṃ tena jñāyate. yadi
GSP28mimsvtku:5154: nirālambanatvam, tat tarhi kalpanā jñānotpattau vyāpriyamāṇā katham avastu
GSP28mimsvtku:5155: bhaviṣyati. arthakriyākāritvam eva hi vastutvaṃ, jñānotpādanam api cārthakriyetyabhiprāyeṇāha -- kḷptāv iti. atra codayati -- katham iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5156: yady avastu na sādhyaṃ, kathaṃ tarhi bhavatām api meghābhāvena vṛṣṭyabhāvaḥ sādhyata iti. pariharati -- vastv iti. bhaved evaṃ yady
GSP28mimsvtku:5157: abhāvo na vastu syāt. sa vastv ity abhāvaparicchede vakṣyate. yady api cābhāvo na vastuśabdavācyaḥ lokavirodhāt, tathāpi nāsau nissvabhāvaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:5158: prakhyāyate hy asau svasaṃvedyena bhāvātirekiṇā rūpeṇa. ato 'rthakriyāyā
GSP28mimsvtku:5159: eva ghaṭiṣyata iti na kiñcid anupapannam iti || 40 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5160: kiñ cedam api cātra vikalpanīyaṃ - yo 'yaṃ dharmiṇo nirdeśakaḥ pratyayaśabdaḥ sa kiṃ bhāve kartari karaṇe vā vyutpadyate, karmaṇi vā.
GSP28mimsvtku:5161: pūrvokteṣu tāvat kalpeṣu virodhaḥ, akarmakapratyayāsambhavāt. na hi pratītir asti pratyetavyaṃ nāstīti sambhavati. tadanavaṣṭabdhasya
GSP28mimsvtku:5162: (?kṛ/ta)drūpasyāprakāśāt. evam eva kartṛkaraṇayor api vācyam. yadi jñānam evārthaprakāśe tajjanmani vā kartṛtvenopacaryate karaṇatvena vā
GSP28mimsvtku:5163: vivakṣādhīnatvāt kārakāṇāṃ, tathāpi tayoḥ pratyāyyena karmakārakeṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:5164: vinānupapattiḥ. so 'yaṃ svavāgvirodhaḥ. pratyaya ity uktamātra eva tatsvabhāvaparāmarśāt pratyetavyābhāvaḥ pratiṣidhyate mātā me
GSP28mimsvtku:5165: vandhyetivanmātṛtvena vandhyātvam. ato na pratyaye pakṣīkṛte nirālambanatvaṃ sādhayituṃ śakyam. karmavyutpattau siddhasādhanam eva. tad etat sarvam āha -- tatheti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5166: siddhasādhanaṃ vivṛṇoti -- pratyāyyasyeti. na khalu jaḍo
GSP28mimsvtku:5168: {2,46} kartṛkaraṇapakṣe tv ayam aparo doṣaḥ yaddharmadharmivacanayoḥ śabdayor api nirālambanatvaṃ pratijñāyeta.
GSP28mimsvtku:5169: pratīte hi kartā karaṇaṃ vā pratyayaḥ. yathā ca kartṛkaraṇatve
GSP28mimsvtku:5170: vivakṣāvaśād jñāne bhavataḥ, tathā śabda iti. ata eva vakṣyati --
GSP28mimsvtku:5171: śabdānāṃ karaṇatvaṃ vā kartṛtvaṃ vā nirūpitam |
GSP28mimsvtku:5172: iti. kiñ cedaṃ śabdayor anālambanatvam anyad ato 'bhidheyābhāvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:5173: tadabhāve ca pakṣābhāvaḥ prasajyata ity āha -- kartṛtva iti || 43 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5174: bhāvādiṣu virodhaḥ syād iti yad uktaṃ tad vivṛṇoti --
GSP28mimsvtku:5175: pratyāyyena ceti. kartrādibhāvo hi na pratyāyyabhedam antareṇa sambhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:5176: atas tatpravṛttinimitte pratyayaśabde svavacanavirodhaḥ. sa cāyam asmābhiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5178: yadi tv avibhaktāvayavo rūḍhirūpeṇa pratyayaśabda upādīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:5179: tadarthaś ca pakṣīkriyate, tathāpi vastv antaragrāhakasyaiva vastuto
GSP28mimsvtku:5180: 'smākaṃ pratyayatvena prasiddheḥ svavacanavirodha eva bhavet, tad etad āha
GSP28mimsvtku:5181: -- athāpīti. tathāpīti. tathāpi svavacanavirodha iti pūrveṇa sambandha iti. kathaṃ svavacanavirodhaḥ. ata āha -- grāhakam iti || 45 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5182: vastvantarasyaiva hi grāhyasya grāhakam ātmadharmākhyaṃ vastv eva pratyaya iti naḥ prasiddham. ataḥ kathaṃ tasyāsati grāhye siddhir iti
GSP28mimsvtku:5183: dūṣaṇāntaram āha -- tam abhyupetyeti. evam ayam asādhanavādī vaktavyaḥ kiṃ yādrśo 'smābhiḥ pratyaya{2,47}iṣyate sa tathāvidha evābhyupetya bhavatā
GSP28mimsvtku:5184: pakṣīkriyate, na vā. tatrābhyupagame tāvadabhyupetavirodha iti. api caivaṃ sati cāprasiddhaviśeṣyaḥ pakṣo bhavati, tvanmate bāhyārthagrāhipratyayānabhyupagamād ity āha -- viśeṣyasyeti. atādṛśe tu svābhimate pakṣe 'smākam aprasiddhaviśeṣyaḥ pakṣa ity āha -- asmākam iti || 46 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5185: kiñ ca yādṛgātmadharmaḥ pratyayo 'smākam abhimataḥ, sa pakṣo bhavadabhimato 'thavā svatantraḥ. pūrvasmin kalpe bhavato
GSP28mimsvtku:5186: 'prasiddhaviśeṣyatā. uttarasminn asmākam iti pūrvavad eva darśayitavyam
GSP28mimsvtku:5187: ity āha -- ātmadharmeti. yadi tv anirdhāritaviśeṣaṃ pratyayamātraṃ pakṣīkriyata ity ucyate, tan na. tathāvidhasyānirūpaṇād ity āha -- na ceti || 47 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5188: nanu śakyam idam anyeṣv api pakṣīkṛteṣu vaktuṃ yathā -- kim ākāśaguṇaḥ śabdaḥ svatantraṃ vā dravyaṃ paudgalākhyaṃ vā nityatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:5190: rūpaṃ pakṣa ity ucyate, tad ihāpi samānam ity ata āha -- śabdeti. yathā śabdārthasāmānyarūpeṇānyeṣāṃ pakṣāṇāṃ nirūpaṇaṃ bhavati, naivam iha bhavataḥ sambhavati. asādhāraṇarūpātirekiṇaḥ sāmānyātmano vācyasya
GSP28mimsvtku:5192: evaṃ tāvad dharmī vikalpya dūṣitaḥ. dharmam idānīṃ nirālambanatvaṃ vikalpya dūṣayati -- nirālambanateti. sarvathā nirālambanatve sādhye 'prasiddhaviśeṣaṇaḥ pakṣo bhavati. na hi sarvathā
GSP28mimsvtku:5195: dṛṣṭāntatayoktaḥ, so 'pi na sarvathā nirālambanaḥ. sarvatra yathākathañcidālambanasiddher vakṣyamāṇatvāt. ato dṛṣṭāntābhāvo 'py evaṃ satyāpadyeteti || 49 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5196: yadi tu na sarvathā nirālambanatvaṃ sādhyate. kin tu sālambanasyaiva kenāpi prakāreṇa nirālambanatvam apīty ucyate, tadā rasādijñānānāṃ rūpādyālambanaśūnyatayā siddhasādhanam ity āha -- kenacid iti || 50 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5197: nanu yadākārā buddhis tan nālambate iti sādhayiṣyāmaḥ na siddhasādhanaṃ bhaviṣyatīti, tad etadāśaṅkate -- atheti. etad api nirākaroti -- svākārasyeti. abhyupagato hi bhavadbhiḥ svākāro buddher ālambanaṃ yadābhāsaṃ[708]prameyaṃ tad iti vadadbhiḥ. atas tadālambanābhāvo 'bhyupetenaiva virudhyata iti || 51 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5200: nanu kim āpādya dūṣaṇodbhāvanam. bāhyānālambanatvaṃ hi naḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5201: pakṣaḥ. tathā ca bhāṣyopaskāre varṇitam eva. ato nābhyupetabādha ity ata āha -- bāhyeti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- vikalpanīyam idaṃ bāhyānālambanatvam.
GSP28mimsvtku:5202: kiṃ bāhyam ity anena rūpeṇa nālambata ity evaṃ sādhyate, vastuto vā bāhyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5203: nālambata iti. pūrvasmin pakṣe siddhasādhanam. parasmin doṣo vakṣyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:5204: stambhādidhiyo hi stambhādyākāratayaiva svaviṣayam ālambante na bāhyatayeti || 52 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5205: {2,49} yadi tu stambhānālambanatvam eva sādhyate, tatas tadrūpasaṃvedanasya dṛṣṭatvāt saṃvidvirodha evety āha -- tatheti || 53 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5206: atra codayati -- dvicandrādiṣv iti. evaṃ hi manyante -- samāno
GSP28mimsvtku:5207: 'yam anālambanatvābhimateṣu dvicandrādibodheṣu saṃvidvirodhaḥ. tatrāpi dvāv eva candrau bhāsete. tadapahnave sphuṭa eva saṃvidvirodhaḥ. ataḥ kena prakāreṇa teṣām anālambanatvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti. pariharati -- nendriyeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5208: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yadi vayaṃ pratibhāsaviparyāsād anyathātvaṃ brūmaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5209: tata evam upālabhyemahi. na tv evam. yad eva vijñānam indriyāprāptam arthaṃ prakāśayati tadanālambanam iti naḥ siddhāntaḥ. tathā ca dvicandrādijñānam. tato 'nālambanam ity ucyate. na
GSP28mimsvtku:5212: nanv evaṃ saṃvedanānapahnave yathāvabhāsam arthasya sattvāt sadasadviveko na syād ata āha -- sarvatreti. asyārthaḥ -- idaṃ sad grāhyam
GSP28mimsvtku:5213: idam asad grāhyam iti nāyam artha idam arthaṃ prakāśayati idaṃ neti. kin
GSP28mimsvtku:5215: indriyārthasaṃyogasadasattvato 'yaṃ vibhāgaḥ. yad indriyasamprayuktam arthaṃ prakāśayati tat sad grāhyam. viparītam anyat. na ca yathāvabhāsam
GSP28mimsvtku:5216: arthasya sattvam. bādhakadarśanāt. ato yad deśāntarastham indriyāprāptam arthaṃ gṛhṇāti tad asad grāhyam. tasyārtho nāstīty ucyate. kvacid dhi kiñcit pratiṣidhyate. na svarūpeṇaiva kiñcit. cedaṃ rajatam iti nāyam
GSP28mimsvtku:5217: arthaḥ{2,50} rajataṃ nāstīti. asti hi tad deśāntarādiṣu. kin tu iha
GSP28mimsvtku:5218: nāstīti yatrendriyeṇa na prāpyate, idam astīty api yad eva yatrendriyeṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:5219: prāpyate tad ucyate. iha ghaṭo 'stīti pratītiḥ na punar ghaṭo 'stīti || 55
GSP28mimsvtku:5220: na caiṣa vibhāgo bauddhasya sambhavatīty āha -- bhavata iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5221: na ca bauddhasyendriyādīni santi yat prāptyaprāptinibandhanaṃ bhāvālambanālambanapratiṣedhau yujyete iti || 56 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5222: dūṣaṇāntaram āha -- bahirbhāveti sādhyatentena. na hy anālambanajñānavādināṃ bahirbhāvo nāma kaścit siddhaḥ, yena viśiṣṭam anālambanatvaṃ buddheḥ sādhyata iti. kim iti na sādhyate, ata āha -- naiṣa
GSP28mimsvtku:5223: iti. pakṣaprajñāpanārthaṃ hi sādhanavacanaṃ, nacāprasiddhapadārthaviśiṣṭaḥ pakṣo jñāpayituṃ śakyata iti || 57 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5224: kiṃ punaḥ pakṣo na jñāyate. ajñāte viśeṣaṇaviśeṣye ca viśiṣṭo na jñāyate. tac cobhayam api prasiddham eveti kiṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5225: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣaṇāprasiddhyā, ata āha -- yatheti. viśeṣaṇāprasiddhāv eva kim. na tāvat pakṣasiddhiḥ, tathāvidham anyo bodhayituṃ na śakyata iti
GSP28mimsvtku:5226: cet, samānam idaṃ tadviśeṣaṇāprasiddhāv apīti tadviśeṣaṇāprasiddhau pakṣo
