GSP28mimsvtku:7625: pūrvottaraśabdasāmarthyaparāmarśena tv ekaparityāgenetaraparigrahāc chabdavirodhatayā prasiddhā iti tantrāntaraprasiddhivibhāgas tridhā śabdavirodha ity ucyate. paramārthena tu vedārthavacanaviparītārthapratijñaiva śabdena virudhyate. tatra hi pratiṣṭhitaṃ śabdasya prāmāṇyaṃ śaknoti viparītapratijño vārayitum. tac cānantaram ihaiva vakṣyāma iti || 61 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7626: tān eva trīn prakārān darśayati -- pratijñeti. tatra pratijñāvirodha evaikas tridhā bhidyata ity āha -- yāvad iti sārdhena.
GSP28mimsvtku:7627: ayam arthaḥ -- pratijñāvirodho hi svavāgvirodhaḥ. sa ca tredhā bhidyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7628: uccāraṇadharmadharmibhedāt. yāvajjīvam ahaṃ maunīti pakṣaḥ pratijñayaiva bādhyate. na hy anuktā satī pratijñā bhavati. uktimātreṇa ca maunaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7629: bādhyate. ataḥ pratijñāśarīrāntargatenoktimātreṇa bādhād bhavati pratijñayā bādhaḥ. sarvavākyamṛṣātvapakṣas tu dharmoktyā bādhyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7630: sarvamṛṣātve hi pratijñāvacanam api mṛṣeti netaranmṛṣā bhavet. tadamṛṣātve vā na sarvamithyātvam. tad iha pratijñāntargatadharmasaṃsargāsambhavaparāmarśāt pakṣabādha iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7631: dharmoktivirodhābhidhānam. pūrvatra tv aviśiṣṭamuktimātram eva maunaṃ bādhate ity uktimātreṇety uktam. ātmabādhanam iti. dharmabādhanam ity arthaḥ. dharma evāyukta ātmānaṃ bādhata iti yāvat. vandhyā me jananīti
GSP28mimsvtku:7632: pakṣo dharmyuktyā bādhyate. jananītve hy uddiṣṭamātre na{3,48}vandhyātvam
GSP28mimsvtku:7633: āspadaṃ labhate. na ca gauṇo jananīśabda ity api vaktavyam. ahaṃ yato jāta
GSP28mimsvtku:7634: iti viśeṣaṇāt. evaṃ viśeṣite pakṣe dharmyuktivirodha ity uktaṃ bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7635: etac cābhyupagamavādenoktam. na tu śrutismṛtyatirekīṇi jalpākavacanāni gauṇatvādibhis samīkartuṃ śakyante. sarvadūṣaṇocchedaprasaṅgāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:7636: pramādājñānajāny eva hi dūṣaṇāni bhavanti. teṣu kathañcit samādhīyamāneṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:7637: na kiñcid dūṣaṇaṃ nāma bhaved iti || 62 -- 63 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7638: pūrvasañjalpavirodham udāharati bauddhasyeti. anityaś śabda iti bauddhenokte kathaṃ kṣaṇikād agṛhītasambandhād arthapratyaya ity anuyuktena tenaiva yadā punar ucyate nityas tarhīti tadā tasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7640: bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ, tathāpy evaṃvidhā pūrvāparaviruddhā pratijñaivātmānaṃ na labhata iti na nyāyāvatāram apekṣate. sambhāvito hi pratijñāyām artho nyāyena sādhyate. asambhāvite tu nāyāpekṣā nāsty eva, svarasabhaṅguratvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:7641: ataś śabdavirodha evainam antarbhāvayati. śabdasandarbha eva hi tādṛśaḥ pūrvāparaviruddhaḥ pakṣaṃ vināśayatīti teṣām abhiprāya iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7642: sarvalokaprasiddhivirodhasyodāharaṇam āha -- candreti. atrāpi mahājanaviparītārthaś śabdasaṃsargaḥ svarasād eva bhajyate na pramāṇaṃ yāvadapekṣata iti śabdabādha udāhṛta iti || 64 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7643: upamānavirodhodāharaṇam āha -- jñāteti. yena hi nagare
GSP28mimsvtku:7644: gavākāro dṛṣṭaḥ samprati cāraṇye gavayākāraḥ, taṃ prati gaur gavayasadṛśo na bhavatīti pakṣa upamānena virudhyata iti.{3,49}parokṣe gavi sādṛśyam upameyam. pratyakṣe tu pratyakṣam eva. ata eva jñātagogavayākāram iti kramo vivakṣita iti || 65 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7645: arthāpattivirodham idānīṃ vivakṣan bhāṣyakārānusāreṇābhāvapūrvikāyās tāvadudāharaṇam āha -- geheti || 66 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7646: pratyakṣapūrvikām udāharati -- agnāv iti. adāhaka iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7647: atacchaktiyukta ity arthaḥ. anumānapūrvikām udāharati -- śabde cānabhidhāyaka iti. śabdaśravaṇānantaram arthapratītiṃ ceṣṭayānumāya tatra śabdaḥ kāraṇam ity unnīyate. atas sarvakārakāṇāṃ kriyāvinābhāvād
GSP28mimsvtku:7648: abhidhābhidhāno vyāpāraḥ, tadanupapattyā cārthāpattyā tacchaktisiddhir iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7649: tathendriyāpalāpapakṣo 'pi pratyakṣapūrvikayārthāpattyā virudhyata ity āha -- śrotreti. yady api pratyakṣapūrvikodāhṛtaiva tathāpi pakṣadoṣodbhāvanacchalenendriyāpalāpapakṣasyāpy ayaṃ doṣa iti vivakṣatā
GSP28mimsvtku:7650: punastadvirodho 'bhihitaḥ. atraivādiśabdenopamānapūrvikayā virodho darśayitavyaḥ -- yathā gavayopamitāyā gos tajjñānagrāhyaśaktyapahnava iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7652: arthābhidhānānyathānupapattyā hi vācakaśaktim arthāpattyā pramāya punastadanupapattyārthāpattyantareṇa śabdanityatvam avagamyata iti || 67
GSP28mimsvtku:7654: iti. kiṃ punar arthāpattiḥ prapañcenodāhriyate, tadvirodhapratipādanaṃ hi yayākayācid ekayāpi sidhyaty eva. tathā ca pramāṇāntaravirodheṣu prapañco na darśitaḥ. arthāpattivad vā pramāṇāntaravirodho 'pi prapañcena vācyaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7655: satyam. ṣoḍhā bhinnair eva ṣaḍbhir atra virodho vārtikakārasya vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7656: tatpradarśanārtham eva ṣaṭpramāṇaprasūtārthāpattir udāhṛtā. tenaiva tu mārgeṇa pramāṇāntareṣv api prapañco darśayitavyaḥ.{3,50}yathā tāvat pratyakṣabādha evānubhūtismṛtyanumānādibhiḥ ṣaṣṭhavarjaṃ ṣoḍhā bhidyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7657: svedyamānasya vādino 'nuṣṇo vahnir iti pratijñā anubhavasthenaiva pratyakṣeṇa virudhyate. anāsannāgnes tu saiva pratijñā smṛtisthena pratyakṣeṇa virudhyate, yadā khalv ayaṃ vādakāle 'nuṣṇo vahnir iti pratijānāti tadainam itaraḥ smārayati kiṃ na smarasi pūrvānubhūtam agner
GSP28mimsvtku:7658: uṣṇatvaṃ yad evam āttheti, sa tat smṛtvā tataḥ pratyakṣānnivartata iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7660: anumitapratyakṣabādhas tu yatrāptamukhe ceṣṭāviśeṣādarśanena tadavagatatiktādir asanivāraṇaṃ pratijñāyate, mukhavairūpyeṇa hi tasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7662: śrutapratyakṣabādhas tu yatra kenacid arthe kasmiṃścid apahnute sākṣibhir dṛṣṭo 'yam artha iti sākṣipratyakṣeṇa bādho 'bhidhīyate. na caiṣa śabdabādhaḥ. na hy atra tair artho 'bhidhīyate. kin tu darśanam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7663: atas taddarśanānusāry eva nirṇayaḥ. darśanaṃ tu taiḥ svaśabdena pratyāyyata iti śabdāvagatapratyakṣavirodha
GSP28mimsvtku:7664: upamānaṃ tu pramāṇāntaraprasiddhavastusādṛśyamātraviṣayam ity anyatas siddhasya sādṛśyaṃ gocarayati. yathā dātrādipratyabhijñāyāṃ yādṛśī
GSP28mimsvtku:7665: svātmani ceṣṭā dṛṣṭā tāṃ paratrāpi dṛṣṭvopaminoti mamevāsyāpi dātrādipratyabhijñā pratyakṣam utpannā, katham anyathā pūrvedyur
GSP28mimsvtku:7666: ardhakṛtakarmasamāpane paredyuḥ pravartate. iha ca ceṣṭayā tadanurūpaṃ paragocaram anumāya svajñānasādṛśyaṃ tatropamīyate. yady api cātrānumānāvagatapratyakṣabādha eva śakyo darśayitum, tathāpi svajñānasādṛśyaparicchede śakyaṃ darśayitum iti tadavagatapratyakṣabādho
GSP28mimsvtku:7668: arthāpattyavagatapratyakṣabādhas tv evaṃ darśayitavyaḥ. yadā hi bahuṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:7669: gacchatsu toyārthiṣu taṭākam ekas tadāharaṇāya prasthito vilambate tadā tadvilambanānyathānupapattyā tadīyaṃ toyapratyakṣam arthāpattyā pramīyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7671: bādhyate. abhāvena tu bhāvarūpaṃ pratyakṣaṃ nāvagamyata iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7672: tadanavagatapratyakṣavirodho nehodāhriyate. ṣoḍhā vibhaktam anumānabādhamataḥparam anusandhāsyāmaḥ -- dhūmāvagatavahnipratiṣedhe tāvat pratyakṣapūrvānumānabādhaḥ. dhūmānumitād eva bahner uṣṇatve 'numite
GSP28mimsvtku:7673: tadviparītapakṣo 'numitānumānena bādhyate. yatra tu devasya tveti
GSP28mimsvtku:7674: nirvapati{3,51}iti pratītaviniyogān mantraśeṣe 'numite tadviparītaḥ pakṣo gṛhyate, tatrāgamānumānabādhaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7675: nitye tu karmaṇi pravṛtte vrīhīṇām apacāre tatsadṛśeṣu nīvāreṣūpamiteṣu vrīhibhir yajeteti codanā nīvāraviṣayatvenānumīyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7676: vrīhyavayavā hi tadviṣayatayā jñātasambandhāstām anumāpayanti. na hi tasyāḥ svarūpeṇa vrīhayo viṣayabhūtāḥ, tadavayavās tu cūrṇībhūtā
GSP28mimsvtku:7677: vrīhiśāstrārthaḥ. te ca nīvāreṣv api santīti vrīhyavayavasāmānyopamitanīvāragāminī vrīhicodanānumīyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7682: pratyakṣaśabdabādhas tu tridhā darśita eva. anyo 'pi śrutismṛtibhyāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7684: kartṛsāmānyānumitaśabdaviruddhaḥ smṛtyadhikaraṇe darśitaḥ. śakyaṃ hy aṣṭakādayaḥ śabdamūlāḥ śāstrasthāryāvartanivāsikartṛkatvād agnihotrādivad ity anumātum. āgamikaśabdabādhas tu yatra śākhāntaragataśrutiviṣayavivāde smṛtinibandhanakārāṇāṃ vacanena śrutisadbhāvo niścīyate, tatra hy āptāgamāvagatanityāgamavirodho viparītapakṣasya sambhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7685: upamitaśabdavirodhas tu manvādismṛtibhyo 'rthāpattyā vaidikaṃ kim api
GSP28mimsvtku:7686: mūlam astīti kalpite smārtavākyasadṛśa eva mūla upamite rthavādamūlatvapakṣa upamitaśabdena bādhyate. viśvajidaphalatvapakṣas tu śrutārthāpattisiddhaśabdaviruddhaḥ. abhāvena tu śabdabhāvo 'vagantuṃ na śakyata iti śabdeyat tāvadhāraṇe tasya vyāpāraḥ tatrābhāvāvadhāritavidhikārtsyne jyotiṣṭāme prākṛtetikartavyatāprāptipakṣo
GSP28mimsvtku:7687: bādhyate. yathā vakṣyati -- kṛtsnavidhānād apūrvas soma iti. vrīhyabhāve tu nīvārāṇām agrāhyatāpakṣaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7688: anumānapūrvakopamānabādhas tu yadā hy ādityasya deśāntaraprāptyā gatim anumāya saṃvatsarādimadhyānteṣu tasyās sādṛśyam upamīyate. yādṛśy ekatra saṃvatsarādau tanmadhye vānte vā sūryagatiḥ tādṛśī vatsarānteṣv iti tatra
GSP28mimsvtku:7690: iti tu pakṣaś śabdapūrvakopamānaviruddhaḥ. sāmapūtīkayor hi sādṛśyaṃ na
GSP28mimsvtku:7691: pratyakṣam. na{3,52}cānumeyam. śabdenaiva tu somāṃśujātatvaṃ pūtīkānāṃ pratipādayatā kāryakāraṇayor aucityena sārūpyaṃ pratipāditam iti śabdāvagatakāryakāraṇaprabhavatvāt pūtīkānāṃ somasādṛśyopamānasya tadviparyayaḥ śabdapūrvakopamānaviruddho bhavati. jyotiṣṭomikā hi dharmās
GSP28mimsvtku:7692: satrāhīneṣu na bhavantīti pakṣa upamānopamānena bādhyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7693: jyotiṣṭomopamānena hi te dvādaśāhaṃ gacchanti dvādaśāhopamānena ca satrāhīnāv iti. yadā tv ātmendriyasādṛśyaviśiṣṭāni parendriyāṇy upamīyante tatra tanniṣedho 'rthāpattyupamānena bādhyate. vedakāranāstitā śaśaśṛṅgādyabhāvasadṛśī na bhavatīti pakṣo 'bhāvapūrvakopamānena bādhyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7694: dvayor apy abhāvenābhāve 'vagate sādṛśyam upamīyate. arthāpattivirodhas tu ṣaḍvidho varṇita eva. abhāvavirodhaṃ tv anantaram eva vakṣyāmaḥ || 68 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7695: abhāvavirodham idānīm udāharati -- śaśaśṛṅgādīti. ayaṃ ca pratyakṣābhāvavirodhaḥ. yadā tv amuṃ rāśiṃ sūryo gato na veti cintyamāne
GSP28mimsvtku:7696: gaṇitakuśalena gaṇitānumānābhāvān na gata ity avagate bhrānto gata iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7697: vadati. tatrānumānābhāvavirodhaḥ. caityavandanādidharmatvapakṣas tu śrutyādyāgamābhāvaviruddhaḥ. pūrvavanto darvīhomā iti tūpamānābhāvena
GSP28mimsvtku:7698: virudhyate, na hi teṣāṃ kenacit karmaṇā sādṛśyaṃ kathañcid avagamyata iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7699: palālakūṭakuñjarayos tu sādṛśyāstitāpakṣa upamānābhāvena virudhyate. tathā śabde śrotradeśam anāgacchati śrotre ca śabdadeśaṃ dhvanyāgamanamātreṇaiva śabdaśravaṇopapatter yo 'rthāpatyā śabdaś śabdāntaram ārabhate tataḥ krameṇāntyaḥ śrotreṇa gṛhyate ity anyathānupapattyā pratijānāti tatpratijñā arthāpattyabhāvena bādhyate. abhāvābhāvas tv evaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7700: darśayitavyaḥ -- yadā hi kartrabhāvena vedānāṃ doṣābhāvo vagato bhavati tadā doṣavatpakṣasyābhāvābhāvena bādha iti || 69 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7702: dharmadharmyubhayasvarūpasvaviśeṣabādhamataḥparaṃ vakṣyāma iti saṃkṣipya sukhagrahaṇārthaṃ śrotṛbuddhisamādhānārthaṃ{3,53}ca vṛttavartiṣyamāṇayos saṅkīrtanaṃ karoti -- evam iti sārdhena. śrutyarthākṣiptayor iti. svarūpaṃ tāvat sarvatra śrutyartha eva. tadviśeṣo 'py arthākṣiptaḥ. dharmadharmiṇor hi svarūpaṃ yena viśeṣeṇa vyāptaṃ tam ākṣipati. tac cānantaram eva
GSP28mimsvtku:7703: vakṣyata iti. śrutyarthaś cākṣiptaś ceti vigraha iti || 70 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7704: tatra dharmasvarūpabādho varṇita eveti tam akṛtvaiva tadviśeṣaṇabādham udāharati -- tṛṇādīti. yo hi tṛṇādivikāradarśanād
GSP28mimsvtku:7705: agnimaddhimaṃ sādhayati tasyābhāvena tāvaddharmasvarūpabādho bhavaty eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:7706: tadviśeṣaṇam apy uṣṇatvam arthākṣiptaṃ pratyakṣāvagatena śaityena
GSP28mimsvtku:7707: bādhyate. na ca vācyam anuṣṇo 'pi vahniḥ prabhāsu dṛṣṭa iti katham arthākṣipto viśeṣa iti. prabhāsv apy evaṃ vahnir uṣṇa eva, abhibhūtatvāt tu sparśo na gṛhyate, na punaruṣṇatāṃ jātu jahāti, svābhāvikī hi sā tasya.
GSP28mimsvtku:7708: na ca hime 'py abhibhūtatvād agrahaṇam iti vācyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7711: dharmiṇas tu dviprakāro 'pi bādho 'nukta eveti ubhayathā tadbādhodāharaṇam āha -- adharma iti sārdhena. hiṃsā kilādharma iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7712: sāmānyato 'vagatam. tad yadā vihito 'dharmo daikṣapaśuhiṃsādir yad duḥkhaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7713: karotīty anūdya tadalpam iti sādhyate, tadāpi vihitatvenādharmataiva bādhyate tadviśeṣo 'pi duḥkhanimittatvaṃ yadarthākṣiptaṃ tad api tenaiva bādhyate. na hi vihitaṃ nāma kim api duḥkhasya nidānaṃ bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7715: dharmisvarūpasvaviśeṣabādhaḥ. na cātra śrutyupātta eva svaviśeṣa iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7717: ubhayasyobhayavirodham udāharati -- ayathārtheti. yadā hi sarvajñānāni mithyeti sādhyate tadā dharmadharmigrāhiṇor api jñānayor mithyātvāt tadviśeṣaṇagrāhiṇoś ca mithyātvād bhavaty
GSP28mimsvtku:7718: ubhayasyaivobhayabādha iti. ayaṃ ca dharmoktyobhayabādha iti śabdabādha eva niveśanīya iti samadhigataṃ tāvad ubhayoḥ svarūpabādha iti || 74 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7719: kau punas tadviśeṣāv arthākṣiptau bādhyete. ata āha -- kṣaṇiketi.
GSP28mimsvtku:7720: bādhyete iti vipariṇamya sambandho darśayitavya iti. tatra caikadeśadarśanād ity ucyate. tatra ca darśanagrahaṇam atiricyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7721: ekadeśād ity eva vaktavyam. tad dhi liṅgaṃ na punardarśanam ato vyākhyeyam ekadeśadarśanād ity ata āha -- darśanād iti. ayam arthaḥ. naikadeśas sattāmātreṇa liṅgam. kin tu svapratipattau jñātaḥ parapratipādane ca
GSP28mimsvtku:7722: jñāpitaḥ. tad idam ubhayam upādātuṃ darśanagrahaṇam. śaknoti cobhayam upādātum, ṇijbhāvābhāvayor api nirdeśasādhāraṇyāt. svapratipattau tāvad ekadeśe dṛṣṭe buddhir anumānam ity arthaḥ. parārthaprayoge tu ṇijantadarśanapadam ekadeśaṃ darśayitvā yā buddhir jāyate sānumānam ity uktaṃ bhavati. tad idaṃ tatroccaritadarśanapadam arthadvaye vyākhyeyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7723: anena ca yatraikadeśe vādiprativādinor akasyobhayor vā saṃśayo
GSP28mimsvtku:7724: 'dhīrviparyayo vā bhavati so 'siddhābhidhāno hetvābhāso vyudasyate. na hy asau tādṛśaḥ parasmai darśayituṃ śakyate.{3,55}svayaṃ vā dṛṣṭo bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7725: adhīrajñānam ity arthaḥ. tatra dvayaviparyastodāharaṇam āha -- śaityād
GSP28mimsvtku:7726: iti. vahniśabdayor dvayor api śaityacākṣuṣatve vādiprativādinor viparyād
GSP28mimsvtku:7728: anyatarāsiddhodāharaṇam āha -- kṛtakatveti. yadā vaiśeṣiko yājñikaṃ prati śabdo 'nityaḥ kṛtakatvāt guṇatvād veti hetuṃ prayuṅkte,
GSP28mimsvtku:7729: tadāsau svarūpeṇa tasyāsiddho bhavati. yadā tu svayam evaṃprakāraṃ hetuṃ paraṃ prati vadati tadā tasyāsiddhiḥ. yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ dravyatvād ākāśavad iti. na hi vaiśeṣikāś śabdaṃ dravyam abhyupagacchanti
GSP28mimsvtku:7730: guṇatvābhyupagamāt. evaṃprakāra iti. parāsiddhaprakāra ity arthaḥ || 77 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7731: sandigdhāsiddham udāharati -- bāṣpādīti syādantena. yadā hi dhūmo bāṣpādibhāvena sandihyate dvābhyām ekena vā kiṃsvid ayaṃ rajasāmudgamo bāṣpo vā dhūmo veti tadā dvayor apy anyatarasa vā sandigdhāsiddho bhavati. evaṃ tāvat sandehaviparyayābhyām asiddhatodāhṛtā.
GSP28mimsvtku:7733: vādiprativādyubhayais trayaḥ prakārā iti. evaṃ tāvat svarūpato hetur asiddho bhavatīty uktam ity āha -- evam iti || 78 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7734: āśrayāsiddhatāpy etair eva jñānādibhir vādiprativādyubhayāpekṣais tridhā bhidyata ity āha -- eta eveti || 79 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7735: nanu svarūpāsiddhyā hetur duṣyet āśrayāsiddhyā tu kas tasya doṣaḥ ata āha -- jñāte 'pīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na svarūpeṇa hetur
GSP28mimsvtku:7736: gamakaḥ, api tu{3,56}pakṣadharmatayā jñātaḥ. na cāprasiddhāśrayas taddharmatayā jñātuṃ śakyate. śaityacākṣuṣatvayor api pakṣadharmatvāsiddhyaivāhetutvam. siddhaṃ hi svarūpeṇa jale śaityaṃ rūparūpirūpaikārthasamavāyiṣu ca cākṣuṣatvam. śabdā(dau) hi pakṣadharmatayā tu tayor asiddhatvam iti taddharmarūpābhiprāyeṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:7737: svarūpāsiddhavacanam. ata āśrayāsiddhāv api pakṣadharmatvāsiddher ahetutvaṃ yuktam eveti || tām idānīm āśrayāsiddhim udāharati -- sarvatreti asiddhāntena.
GSP28mimsvtku:7738: yadā hi bauddhaṃ prati sarvatra kāryopalambhād ātmanas sarvagatatvaṃ mīmāṃsakās sādhayanti, tadānyatarāsiddhāśrayo hetur bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7739: bauddhasyātmano 'siddher iti. yas tu pramāṇagatim ajānāno laukikaḥ kaścid
GSP28mimsvtku:7740: ātmani saṃśete, tasminn eva hetāv ucyamāne sandigdhāśrayo hetur ity āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7741: laukikāder iti. ātmani saṃśaya ity arthaḥ. ādiśabdena satīrthikānām api
GSP28mimsvtku:7742: yeṣām ātmani saṃśayaḥ ta upādriyante. evaṃ saṃśayaviparyayābhyām āśrayāsiddhir uktā. ajñānenāpy āśrayāsiddhir aprasiddhapadaprayoge
GSP28mimsvtku:7743: darśayitavyā. yasya hi pakṣavacanaś śabdo na prasiddhas taṃ pratyevaṃjātīyake hetāv ucyamāne 'jñānenāśrayāsiddhir iti || 80 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7744: nanu yady anyatarāsiddhyā hetur duṣyati, evaṃ tarhy amūrtatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:7745: ātmā niṣkriya ityevamāder api hetutvaṃ na syāt digambarāṇām ātmano
GSP28mimsvtku:7746: 'mūrtatvāsiddheḥ. mūrtaṃ hi te śarīrapariṇāmam ātmānaṃ manyante.
GSP28mimsvtku:7747: akartṛkatvān nityo veda iti ca bauddhānāṃ tadasiddher ahetuḥ. śabdo
GSP28mimsvtku:7748: 'nityaḥ kṛtakatvād iti mīmāṃsakānām asiddheḥ. tad eva hetur nāma na kaścit
GSP28mimsvtku:7749: vyavatiṣṭhate. ata āha -- vāṅmātreti. ayam arthaḥ -- nāsiddho mameti vāṅmātrād dhetur asiddho bhavati. tathā sati na kaścid anumānavyavahāraḥ prakalpeta. dvābhyāṃ tu vādiprativādibhyām
GSP28mimsvtku:7750: asattvenāvadhārito{3,57}siddhobhavati, tasyaiva tathāvidhasyāsiddhatāvacanaṃ vādino dūṣaṇaṃ bhavati nāsiddha iti vākpravṛttimātrād iti || 81 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7751: nanu kim idaṃ dvayor asiddho 'siddha iti, na hi vivadamānayor
GSP28mimsvtku:7752: ekatrārthe sampratipattir bhavati, na hi janmasahasreṇāpi bauddho vedānām akartṛkatvaṃ manyate, mīmāṃsako vāpi kaṇṭhagataprāṇo 'pi kṛtakatāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7753: śabdasya. tad evamādāv ubhayasampratipater abhāvān na hetubhāvo
GSP28mimsvtku:7754: 'vatiṣṭhate. ata āha -- itarad iti, ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na dvayor asaṃpratipattir ity etāvataiva sādhanadūṣaṇayor anavakḷptiḥ. yadi vādinā prayukte sādhane prativādinā cāsiddhatva udbhāvite vādinā tatsādhanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7755: sādhyate, tato bhavati sādhanam. yadi tu paramārthopapattyabhidhānena
GSP28mimsvtku:7756: prativādinā nirākriyate tatas tasya dūṣaṇaṃ sidhyati. tatpramāṇatas siddhir evātropayujyate nobhayābhyupagamaḥ. dvābhyāṃ yo 'sattvato jñāta ity api pramāṇasiddhyabhiprāyeṇoktam, nābhyupagamamātrāpekṣayā. yad dhi pramāṇena sādhyate bādhyate vā tatra prāyeṇobhayasampratipattir dṛṣṭeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7757: asattvato jñātāpekṣayetaracchabdaḥ. yad vādinā sattvena jñātaṃ bhavati prativādinā ca vaiparītyena, tadvādinā sādhyamānaṃ sādhanaṃ bhavati. etac ca jalpanyāye sthitvoktam. vāde tu dvayor api sampratipattir bhavaty
GSP28mimsvtku:7758: eveti. na caivam anyatarāsiddhir adūṣaṇam, yāvat tu yādī na sādhanaṃ sādhayati, tāvad anyatarāsiddhyā nigṛhyate, sādhite tu tasmin dūṣaṇaṃ parihṛtaṃ bhavatīti || 82 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7761: sandehaviparītahetvor hi na saṃbandho jñāto bhavati, na hi sādhāraṇas
GSP28mimsvtku:7762: saṃśayahetuḥ prameyatvaṃ nityatvena jñātasambandham iti śakyate vaktum,
GSP28mimsvtku:7763: dhaṭādiṣv anityatayāpi jñātasambandhatvāt nāpi kṛtakatvaṃ nityatayā, teṣv evānityatayā sambandhasaṃvitteḥ. atas tajjātīyam ubhayaṃ na jñātasaṃbandham iti jñātasaṃbandhapadena vyudasyati. atra cāsannikṛṣṭapadāt prabhuti prātilomyena vārtikakṛtā lakṣaṇagranthe
GSP28mimsvtku:7764: viśeṣaṇopādānaphalam uktam u,{3,58} tat kasya hetoḥ. pratītikramānusāreṇa.
GSP28mimsvtku:7765: prabhātā hi prathamaṃ pakṣaṃ pratyeti, tato hetum apekṣate, tato
GSP28mimsvtku:7766: dṛṣṭāntavacanam, ato 'satpakṣanirākaraṇārthaṃ prayuktam asannikṛṣṭapadam eva tāvad upavarṇitam. tato hetupadam ekadeśadarśanād iti, tato jñātasambandhasyeti dṛṣṭāntavacanam. dṛṣṭānte hi hetos sambandho jñāyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7767: ata eva dṛṣṭāntadoṣā api sādhyahetuvikalatvādayo 'nena nirākriyante.
GSP28mimsvtku:7768: tadvaikalye 'pi svayaṃ sambandho jñātuṃ parasmai pratipādayituṃ śakyata
GSP28mimsvtku:7769: iti. kiyantaḥ punas saṃśayahetavaḥ, ata āha -- traya iti || 83 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7770: tān eva trīn prakārān darśayati -- sann iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7771: sādhyatadabhāvayos san sādhāraṇo 'bhidhīyate. yathā prameyatvaṃ nityānityatvayoḥ. dvābhyāṃ sādhyatadabhāvābhyāṃ vyāvṛtto 'sādhāraṇaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7772: kṣiter eva gandhavattvam. vyāvṛttaṃ hi tat
GSP28mimsvtku:7773: sakalasajātīyavijātīyadravyāntaraguṇakarmabhyaḥ. dvau viruddhārthasambandhāv iti. yau viruddhāvyabhicārīti parair abhihitau, tau cānantaram evodāhāryāv iti neha vyākhyāyete iti || 84 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7775: ete ca dharmās sādhyatadabhāvayos sādhāraṇā ity arthaḥ || 85 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7776: keṣu punassādhyeṣu teṣāṃ sādhāraṇyam ata āha -- nityeti
GSP28mimsvtku:7777: nityeṣvantena. kathaṃ punarvaiṣamye yathāsaṅkhyam ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7778: dviranityateti. anityatā svasthāne dviḥ paṭhitavyā. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:7779: yathāsaṅkhyopapattiḥ. tad ayam arthaḥ -- yadā nityaś śabdaḥ prameyatvād iti prayujyate tadā prameyatvaṃ sādhyatadabhāvayor dṛṣṭam iti sādhāraṇatvān naikāntāya prabhavati. ato naikāntikam ity ucyate. ata eva ca saṃśayahetuḥ. saṃśayo hi sāmānyapratyakṣād viśeṣāpratyakṣād viśeṣasmṛteś ca bhavati. yathā sthāṇupuruṣayor ārohapariṇāhasāmānyadarśanād{3,59}bhedakadharmānavadhāraṇāś ca viśeṣasmṛtyapekṣaḥ kiṃsvid ayaṃ sthāṇur āhosvit puruṣa ity anavadhāraṇajñānātmakas saṃśayo jāyate. evaṃ prameyatvam api nityānityayos sāmānyaṃ viditavatastadviśeṣaṇasmaraṇāpekṣas tayor evānirdhāraṇātmakaḥ pratyayas saṃśayāparanāmā jāyata iti prameyatvaṃ saṃśayahetuḥ. ayaṃ ca kṛtsnobhayavyāpīsaṃśayahetuḥ. tathāyatnotthaś śabdaḥ anityatvād ity ayam api sādhāraṇa eva. ayatnottheṣu keṣucid vidyudādiṣu gatatvād yatnottheṣu ca sarveṣu ghaṭādiṣu vṛtteḥ. tad ayaṃ sakalavipakṣavyāpī
GSP28mimsvtku:7780: sapakṣaikadeśagata iti veditavyam. tathā yatnotthaś śabdaḥ anityatvād iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:7781: yatnottheṣu sarveṣv evānityatā dṛṣṭā. tadabhāve 'pi kvacin meghādau dṛṣṭā,
GSP28mimsvtku:7782: na vyomādau iti, sakalasapakṣavyāpī vipakṣaikadeśavartī cāyaṃ sādhāraṇa ity avasātavyam. ubhayaikadeśagatas tu yathā nityaś śabdaḥ amūrtatvād iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7783: amūrtatā hi na sarvanityavyāpinī vyomādiṣu bhāvād aṇuṣu cābhāvād anityam api na sarvaṃ vyāpnoti ghaṭakuḍyādiṣv abhāvāt karmādiṣu bhāvāt. sarvatra cātra dvayavṛttitvam eva hetos saṃśaye kāraṇam avṛttyaṃśas tu sann api na
GSP28mimsvtku:7784: kāraṇam ity atantram. ata eva sādhāraṇasya caturdhā vibhāgaṃ vadanti ye teṣām asāv anupayogy eva sādhanadūṣaṇayor ity upekṣaṇīyam, na hi sādhanavacanakāle tathāvidhaṃ hetuṃ parityajato vādinas sapakṣavipakṣayor
GSP28mimsvtku:7785: avṛttyaṃśaḥ kvacid upayujyate. aṇvāpi hi mātrayā vipakṣe vartamāno hetur
GSP28mimsvtku:7786: atyājya eva. dūṣaṇavādino 'pi vipakṣavṛttimātraṃ vacanīyam iti kiṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7787: tadavāntaraviśeṣāśrayaṇena. vārttikakāreṇāpi sarvasādhāraṇeṣu dvayavṛttitvam eva saṃśayakāraṇam iti darśayitum udāharaṇaprapañco
GSP28mimsvtku:7788: darśitaḥ, na punaś cāturvidhyam abhipretya. yathāha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7790: tyajyate sādhane caivaṃ sādhāraṇyād viśeṣataḥ || iti || 85 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7792: udāharati -- nityā bhūr iti. gandho hi pṛthivyāḥ svāsādhāraṇo guṇaḥ, na tāṃ vihāya nityam anityaṃ vā bhāvāntaram āśrayatīty asādhāraṇa iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7793: gīyate.{3,60} āha -- astv asādhāraṇaṃ gandhavattvaṃ, kathaṃ tu saṃśayahetuḥ, yuktaṃ hi pakṣadvayāv alambī sādhāraṇo dvayor
GSP28mimsvtku:7794: anavasthādhiyam ādadhāno yatsaṃśayahetur iti, asādhāraṇas tu dvābhyāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7795: vyāvṛtto naikatrāpi dhiyam upajanayitum alam iti katham asya saṃśayahetubhāvaḥ, ata āha -- niścayeti. hetor hi niścayajanane
GSP28mimsvtku:7796: 'nyayavyatirekāv aṅgam anyatarāpīye 'pi na niścayāya hetuḥ paryāpto
GSP28mimsvtku:7797: bhavati. tad yathā sādhāraṇo 'nvayasanātho 'pi vinākṛto vyatirekeṇa na
GSP28mimsvtku:7798: niścayāya prabhavati, evam evāsādharaṇo 'pi niścayasyaikenānvayanāmnāṅgena vikalas tam akurvan saṃśayahetutāṃ pratipadyata iti || 86 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7799: nanūktaṃ sādhāraṇo dvayagāmī dvaye buddhiṃ janayan saṃśayae hetur iti. asādhāraṇas tu na kiñcid jñāpayatīti nāsāv
GSP28mimsvtku:7800: ekāṅgavikalatāmātreṇa saṃśayahetur iti yuktam ata āha -- sādhāraṇa iti dvayena. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- sādhāraṇo 'pi nobhayatra buddhijananāt saṃśayahetuḥ, kin tu viruddhobhayapratipādanamukhena, viruddhe hy ubhayasmin pratipādite tayor ekatra samavāyāsambhavād vyāghātād eva saṃśayo bhavati. tac cāsādhāraṇe 'py aviśiṣṭam, asādhāraṇo 'pi hy ubhayasmād vyāvṛttes tadabhāvaṃ gamayan dvayābhāvāsambhavād eva saṃśayaṃ janayati. na hi sambhavati nityam anityaṃ ca vastu na bhavatīti,
GSP28mimsvtku:7801: dharmadvandvair eva hi nityānityatvādibhis sarvaṃ jagadavasthitam. ata ubhayābhāvo virudhyate. na cobhayabhāvaḥ, virodhād eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:7802: nacānyataraparigraho 'viśeṣāt. tam imaṃ saṅkaṭam āsādya prāmāṇikas saṃśete. ayaṃ cātrāvayavārthaḥ -- yathā prameyatvādis sādhāraṇo dṛṣṭas san buddhidvayanimittakaḥ. buddhidvayaṃ saṃśaye nimittam asthāstīti
GSP28mimsvtku:7803: bahuvrīhiḥ, nimittaśabdena ca buddhidvayasya nimittamātratāṃ kathayati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7804: sādhyatadabhāvaviṣayaṃ hi buddhidvayaṃ nimittīkṛtya viruddhaikānavāpter eva sādhāraṇena saṃśayo janyate. na hi parasparaviruddhābhyāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7806: viruddhadharmādhyāso dṛṣṭaḥ. yathā nityaṃ vyoma anityaṃ kāryadravyam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7807: ato 'smāt pratīti???ātād eva sādhāraṇena saṃśayo janyate. sa cāyam asādhāraṇasyāpi samānaḥ. so 'pi hi yatra nitye 'nitye vā nāsti tadabhāvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7808: pratipādya tanmukhena dvayasattvavirodham āpādayan saṃśayakāraṇaṃ bhavatīti. idaṃ cāsādhāraṇasya saṃśayahetutvaṃ nānumanyante. avyavasthayā hy ubhayasmin manasi viparivartamāne saṃśayo bhavati. na cāsādhāraṇena kiñcid buddhāvādhīyate, tasya kenacid anvayābhāvāt. api ca parimiteṣv eva bhāveṣu saṃśayo dṛṣṭaḥ. nivṛttimukhena tu saṃśayajanane sarvato nivṛttenāsādhāraṇena sarvatomukhas saṃśayo janyeta. na ca sarvaviṣayaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7809: saṃśayo dṛṣṭacaraḥ. tasya buddhāv anārohāt. na ca kvacin nivṛttimātreṇa sarvatrābhāvaś śakyate 'vagantum, yanmukhena saṃśayo bhavet. na hy anuvṛttāv adṛṣṭāyāṃ vyāvṛttis sidhyati. agnāv anuvartamāno hi dhūmo dṛṣṭavyatireko 'gniniyatasvabhāvatvenāvagato 'rthād adṛśyamānebhyo
GSP28mimsvtku:7810: 'nagnibhyo vyatiricyata ity avagamyate. yas tu na kenacid anvitas tasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7811: katham anupalabdhiyogyāt sarvato vyatirekaḥ pratīyeta. tato nānena prakāreṇāsādhāraṇasya saṃśayahetutvam. yadi tv asādhāraṇadharmāṇo bhāvā nityānityabhāvabhājo dṛṣṭā iti kṣitim api taddharmikām upalabhya nityā vā syād anityā veti saṃśayo bhavatīty ucyate. evaṃ tarhy asādhāraṇadharmatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:7812: eva bahusādhāraṇāt saṃśayo nāsādhāraṇāt, anyo hy asādharaṇadharmaḥ anyathā ca bahusādhāraṇī tadvattā. tad yady asau saṃśayakāraṇaṃ jātā kiṃ jātam
GSP28mimsvtku:7813: asādhāraṇasya. hantaivaṃ sādhāraṇa eva saṃśayahetur abhyupagato bhavatīti
GSP28mimsvtku:7814: siddham. nāsādhāraṇasya saṃśayahetutvam. anyan matam -- anadhyavasāyahetur evāyam iti. asti kilānadhyavasāyo nāma jñānasya prakāraḥ. so 'nena
GSP28mimsvtku:7815: janyate. bhavati hi tādṛgdharmadṛśaḥ kimbhūtasyāsya dharmo 'yam ity anadhyavasitāv abhāsapratyayaḥ. na caiva pramāṇam, aniścayātmakatvāt. na ca saṃśayaḥ pakṣadvayāsaṃsparśāt. so 'yam evaṃvidhān adhyavasāyo 'sādhāraṇena janyata iti. na tv etad ghaṭate. na hy anadhyavasāyo nāma kaścid jñānasya prakāraḥ, yam ayaṃ janayet. adhyavasāyābhāvo
GSP28mimsvtku:7816: 'nadhyavasāyaḥ. sa ca prāgabhāvarūpatvān na janyaḥ. athānyamātravacano nañ agrāhyaṇādivad iṣyate tato 'dhyavasāyād anyas saṃśaya{3,62}eva
GSP28mimsvtku:7817: tacchabdavācyo bhavet. na ca taddhetur asādhāraṇa iti phaṇitam eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:7818: athādharmādivad viparītavacano nañ, evaṃ sati viparyayavācyo
GSP28mimsvtku:7819: 'nadhyavasāyaśabdo bhavet, na ca viparītāvagraho 'sādhāraṇena janyata iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7820: yadi tu na me 'smin vastuny adhyavasāyo 'stīty adhyavasāyābhāvāvadhāraṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:7822: tatra hetor na vyāpāraḥ. ato jijñāsāmātrahetur asādhāraṇa iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7823: samarthanīyam. bhavati hi taddarśinaḥ kīdṛgdharmo 'yam ito dharmād bhāvo
GSP28mimsvtku:7824: bhaved iti jijñāsā. yady api cāsauśuddhadharmidarśanād api kadācid bhavaty
GSP28mimsvtku:7825: eva tathāpi dharmadvāreṇāpi tāvad bhavaty eveti na taddhetutvam anupapannam. āha ca --
GSP28mimsvtku:7827: sāmānyāt saṃśayo yuktas tathā sa pratisādhanāt || iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7828: yat tv ihāsādhāraṇasya saṃśayahetutvam uktaṃ tatparamatam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7829: jñātasambandhapadasya hi vyāvartanīyam atra darśayitum abhipretam, tat saṃśayahetutve 'py asādhāraṇasya ghaṭata eva. bhavatu tāvad ayaṃ yasya kasyacid dhetuḥ. sarvathā jñātasambandhapadena vyudasyata iti tātparyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7830: śākyās tu saṃśayahetum asādhāraṇaṃ manyante, udāharanti ca śabdānityatve
GSP28mimsvtku:7834: iti. idaṃ ca vārttikakṛtaiva pradeśāntare svayam upanyasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7836: kiṃ punarudāhṛtānāṃ svābhāvikam eva saṃśayahetutvaṃ nety āha
GSP28mimsvtku:7838: kāraṇam āha -- nirṇayasyeti labdhvāntena. kva drṣṭam ata āha
GSP28mimsvtku:7839: -- niṣkriyeti. amūrtatā hi nityatve sādhye nityānityavyomakarmasādhāraṇī saṃśayahetur āsīt, saiva tu niṣkriyatve sādhye labdhvānvayavyatirekau hetutāṃ{3,63}pratipadyate. vyāptaṃ hy amūrtatvaṃ niṣkriyatvena. na hy amūrtaṃ gaganam ātmā vā parispandate. na caivaṃ tadvatāṃ rathādīnām amūrtatvaṃ dṛṣṭam iti || 90 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7841: gandhaviśeṣadarśino hi viditavyāpteḥ kṣityekadeśasiddhatve bhavatyānumāniko nirṇaya iti || dvau viruddhārthasambandhāv ekatraikadeśini saṃśaye hetur ity
GSP28mimsvtku:7842: uktam. tatrodāharaṇam āha -- yatreti. yatra hi na sākṣātkārijñānaviṣayo vāyuḥ arūpatvād ity ekas sādhayati. aparo 'pi sparśāt tadviparyayam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7843: tatrāsau viruddhāvyabhicāritā bhavatīti śākyair abhihitam. tatra tulyabalobhayahetusannipātāt saṃśayaḥ. dvayor api sādhanayoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7844: prasiddhāvayavatvāviśeṣāt. arūpaṃ hy arūpisamavetam apratyakṣam iti kāṇādā
GSP28mimsvtku:7845: manyante. tathā ca vāyuḥ. ato na pratyakṣaḥ. karmasvarūpam api rūpaikārthasamavāyāc cākṣuṣam ācakṣate. evaṃ sparśo 'pi vāyoḥ prasiddha eva. prasiddhavyāptikaś cāparokṣatvena. atas tulyabalatvam. tataś ca saṃśayaḥ, viruddhayor ekatropānapātāsambhavāt, samuccayānupapatteḥ, siddhe ca vastuni vikalpāsambhavāt bādhyabādhakam āvasyāpi tulyakakṣyatvāt. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:7846: 'navasthayobhayasmin pariplavamāne bhavati saṃśayaḥ. tādātmyāt. tasya balābalaviśeṣe tv anumānavirodho varṇita eva. yathā sarvajño 'stīti
GSP28mimsvtku:7847: buddhavacanaṃ samyak taduktatvād kṣaṇabhaṅgādivākyavad ity ekenokte 'paraḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7848: prabravīti buddho 'sarvajña iti madvacanaṃ samyak maduktatvāt yathā jyotir
GSP28mimsvtku:7849: uṣṇa?āpo dravā iti. atra maduktatvam ubhayor api siddham. buddhoktatā tu na naḥ prasiddhā, ato 'prasiddhāṅgakatvāt pūrvaṃ sādhanaṃ balavatā
GSP28mimsvtku:7850: prasiddhāṅgakena bādhyate. yat tu viruddhāvyabhicārīti dvayor ekavacanāntam abhidhānaṃ ta???????nyāmahe. viruddhāvyabhicārī saṃśaye hetur iti śākyā vadanti. na??kasya saṃśayahetutvam anyataraparicchedāt. na ca samudāyābhiprāyam ekavacanam. tasya viruddhatvāvyabhicāripadānās padatvāt. sa hy aṃśābhyāṃ vyabhicāry eva. dvau tu viruddhāvyabhicāriṇāv
GSP28mimsvtku:7851: iti vaktavyam. na tv ekavacanena. yadi pratihetu{3,64}viruddham artham ekaiko na vyabhicaratīti viruddhāvyabhicārīty ucyate. tad astu. na tv ekaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7852: saṃśaye hetur ity uktam. ata eva vārtikakāreṇa dvau viruddhārthasambandhau saṃśayahetū iti dvivacanāntenaiva nāmnāṃ saṃśayahetubhāvo darśitaḥ. ihāpi viruddhāvyabhicāritety etāvad evoktam. na tu viruddhāvyabhicārī
GSP28mimsvtku:7853: saṃśayahetur iti. tad atra yogyatayānayor viruddhāvyabhicāriteti
GSP28mimsvtku:7854: vyākhyeyam. dvau viruddhāvyabhicāriṇāv iti yāvad iti || 91 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7855: imāṃ ca viruddhāvyabhicāritāṃ saṃśayahetuṃ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇābhyāṃ jātyantaram eke varṇayanti. apare punas samudāyasyāṃśābhyāṃ sādhāraṇapakṣanikṣepam. anye tu samastam idaṃ militam ubhayaṃ naikatrāpy anugatam ity ananvayam asādhāraṇam evāsthiṣata ity āha
GSP28mimsvtku:7856: -- kecid iti. atra ca pradeśāntare vārtikakṛtā sādhāraṇya evāsthā darśitā.
GSP28mimsvtku:7858: sādhāraṇyān na naitasya bhedaḥ kaścana vidyate |
GSP28mimsvtku:7860: iti. na ca vācyaṃ dvayasyānanvayād asādhāraṇa evāyam iti. yadi hy ekena
GSP28mimsvtku:7861: dvayaṃ prayujyeta tato bhaved apy evaṃ, pratyekam anvitau dṛṣṭau dvābhyāṃ prayuktau nānanvitāv iti śakyate vaktum. api cāsādhāraṇatve saṃśayahetubhāvo nopapadyetaṃ. tasya nirākṛtapūrvatvāt. atas sādhāraṇa evāyam iti. vayaṃ tu jātyantaram eva sādhīyo manyāmahe. yathā hi na dvayam ekena prayuktam iti nāsādhāraṇatvam. evaṃ sādhāraṇatvam api na syād eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:7862: kiṃ khalv atra sādhāraṇam. ekaikasyaikaikena vyāptasyaikaikena prayogāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:7863: aṃśatas sādhāraṇasya ca samudāyasyāprayogāt. ata eva cātra sādhāraṇād bhedena pratihetu viruddhayos saṃśayahetutvam uktam. itarathā tenaiva gatatvān na pṛthagupādīyeta. saṃśayajananaprakāro 'pi cātra bhidyata eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:7864: sādhāraṇo hy ubhayadṛṣṭas tu pratītimādadhānas saṃśayahetur imau tv ekaikaśyenobhayam upasthāpayantau saṃśayahetū iti vārtikakāreṇāpi sādhāraṇapade sthita ity uktam, na sādhāraṇa eveti || 92 {3,65} kathaṃ punar evaṃjātīyake viṣaye nirṇayaḥ, ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7865: pratijñeti nirṇayāntena. pakṣabādhoktaiḥ pratyakṣādibhiḥ pramāṇair yasya sādhanavākyāvayavapratijñā bādhyate tatparājayenetarasya nirṇayaḥ kāryaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7866: yathehaiva tāvat udāharaṇe tvagindriyavyāpāreṇa vāyāvaparokṣam anubhūyamāne tenaivānubhavena parokṣatāpakṣo bādhyate. na hi nas
GSP28mimsvtku:7867: tvagindriyabhuvastoyapratyakṣād vāyupratyakṣaṃ viśiṣyate. na hīhānadhiṣṭhānaṃ sparśamātram anubhūyate. api tu tadadhikaraṇaṃ dravyam
GSP28mimsvtku:7868: api. na hi prabalena marutābhihanyamānasya jalaṃ vā śliṣyatas saṃvid viśiṣyate. ato 'kṣasambandhaphalānusārāt pratyakṣo vāyur iti niścīyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7869: kvacic cāgamena viṣayāpahāro bhavati. yathā śuci naraśiraḥkapālaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7871: sādhayati, prāṇyudbhūtatvād uccārādivad iti. tatra pūrvapratijñāyā āgamena
GSP28mimsvtku:7872: viṣayāpahārād uttareṇārthanirṇayo bhavati. śucītaraviveke hy āgama eva
GSP28mimsvtku:7873: śaraṇam. tasmin paripanthini na śucitvānumānam ātmānaṃ labhate. smaranti hi --
GSP28mimsvtku:7874: nāraṃ spṛṣṭvāsthi sasnehaṃ savāsā jalam āviśet |
GSP28mimsvtku:7875: iti. rudro hi mahāvrataṃ cacāra sa etacchavaśīrṣam upadadhāreti tv arthavādamātraṃ na śavaśirodhāraṇavidhiḥ. atra ca pratyakṣādīny eva yathāsvam arthaṃ sādhayantīti sādhanapadenocyanta iti. kathaṃ punaḥ pratyakṣādīny eva pratijñābādhanāyotsahante. teṣv api sāmānyato darśanena bādhasya śaṅkyamānatvād ata āha -- bādhavarjanād iti. na tāvat teṣu bādho
GSP28mimsvtku:7876: dṛśyate, kadācid bādhasambhāvanā tu na teṣāṃ prāmāṇyam utsārayatīti || 93
GSP28mimsvtku:7877: atra bhikṣuṇā pakṣadharmas tadaṃśena vyāpto hetur ity ekavacanena vivakṣitaikasaṅkhya eka eva hetur iti darśitam. ata eva viruddhāvyabhicāriṇor na hetutvam anekatvāt tayor iti. na caitat ghaṭate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7878: na hi pratihetu{3,66}viruddhayor anekatvaṃ saṃśayahetutve hetuḥ, api tarhi parasparaviruddhārthopaplāvakatvam eva. viruddhau hi dvābhyāṃ dvāv arthāv ekatropaplāvitāv iti tatra saṃśerate, na tu hetvanekatvāt. saṃśayahetvor api pratyekam avagatayor ubhayasamāveśād eva kvacin nirṇayo dṛṣṭaḥ. yathā
GSP28mimsvtku:7879: ūrdhvatākākavattvayoḥ. kevalā hy ūrdhvatā sthāṇupuruṣasādhāraṇī nānyataranirṇayāya prabhavati. kākanilayanasahakṛtā tu saiva sthāṇur ayam iti niścāyayati. tad atraikasyaiva saṃśayahetutvaṃ dvābhyām eva tu nirṇaya ity aprayojakaṃ saṃśayahetutve dvitvaṃ, viruddhānekasādhyatvam eva saṃśayahetuḥ. yathā khalv eka eva sādhāraṇas sapakṣavipakṣayor vartamānas saṃśayahetur bhavati. evaṃ viruddhārthasyāpi hetudvayasyāṃśābhyām
GSP28mimsvtku:7880: ubhayavṛttir eva saṃśaye kāraṇam iti na taddvitvena hetutvanirākaraṇaṃ yuktam ity āha -- kvacid iti. nanu yuktaṃ tāvadūrdhvatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:7881: sthāṇupuruṣasandeho bhavatīti, kākavattāmātreṇa na saṃśayo dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7882: satyam. yas tu kākavattāmātreṇa sthāṇuṃ siṣādhayiṣati tasyāsau kevalā
GSP28mimsvtku:7883: saṃśayahetuḥ, ūrdhvatāsanāthā tu nirṇāyikety etāvad eva vivakṣitam ity adoṣa iti. api ca avirodhinoḥ pratyekaṃ saṃhatayor api kvacid arthe sādhye
GSP28mimsvtku:7884: hetubhāvo dṛśyate. yathaikasminn eva śābdasya jñānasyānumānatve
GSP28mimsvtku:7886: aikaikaśyena samastābhyāṃ cānumānatvaṃ sādhayitum. dvitve ca hetvābhāsatvakāraṇe naikasmin sādhye 'nekahetavaḥ prayujyeran. prayoktāras tv ekam eva sādhyaṃ kiñcānyad itaś ceti nānāsādhanais sādhayanto dṛśyante.
GSP28mimsvtku:7887: tasmād virodhanibandhana eva saṃśayaḥ, na tu nānātvanibandhana ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- pratyekam iti. pūrvaṃ tu pratyekaṃ saṃśayahetvor eva militayor nirṇayahetutvam uktam. atra tu pratyekaṃ gamakāv api saṃhatau ca gamakāv iti pratipāditam iti || 95 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7888: tasmād viruddhārthāv eva bhinnau saṃśayahetutvena darśanīyau.
GSP28mimsvtku:7889: yathāsmābhir uktaṃ na tu bhinnatāmātreṇety āha -- tasmād iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7892: dharmadharmisvarūpasvaviśeṣobhayasvarūpasvaviśeṣaiḥ ṣaṭprakārāṃ viruddhatām eke bruvata ity arthaḥ. anye tūbhayavirodhayoḥ pratyekapakṣānatirekāt cāturvidhyaṃ pratipannā ity āha -- caturdhā veti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7893: vayaṃ tu iṣṭavighātamātreṇaikam eva prakāraṃ saṅgirāmaha ity āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7894: ekadhāpi veti. pūrvoktapakṣadvayanivṛttāv api vāśabdaḥ. api vā śeṣabhājāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7895: syād iti pakṣabādha eva viruddhatve kāraṇaṃ kim avāntarabhedopanyāseneti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7896: triṣv api ca prakāreṣu śrutyarthopāttasya pratijñātārthasya bādhāyāṃ viruddhatām āhur ity āha -- śrutyarthoktasyeti. dharmadharmyubhayasvarūpaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7897: śrutyuktaṃ, tadviśeṣās tu prāyeṇārthoktāḥ. te ca svarūpasvaviśeṣāḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7898: pratijñārthaśabdenopādīyante. sarve hi te vaktur abhipretāḥ. na tu dharmādiviśeṣās sākṣāt pratijñāyām antargatāḥ. tad asmin pratijñārthe
GSP28mimsvtku:7899: hetunā bādhyamāne hetor viruddhatā bhavatīti. tatpunar idaṃ vipratiṣiddham
GSP28mimsvtku:7900: iva manyāmahe. kathaṃ hi pratijñārthe hetunā bādhyamāne hetur viruddho
GSP28mimsvtku:7901: bhavati. sa hi pratijñārthaṃ viruṇaddhīti viroddheti vaktum ucitaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7902: bādhaka iti vā. na cāyam eva pratijñārthena bādhyate yadviruddho bhavet
GSP28mimsvtku:7903: prasiddhatvādasya. prasiddhaṃ hi ghaṭasya kṛtakatvaṃ, na tadaprasiddhayā nityatayā bādhituṃ śakyam. ato bādhaka ity evāyaṃ vaktavyaḥ. vārtikakṛtā tu paraprasiddhimātreṇa viruddha ity uktam iti veditavyam iti. tatra dharmasvarūpabādhena tāvad viruddhatām udāharati -- nityatve iti || 97 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7904: dharmaviśeṣabādhas tv evaṃ prayukte bhavatīty āha -- bādha
GSP28mimsvtku:7905: iti. tam eva prayogaṃ darśayati -- arthavad iti pādatrayeṇa.
GSP28mimsvtku:7906: svarūpābhidhānavādino hy āhuḥ -- gaur ayam iti śabdākāraviśiṣṭo 'rtho
GSP28mimsvtku:7907: 'vagamyate. na ca viśeṣaṇam anabhidhāya viśiṣṭo 'bhidhātuṃ śakyata iti svarūpam eva tāvad ādau śabdo{3,68}bhidhatte tato viśiṣṭam. api cārthaśabdo vyabhicarati, ajñātasambandhasya tadanavagateḥ. svarūpaṃ tu na
GSP28mimsvtku:7908: kadācid vyabhicarati sambandhāvadhāraṇāt prāg api tadavagamāt, avyabhicārī ca śabdārtha iti yuktam. ataḥ svarūpaṃ tāvadavaśyābhidheyaṃ śabdānāṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7909: tadabhidhānottarakālaṃ tu viśiṣṭābhidhānam api bhavatu nāmeti. evaṃ prasādhyānte prayogam āhuḥ -- śabdasvarūpaṃ sambandhāvadhāraṇāt prāgarthavad vibhaktisambandhāt, agṛhītasambandho 'pi hi svādivibhaktiyuktān śabdānavagacchati. yadā ca vibhaktiyogaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7910: tadārthavattvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā sambandhagrahaṇāt paścād iti. kathaṃ punar evaṃ prayujyamāne dharmaviśeṣabādho bhavaty ata āha -- svarūpeṇeti cāśrita iti. yadā hi svarūpeṇārthenārthavattvaṃ prathamam āśrityārthavattāmātraviśiṣṭaṃ sādhyate, tadārthād idam avagamyate --
GSP28mimsvtku:7911: svarūpārthavattvam asya siṣādhayiṣitam iti. evaṃ ca bhavaty arthākṣiptasya dharmaviśeṣasya bādha iti. kathaṃ punas svarūpeṇeti cāśrite dharmaviśeṣo bādhyate. ata āha -- asvarūpeti. vibhaktimattvaṃ hi svarūpātirekeṇārthāntareṇārthavattvam avinābhāvabalena śabdasyāvagamayati,
GSP28mimsvtku:7912: sambandhagrahaṇāt paścād arthāntarasya darśanāt. ato vyāptibalena tad eva vibhaktimattayā sādhyate. ato 'rthavattāyā viśeṣaṃ svasvarūpārthavattvaṃ hetur ayaṃ viruṇaddhīti bhavati dharmaviśeṣabādha iti || 99 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7913: dharmisvarūpabādhodāharaṇam āha -- ihapratyayeti. yadā hi samavāyaṃ dharmiṇaṃ kṛtvā tasya dravyādivyatirekas sādhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7914: ihapratyayahetutvaṃ ca hetur ucyate ihāyaṃ ghaṭa iti saṃyogo dṛṣṭāntaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7916: {3,69} kathaṃ punar atrodāharaṇe dharmisvarūpabādhaḥ, ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7917: atrāpīti. atrāpy udāharaṇe dharmisvarūpasya samavāyātmano vaiparītyāpādanād dhetor viruddhatā bhāvati. ihapratyayahetutvaṃ hy asamavāyātmana eva dṛṣṭam iti tādrūpyaṃ virundhyād iti dharmisvarūpabādha iti || 101 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7918: asminn eva ca dharmiviśeṣabādho 'pi darśayitavya ity āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7919: yac ceti. samavāyo hi sattāsāmānyavadekarūpa iti kāṇādā manyante. so 'py
GSP28mimsvtku:7920: asya viśeṣaḥ saṃyogavadbhedāpatter bādhyata iti bhavati dharmiviśeṣaviruddho hetur iti || ubhayasvarūpabādhāyām udāharaṇam āha -- nityam ātmāstiteti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7921: yadā kaścit sautrāntikaṃ pratyevaṃ sādhayati -- ātmā nityaḥ niravayatvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:7922: vyomavad iti, tadā dharmadharmidvayasya bādhanaṃ bhavati. sautrāntikasya hy avayavābhāvo vyomnyabhāvenaiva sambaddho 'bhimata ityātmano 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:7923: tadvadabhāvaṃ gamayet, āvaraṇābhāvamātraṃ hi nabhaḥ, na punas tattvāntaram
GSP28mimsvtku:7924: iti bauddhā manyante. ato 'navayavatvād ātmanaḥ svarūpasya taddharmasya ca nityatvasya bādhād ubhayabādha iti || 103 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7925: ubhayaviśeṣabādhas tv evaṃ sādhyamāne bhavatīty āha -- tadeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7926: yadā hi parārthāś cakṣurādayas saṅghātatvāt śayanādivad iti sādhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7927: tadobhayaviśeṣabādha ity arthaḥ. kathaṃ punar atrobhayaviśeṣabādhaḥ, ata āha -- śayana iti. śayanīye{3,70}hi khaṭvādau mahābhūtasaṃhataśarīrapārārthyena saṅghātatvād iti hetur vyāpto dṛṣṭa iti saṃhatapārārthyam eva sādhayet. ātmānaṃ ca prati pārārthyaṃ sādhayitum abhimatam, tan na sidhyet. so 'yaṃ tāvat pārārthyasya dharmasya yo viśeṣo 'bhimata ātmapārārthyaṃ sa tāvad bādhyate. cakṣurāder api dharmiṇo yo viśeṣa āhaṅkārikatvaṃ nāma so 'py anenaiva hetunā bādhyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7928: saṃhatātmakatvaṃ hi śayanādāvanāhaṅkārikatvena vyāptaṃ dṛṣṭam, bhautikā hi te, atas tannidarśanena cakṣurādayo 'pi bhautikā bhaveyuḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7929: āhaṅkārikāṇīndriyāṇīti kāpilās saṅgirante, teṣāṃ cāyaṃ prayogaḥ. tad ayam arthaḥ -- saṃhatapārārthyabhautikatvābhyāṃ vyāpto hetur yasmin śayane tatrātmapārārthyam asiddham iti dharmaviśeṣabādhanaṃ tāvad bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7930: dharmiviśeṣabādho 'pi bhautikavyāptyā sūtrito 'nantaram eva vivariṣyata iti na kevalam ātmapārārthyaṃ na sidhyati, asaṃhatarūpātmapārārthye ceṣṭe vyāptibalenātmano 'pi saṃhatatā prāpnotīty āha -- asaṃhateti. anena cāniṣṭāntarāpattir āpāditeti veditavyam. etad uktaṃ bhavati. nānena hetunāsaṃhatarūpātmārthatā sidhyati. pratyuta saṃhatataivātmano bhaved iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7934: prapañcitaḥ. idānīṃ tadvyāvartyā eva dṛṣṭāntābhāsā darśayitavyāḥ. tair hi nānumānāṅgasambandho jñāpayituṃ śakyate. atas te 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:7935: jñātasambandhapadenaiva vyāvartyante. idaṃ cāsmābhiḥ prāg evoktam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7940: {3,71}iti. atas tannirākaraṇārthaṃ dṛṣṭāntavacanam eva tāvad avatārayati
GSP28mimsvtku:7941: -- gamakasyeti. vyāptipradarśanāya dvividho dṛṣṭāntas tāvad sādhanavākye darśayitavyaḥ. sādhyaḥ pakṣaḥ tatsādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ yo dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa
GSP28mimsvtku:7946: iti. sādhyasya prajñāpanavacanam iti yāvat. tasya cārtho liṅgam eva. tac coddiśya sādhyopādānaṃ sādharmyadṛṣṭānta iṣyate. yo yo dhūmavān sa so 'gnimān iti yāvad iti. kim evam upādīyamāne sidhyaty ata āha -- uddeśya
GSP28mimsvtku:7947: iti. uktaṃ vyāptipradarśanāya dṛṣṭāntavacanam iti. evaṃ copādīyamāna uddeśyo dhūmādir vyāpyatayā kathito bhavati. itaraś copādeyo 'gnyādir
GSP28mimsvtku:7948: vyāpakatayeti vyāptyānuguṇyāt saphalam evam upādānam ity uddeśyopādeyayor vyāpyavyāpakatvaṃ bhavatīty uktam || 108 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7949: kīdṛśaṃ tu tayos svarūpam ata āha -- yadvṛtteti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7950: yadvṛttatadvṛttābhyāṃ yattatpariniṣpannānāṃ yo ya ityādiśabdānām upādānam,
GSP28mimsvtku:7951: tad ayam artho bhavati. yadyad yadvṛttena saṃyuktaṃ prathamaṃ prayujyate pradhānaṃ ca taduddeśyaṃ, tattadvṛttayuktaṃ ca paścāt prayujyamānaṃ sa so
GSP28mimsvtku:7952: 'gnimāneveti caivakāreṇa yuktaṃ tadupādeyam. sarveṣv eva ca
GSP28mimsvtku:7953: grahavrīhyādisammārgāvaghātādiṣūddeśyopādeyeṣv ayam eva viveka iti veditavyam iti || 109 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7954: {3,72} kiṃ punar evaṃ prayoganiyame prayojanam, vivakṣāparatantrā hi śabdāḥ, te yathā tathā vā prayuktā yathābhiprāyaṃ vartiṣyanta eva. ata āha -- vadatīti. na vaktrabhiprāyaparatantrāḥ śabdāḥ, svābhāvikyaiva tu śaktyā
GSP28mimsvtku:7955: kecid eva kvacid evārthe vartante, ato na vivakṣānusāreṇeṣṭasiddhir
GSP28mimsvtku:7957: yadi tarhi svatantrāś śabdāḥ atathāsthite 'py arthe śabdānusāriṇīṣṭasiddhir bhaved ata āha -- sādhyahetutvam iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- nārthaśaktiś śabdaśaktim anurudhya pravartate, na ca śabdaśaktir arthaśaktim, ato na yathā vaktrabhipretārthānusāriṇī
GSP28mimsvtku:7958: śabdaśaktiḥ, evaṃ na śabdānusāriṇyarthavyavastheti, arthādīnāṃ kṛtakatvānityatvādīnāṃ vyāptiśaktyanurodhād eva sādhyahetubhāvo bhavati na śabdānurodhād iti || 110 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7959: vaktranapekṣayā svaśaktyaiva śabde 'rtham ācakṣāṇe yattāvad āpadyate tad darśayati -- tatrājñānād iti sārdhadvayena. yadā hi dṛṣṭāntaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7960: vaktum anabhijño vaktā sādhyahetvos sahabhāvamātraṃ vivakṣati. yathā --
GSP28mimsvtku:7961: śabdo 'nityaḥ kṛtakatvād iti prayoge, yathā ghaṭe kṛtakatvanāśitves ta
GSP28mimsvtku:7962: iti. viparītāvagraheṇa vā na hetor vyāpyatāṃ vivakṣati. satyām api vivakṣāyāṃ kutaścid bhramanimittāt na vyāptiyogyaṃ śabdaṃ vadati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7963: sahabhāvamātram eva tu pūrvavad vadet, viparītaṃ vā bhrāntaḥ yathā nāśitā kṛtakatvena vyāpteti, tadā tāvan na kevalam iṣṭaṃ na sidhyati aniṣṭam eva
GSP28mimsvtku:7964: tu vyāptiviparyayād āpadyate. iṣṭasya{3,73}kṛtakatvasya hetutvaṃ na syāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:7965: aniṣṭasyaiva tu nāśitvasya bhaved ity evaṃjātīyakāniṣṭaprayoganivāraṇāya yukto dṛṣṭāntaprayoganiyama iti. etad evopasaṃharati -- tasmād iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7967: arthānāṃ śabdatantratve yad bhavati tad darśayati --
GSP28mimsvtku:7968: yadetipādarahitadvayena. asyārthaḥ -- yadā hi vyāptiśaktyanusāreṇaivārthānāṃ sādhyahetutvaṃ tadā yady api vaktrā na sahabhāvamātraṃ darśitaṃ, kin tu samyag eva dṛṣṭāntavacanam, arthās tu na
GSP28mimsvtku:7969: tadanurūpavyāpyavyāpakabhāvenāvasthitā iti dṛṣṭāntābhāsatā bhaved iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti. yathā -- nityo dhvanir amūrtatvād iti prayoge karmavat paramāṇuvad ghaṭavad vyomavad iti dṛṣṭānteṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ paramārthatas sādhyahetūbhayavyāptiśūnyatayā. karma khalv anityam iti tat sādhyabhūtayā nityatayā śūnyaṃ, hetus tv amūrtatvād iti tatra vidyata eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:7970: paramāṇavas tu mūrtā iti teṣu hetuśūnyatā, sādhyaṃ tu nityatvaṃ teṣu vidyata eva. ghaṭe tu na sādhyaṃ nityatvaṃ nāpy amūrtatvaṃ hetur ity
GSP28mimsvtku:7971: ubhayaśūnyatā. vyomni tu dṛṣṭānte vyāptiśūnyatām uttaratra svayam eva
GSP28mimsvtku:7972: vivariṣyati. atraiva ca vyomavad iti dṛṣṭānte tadasadvādinaṃ sautrāntikaṃ prati prayujyamāne dharmyasiddhyā dṛṣṭāntābhāsatā bhavatīty āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7974: vyāptiśūnyatāṃ vivṛṇoti -- tatsadbhāve 'pīti. yady api ca{3,74}vyomnaḥ sadbhāvo bhavet, tac ca hetusādhyadvayayuktaṃ nityatvād amūrtatvāc ca. tathāpi karmādiṣv amūrteṣu anityeṣv ālocyamāneṣu hetor
GSP28mimsvtku:7975: vyāptir nāstīti īdṛśasyāpi dṛṣṭāntasya varjanam eva. ayam api na
GSP28mimsvtku:7978: vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntamataḥ paraṃ vyākhyāsyati. tatraitad eva tāvat prathamaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7979: vaktavyam. kiṃ sarvadaiva sādharmyavad vaidharmyavacanaṃ kāryaṃ na veti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7980: tatra tāvad vyatirekapradhānavādinas sarvadā vācyam iti ye vadanti. tān pratyāha -- vyāptyā sādharmya ukta iti. evaṃ hi manyate --
GSP28mimsvtku:7981: vyāptiprajñāpanāya hi dṛṣṭāntavacanam, sā cet sādharmyavacanena jñāpitā kiṃ vaidharmyavacanena. sādharmyaṃ cāvaśyam eva vacanīyam
GSP28mimsvtku:7982: anvayaprajñāpanāya, tatpradhānatvād anumānasya. vyatirekasyāpi tanmukhenaiva siddheḥ. itarathā duradhigamatvāt. ato yadi vyāptyā sahitaṃ sādharmyam uktaṃ, alaṃ vaidharmyavacaneneti. kadā tarhi vaidharmyaṃ vācyam ata āha -- sahabhāvitvadṛṣṭyeti pādatrayeṇa. yadā hi vaktrā samyag eva dṛṣṭānta ukte paraḥ śrotā jānāti -- yathā hetusādhyayos sāhityamātram
GSP28mimsvtku:7983: anenoktaṃ na vyāptir iti, tadā sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvaṃ jñāpayituṃ vaidharmyeṇeṣṭasādhanam iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti. yadā khalv abhyastavaidharmyas tam evāpekṣate na sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaṃ tadā ca vaidharmyeṇeṣṭasādhanam ity āha -- taṃ vā nāpekṣate yadeti. yadā vā vaktā
GSP28mimsvtku:7984: suśikṣitavaidharmyas sādharmyaṃ vaktum ajānānas tena sādharmyadṛṣṭāntena sahabhāvamātram eva śuddhaṃ vyāptihīnaṃ kathayati, tadāpi paryanuyuktena tenaiva vaidharmyeṇeṣṭasādhanaṃ kāryam ity āha -- vaktā veti || 119 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7985: yadā vā bhrānto viparītam anvayaṃ darśayati, tadāpi tatsamādhānecchayā pūrvaviparītajñānopamardanena vaidharmyeṇeṣṭasādhanam ity āha --{3,75}viparītānvayam iti. nanv anvayavaiparītye sa eva yathāvat pratipādyatāṃ kiṃ vaidharmyavacanena. satyam evam apīṣṭaṃ sidhyaty eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:7986: kin tu bhrāntair idam asmābhir uktaṃ sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvo vivakṣita iti vaidharmyeṇāpi tāvad iṣṭasādhanaṃ bhavaty eveti. yat tu tatpūrvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7987: sāhityamātram uktaṃ tadvaidharmya evopayujyate tasyaiveṣṭaṃ sādhayato
GSP28mimsvtku:7991: vaiparītye kāraṇam āha -- dhūmabhāva iti. yadā hi dhūmabhāvo
GSP28mimsvtku:7992: 'gnibhāvena vyāpto bhavati tadānagnir agnyabhāvas tato dhūmāt pracyutas sannadhūme dhūmābhāva eva bhavatīty evaṃ tāvad vyāpto bhavati. yo hi yasmin sati bhavati asati ca na bhavati sa tanniyatas tadvyāpta ity ucyate. yathā dhūmo 'gnāv eva bhavannagninā vyāpta iti siddho 'bhāvayor
GSP28mimsvtku:7994: yata eva cābhāvayor īdṛśo vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaḥ ata eva bhāvayor abhimatavyāptisiddhir ity āha -- tathānagnāv iti. anagnāv agnyabhāve dhūmābhāvena vyāpte dhūmas tatra virodhivyāpter alabdhāvakāśo 'gnāv eva bhavatīty evaṃ tadvyāpyatā tasya sidhyati. tatheti. yathā bhāvavyāptyapekṣayābhāvavyāptiḥ evam abhāvavyāptyapekṣayā bhāvavyāptir ity
GSP28mimsvtku:7995: arthaḥ. na caivam itaretarāśrayatā, bījāṅkuravadanāditayopapatter iti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7996: {3,76} kiṃ punarabhāvayor vyāptiviparyayāśrayaṇe prayojanam ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7997: vyāpakau tv iti. yadā hi ya eva bhāvo vyāpakas tadabhāva eva vyāpakatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:7998: vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta ucyate tadā tato vyāpyād dhūmāder naiva vipakṣasyānagnyādeḥ pracyutiḥ kathitā bhavet. tatkathanārthaṃ ca vaidharmyavacanaṃ (sa) prayojanaṃ bhavet. na hi yatra dhūmas tatrāgnir itivat yatra dhūmābhāvas tatrāgnyabhāva iti kathyamāne vyāpyād dhūmād anagner vipakṣasya nivṛttir darśitā bhavatīti. ato dhūmenāgniṃ siṣādhayiṣatā vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntenāgnidhūmābhāvayor vyāptiviparyayo vācya ity āha -- tasmād iti vācyo 'ntena. yatrāgnir nāsti tatra dhūmo nāstīty evaṃ yadvṛttatadvṛttābhyām uddeśyopādeyabhāvo darśayitavya ity arthaḥ. sa cānagnir adhūmena vyāpta ucyamāno nānyathā vācyaḥ, kin tu sādharmyoktenaivoddeśyopādeyaprakāreṇety āha -- na cānyatheti. prakāraś cānantaram evokta iti || 124 -- 125 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7999: anyathāvacane doṣam āha -- anagnyadhūmasāhitya iti. yathaiva sādharmyadṛṣṭānte svaśaktyā śabdo 'rthaṃ vadati nārthaśaktim anurudhyata
GSP28mimsvtku:8000: iti sāhityamātravacane vyāptiviparyaye vā neṣṭaṃ sidhyatīty uktam, evam ihāpi bhavatīti bhāvaḥ evaṃ (?tadva/tāva)d ihāpy artho na śabdavaśavartīti yatrārtho dṛṣṭāntarūpo dvābhyāṃ hetusādhyābhāvābhyām ekena vā tayoś śūnyo bhavati tatrāpi na prastutopakāro bhavati anyadvāniṣṭaṃ prasajyata ity āha yatrāpīti. samyak prayukte 'pi vākye 'rthasyātadāyattatvānneṣṭasiddhir iti
GSP28mimsvtku:8001: bhāvaḥ. atrodāharaṇam āha -{3,77}yad iti. nityo dhvanir amūrtatvād ity atraiva prayoge yadaivaṃ vaidharmyam ucyate yannityaṃ na bhavati
GSP28mimsvtku:8002: tadamūrtam api na bhavati yathā paramāṇur iti tadā sādhyābhāvaśūnyo
GSP28mimsvtku:8003: dṛṣṭāntaḥ. paramāṇor nityatayā tadabhāvasya tatra darśayitum aśakyatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:8004: buddhivad iti tu dṛṣṭānte hetvabhāvaśūnyatā. buddher amūrtatayā tadabhāvasya vaktum aśakyatvāt. khavad iti tūbhayābhāvaśūnyatā, nityāmūrte tasminn ubhayābhāvo duradhigamo yata iti || 127 evaṃ sādharmyadṛṣṭāntavadvyāptivaikalye 'py ābhāsatā
GSP28mimsvtku:8005: darśayitavyā. tatsiddhyarthaṃ hi vipakṣād dhetor vyatirekaḥ kathyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:8006: yasya tu vipakṣaikadeśād api vyatireko nāsti, nāsau sādhyena vyāpto
GSP28mimsvtku:8007: bhavatīty asatyāṃ vyāptāv anarthakaṃ tādṛśasya vaidharmyasya vacanam ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- sādhyeneti || 128 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8008: yataś caivañjātīyako na sādhyena vyāpyate tena kvacid abhāvayos sāhitye dṛṣṭe 'pi na sarvatra gamyagamakabhāvo bhavatīty āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:8009: teneti. yady api yannityaṃ na bhavati tadamūrtam api na bhavati, yathā ghaṭaḥ kuḍyaṃ veti, kvacid abhāvayos sāhityaṃ śakyate darśayitum. tathāpi na sarva(ḥ) śabdādi(ḥ) nityatayā viśiṣṭo 'nena hetunā gamya iṣyate. kiñcid dhy amūrtaṃ nityam ākāśādi, kiñcid anityaṃ karmādīti bhāvaḥ kim iti neṣyate ata āha -- sahadṛṣṭir iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:8010: vipakṣaikadeśanivṛttyā hi sahabhāvamātraṃ hetos sidhyati. na ca tanmātrasambandho 'numānāṅgam. kiṃ tarhi, vyāptiḥ. na cāsāv etāvatā
GSP28mimsvtku:8012: mūrtānityatvayukte 'pīti. idaṃ ca prāg eva vyākhyātam iti || 130 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8014: {3,78} vyāptyā sādharmya ukte ca na vaidharmyam
GSP28mimsvtku:8016: ity ucyate, na hi śatāṃśenāpi hetor vipakṣād vyatireke śaṅkyamāne gamakatvam astīty aśeṣavipakṣo 'numātur vyatirekaṃ grahītum apekṣitaḥ. na cāsau duradhigamaḥ, ekadeśasthasyāpi sarvādarśanasaukaryāt. darśanaṃ hi sarvavipakṣāṇāṃ duṣkaram, tadabhāvas tu saukaryaprāpta eva. na cāyogyānupalambhān nedam adarśanaṃ hetor vyatirekāya prabhavatīti vācyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:8017: na hi no vipakṣādarśanād avinābhāvaniyamaḥ. kin tu tādātmyatadutpattinibandhanaḥ. vipakṣadarśane tu hetoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:8018: paripanthinyavinābhāvo grahītum aśakyo bhavati. tac caikadeśasthasyāpi tāvannāsty eveti paripanthini vṛttimātre darśanaṃ vyāpriyate. ato yadaivāgnikāryo dhūma ity avagataṃ tadaiva tadāyattātmalābho nāsati tasmin
GSP28mimsvtku:8019: bhavatīti jñāyate. na cānvayajñānam eva vyatirekabuddhau nibandhanam,
GSP28mimsvtku:8021: agnidhūmasvalakṣaṇayos tatraiva niruddhayor anyatra darśanam asti,
GSP28mimsvtku:8022: yenānvayo 'nubhūyeta. tat kuto 'nvayaḥ kutastarāṃ ca tannibandhano
GSP28mimsvtku:8023: vyatirekaḥ. na ca viśeṣeṣu sāmānyaṃ nāma kiñcid anugataṃ svarūpam asti,
GSP28mimsvtku:8024: yanniyamyaniyāmakatayāvasīyeta, vikalpākāratvāt tasya. ato viśeṣā eva
GSP28mimsvtku:8025: kecit kayācid vyāvṛttyopalakṣitāḥ kañcid viśeṣaṃ vipakṣavyāvṛttimukhena gamayantīti tatpradarśanārthaṃ vaidharmyavacanam eva nyāyyam iti. tān pratyāha -- aśeṣeti yuktirantena. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yady api vyatireko
GSP28mimsvtku:8026: 'numānāṅgam. sa tu nādarśanamātrāt sidhyati. taddeśāgamanād api ca
GSP28mimsvtku:8027: tasyopapatteḥ. na ca kāryatvāvadhāraṇād asati kāraṇe 'bhāvaḥ, tasyaivāsati vyatireke duradhigamatvāt. yad dhi yasmin sati bhavati asati ca na bhavati
GSP28mimsvtku:8028: tattatkāryam. ato 'satyabhāvo{3,79}vagantavyaḥ. tataḥ kāryatā tadadhīne(ti) tu tasminn itaretarāśrayatā. astu vādarśanamātrād vyatirekaḥ, tasya ca saukaryaṃ, naitāvatānumāṃ prati yuktir anaṅgam.
GSP28mimsvtku:8029: yuktir yogas sambandho 'nvaya ity anarthāntaram. nānvayo 'naṅgam iti
GSP28mimsvtku:8030: yāvat. tanmukhenaiva sarvapramātṝṇām anumānotpatteḥ. atas tatkathanārthaṃ sādharmyadṛṣṭānto 'pi vācya eva. nāsāv ekāntena pratyākhyātuṃ śakyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:8031: idaṃ cānvāruhya vacanam. yathokta eva siddhāntaḥ samyak sādharmyaprayoge na vaidharmyam apekṣaṇīyam iti. anvayasyaiva prādhānyāt tam antareṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:8032: vyatirekāsiddheḥ. avagate hi dhūmasyāgninā sambandhe 'rthād anagninivṛttis
GSP28mimsvtku:8033: sidhyati. atas sa tāvad vidhimukhena prathamaṃ darśayitavyaḥ, avasare tu vaidharmyam api kadācid ucyate. anaṅgatvam iti tu paṭhatām iyaṃ vyākhyā --
GSP28mimsvtku:8034: idaṃ hi liṅgasyānumāyām aṅgatvam yadanvayavyatirekau, tābhyāṃ hi tadaṅgaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:8035: bhavati. ato yathā vyatireko 'ṅgatvam, evam anvayāparanāmā yuktir apīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:8036: nanu liṅge 'pi śabdātmake pratīty uttarakālabhāvyanvayo 'naṅgam evāta āha -- śābde 'bhidhāsyata iti. śābde hy anumānād bhinne pratīty uttarakālabhāvinī yuktir anaṅgam iti vakṣyate. yathā vakṣyati --
GSP28mimsvtku:8038: iti. anumāne tu sarvatraivānvayaḥ pratīty aṅgam iti. ye tu tāvatā
GSP28mimsvtku:8039: nānaṅgatvam anvayasyety adhyāhṛtyātraivārthe śabde yuktir vakṣyate iti
GSP28mimsvtku:8040: vyācakṣate, teṣām aśrutānvayādhyāhāra eva tāvadupālambhaḥ. na cānvayasyānumānāṅgatve śābde yuktir vakṣyate. atraiva jñātasambandhapadena tasyoktatvāt. ata evānvayādhīnatvam anumānasya ca sthitam iti vakṣyati.
GSP28mimsvtku:8042: yat tu bhedānām evānumāne gamyagamakatvaṃ teṣāṃ cānvayo na sambhavatīty uktam, tatrāha -- bodhaprasaṅga iti. na bhedānām anumānabodhe
GSP28mimsvtku:8044: niruddhatvāt. na cāpy{3,80}avinābhāvenāparasya tathāvidhasyaiva niyamaś śakyate 'nubhavitum. na cāsati tasminnānumānāṅgaṃ sambhavatīti teṣām anvayābhāvo na doṣāyeti. yadi na bhedānāṃ bodhaprasaṅgaḥ. kasya tarhi darśitam idaṃ, na bhedānugatam ekaṃ kim api pāramārthikaṃ rūpam asti.
GSP28mimsvtku:8047: nipuṇato nirūpyamāṇasyāsambhavād vibhrama evāyam. yady evam asadrūpāropapravṛttam anumānam apramāṇam eva. satyam. pratibandhabalena tu kiñcid eva svalakṣaṇaṃ kenāpi vikalpākāreṇa sāmānyātmanā samadhigataṃ yad aparaṃ vikalpākārollikhitam eva svalakṣaṇaṃ pratilambhayati tatpramāṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:8048: ity ākhyāyate. avisaṃvādo hi naḥ prāmāṇye kāraṇam arthakriyāsthitiś
GSP28mimsvtku:8049: cāvisaṃvādaḥ. yadāhuḥ -- pramāṇam avisaṃvādi jñānam arthakriyāsthitiḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:8052: atasmiṃs tadgrahād bhrāntir avisaṃvādataḥ pramā iti |
GSP28mimsvtku:8053: ato bhedānām eva gamyagamakatvam. te ca na bhājanam anvayasyeti yuktam
GSP28mimsvtku:8054: evoktam ata āha -- astīti. asyārthaḥ. bhaved evaṃ yadi na bhedātiriktaṃ kiñcit sāmānyaṃ vastu bhavet. asti tu tad ity ākṛtigranthe sakalaparoktadoṣaparihāreṇopapādayiṣyate. tasya cānekadeśakālavyāpitā gamyata iti nābhājanam anvayasya. na cātasmiṃs tadgrahaḥ, pāramārthikatvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:8055: tasya. evaṃ ca yadanumānaprāmāṇyasiddhyarthaṃ paraiḥ kim api kāśaṃ kuśam avalambyate, tad api mandaprayojanam eveti || 133 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8056: anyan matam vyāptyāpi sādharmyadṛṣṭānta ukte vaidharmyam api vācyam iti, tattāvad upanyasyati -- kecid iti pādatrayeṇa. kiṃ punas tadicchāyāṃ kāraṇam ata āha -- vyāvṛttiniyamecchayeti etad eva vivṛṇoti -- hetāv iti. evaṃ hi manyante. yadā
GSP28mimsvtku:8057: hi{3,81}sādharmyadṛṣṭānte yatra dhūma ity uddiśya tatrāgnir eveti
GSP28mimsvtku:8058: saivakāram upādīyate, tadā hetau sādhyenaivāgnināvadhārite sarvato 'gner
GSP28mimsvtku:8059: anyamātrād vyāvṛttiḥ prāpnoti, na caitat sambhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:8061: pakṣābhāvaprasaṅgāc ca. atas sādhyābhāva eva vyāvṛttiṃ niyantuṃ sarvadaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:8062: vaidharmyavacanam arthavat. sati hi tasminn agnyabhāve dhūmo na
GSP28mimsvtku:8064: etad api dūṣayati -- tat tu mandaphalam iti. tad idaṃ vaidharmyavacanam evaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ mandaphalam ity arthaḥ. kathaṃ mandaphalam ata āha -- yasmād iti. kiṃ nirūpitam ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:8065: vyāpakābhāvamātraṃ hīti. agnimān parvata iti pakṣavacane nirūpitam idam,
GSP28mimsvtku:8066: yathā niyamas tadvipakṣāc ca kalpyate nāvirodhina iti. atas sādharmyadṛṣṭānte 'pi vyāpyād dhūmāder vyāpakābhāvanivṛtti mātram eva darśayitavyam, nānyamātranivṛttir iti || 136 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8074: atra bhāṣyam -- tat tu dvividhaṃ pratyakṣato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ ca. tatra pratyakṣato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ yathā --
GSP28mimsvtku:8077: gatismaraṇam iti. anena prameyadvaividhyād anumānadvaividhyam uktam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:8078: atra kecin nītijñammanyā avadhṛtasvalakṣaṇam eva kvacid anumānena sāmānyato gṛhyata iti manyante. tadbhramāpanayāya bhāṣyakāreṇedam uktam --
GSP28mimsvtku:8079: tat tu dvividham, adṛṣṭasvalakṣaṇaviṣayam apy anumānam asti kriyādiṣv iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:8080: kathaṃ punar adṛṣṭasvalakṣaṇena sambandhadarśanam, utpattimataḥ phalasya darśanāt. yady apy anavadhṛtasvalakṣaṇena vastunā viśeṣatas sambandho
GSP28mimsvtku:8081: 'navagataḥ, sāmānyatas tu dṛśyate. sarvaṃ hi kādācitkaṃ phalaṃ kutaścid āgantukād utpattimato jāyamānaṃ dṛṣṭam, tantusaṃyogebhya iva paṭaḥ. ato devadattasya bhūtapūrvapūrvottaradeśavibhāgasaṃyogau kadācid upalabhyāgantukaḥ ko 'pi hetur anumīyate. tad idaṃ sāmānyato
GSP28mimsvtku:8084: svalakṣaṇāvadhāraṇāt prāk pratyakṣato dṛṣṭasambandham anumānam āhuḥ. na ca dravyam eva saṃyogavibhāgayoḥ kāraṇam iti vaktavyam. saty api tasminn
GSP28mimsvtku:8085: abhāvāt. na ca dravyāntarāgama eva śakyate kalpayituṃ, tasya pūrvadravyapratyabhijñayā bādhitatvāt. na ca sadṛśāparāparotpattivipralabdhā bhedaṃ na budhyanta iti sāmpratam,
GSP28mimsvtku:8086: deśādibhede 'pi tadbuddher aviparyayāt. uktaṃ ca vivaraṇakāreṇa --
GSP28mimsvtku:8087: kṣaṇabhaṅgas tu pratyabhijñānān nirākriyata eva. ato dṛṣṭakāraṇāsambhavād adṛṣṭaṃ kim api saṃyogavibhāgayoḥ kāraṇam anumīyate. tac ca karmety
GSP28mimsvtku:8088: ākhyāyate. ata eva pradeśāntareṣv api karmāpratyakṣam eveti. bhāṣyakāro darśayati -- yathā vakṣyati na hi te pratyakṣe iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:8089: apūrvasadbhāvapratipādanāvasare ca na karmaṇo rūpam upalabhāmaha iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:8090: yadāśrayaṃ deśāntaraṃ prāpayati tatkarmety ucyata iti ca. vyaktam eva deśāntaraprāptiphalonnīyamānatvam eva karmaṇo darśayatīti siddhaṃ kriyādīnāṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭānumānaikaviṣayatvam. evaṃ ca prameyadvaividhyād
GSP28mimsvtku:8091: anumānadvaividhyopapattir iti ye vadanti tān pratyāha -- dvaividhyaṃ nopapannam iti. idam uktaprakāraṃ dvaividhyam anupapannam iti bhāvaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:8092: katham anupapannam ata āha -- yathaiveti pādatrayeṇa. yathā khalv agnidhūmākṛtyoḥ pratyakṣayoḥ pratyakṣadṛṣṭas sambandho, bhavati evaṃ gatiprāptyākṛtyoḥ, tayor api pratyakṣatvāt.{3,83}pratyakṣam eva hi vayaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:8093: deśāntaraṃ prāpnuvantaṃ devadattvaṃ gacchatīti manyāmahe. neyaṃ jātyādivikalpanābhyaḥ karmakalpanā viśiṣyate. tadvad evendriyānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvād aparokṣanirbhāsāc ca. nanu devadatte deśasaṃyogavibhāgātiriktam aparaṃ karmaṇaḥ kim api rūpam aparokṣam
GSP28mimsvtku:8094: īkṣāmahe. phaladarśanenaiva tadanumīyate. jāter vā vyaktito
GSP28mimsvtku:8095: vya(tiriktā)yāḥ kiṃ rūpam anubhūyate, yad asau pratyakṣaviṣayatayāvasīyate. rūpam eva sā vyakteḥ, kim asyā rūpāntareṇeti
GSP28mimsvtku:8096: cet, karma vā kim arūpam. idam api hi tato na bhidyata eva. āgantukaṃ tu kevalam. ato jātikalpanāvat karmakalpanām api pratyakṣapakṣa eva
GSP28mimsvtku:8097: nikṣipantaḥ pañcadhā savikalpakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vibhajāmahe. āha ca --
GSP28mimsvtku:8098: na hi dṛṣṭipathaṃ prāptaṃ devadattaṃ nirūpayan |
GSP28mimsvtku:8099: paṭhan kāvyaṃ svasaṃjñoktaṃ parokṣam iva budhyate ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8100: iti. phalānumeye tu karmaṇyādityavad devadattavat pratītiprasaṅgaḥ. na caiṣa devadattam iva calantaṃ spandamānam ādityam api paśyatīti dṛśyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:8101: sthiraṃ hi sarvadā tanmaṇḍalam avalokyate. saṃyogavibhāgau tu tasyāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:8102: pratīyete eveti tulya(?va/tvā)t tābhyām ubhayatrāpy ānumānikaḥ pratyayo
GSP28mimsvtku:8103: bhavet. api ca vibhāgopakrame saṃyogāvasāne ca karmaṇi tata unnīyamāne gacchatīti vartamānanirbhāsaḥ pratyayo na bhavet, atītaṃ hi tat, tadā kathaṃ vartamānākārabuddhigocaro bhavati. jalapravāhaniścaleṣu matsyeṣu nirantarotpadyamānajalāvayavasaṃyogavibhāgāvagamād ānumānikī gatisaṃvid
GSP28mimsvtku:8104: upajāyeta. sthāṇau ca śyenaviyukte śyena iva karmānumīyeta. tataś ca so
GSP28mimsvtku:8105: 'pi gacchatīti buddhiviṣayatām āpadyeta. yadi mataṃ na vibhāgamātrāt
GSP28mimsvtku:8106: karmānumānam, api tarhi vibhāgapūrvakāt saṃyogād iti. evaṃ tarhi yadaikaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:8107: śyenaviyuktaḥ sthāṇur anyena saṃyujyate tatra prasaṅgaḥ. calitvāvasthite ca devadatte. yadi tūcyate yo 'yam utpatataḥ śyenasya deśāntarasaṃyogaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:8108: tasya sthāṇusamavetena karmaṇā niṣpattyasambhavān na tatra karmānumānam
GSP28mimsvtku:8109: iti. kalpyatāṃ tarhi śyene 'pi karma, sthāṇau tu prasaṅgān ativṛttir eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:8111: asti ca sthāṇau kāraṇapratibaddhaphaladarśanam iti nānumānodayaś
GSP28mimsvtku:8112: śakyate{3,84}niroddhum. śyenasamavāyinaiva karmaṇā sthāṇāv api saṃyogavibhāgopapattau na tadgatakarmānumānam iti cet tan na. na hi prayojanānusāriṇy anumānavyavasthā. vyāptaṃ hi liṅgaṃ yatra yatra dṛśyate
GSP28mimsvtku:8113: tatra tatra vyāpakam upasthāpayati. arthāpattir hy anyathopapattyā
GSP28mimsvtku:8114: parihriyate nānumānam. yadi tv avicchinnotpattayas saṃyogavibhāgāḥ kriyānumāne kāraṇam, evaṃ tarhi na kācid gatir anumīyeta,
GSP28mimsvtku:8116: evāvagateḥ. atha svadeśasaṃyogavibhāgahetukaṃ kriyānumānam. na ca sthāṇoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:8117: śyeno deśa ity ucyate. evam api matsyeṣu prasaṅgānativṛttir eva, teṣāṃ hi jalaṃ svadeśa eva. parokṣavyomavādināṃ ca vihaṅgame gacchatīti
GSP28mimsvtku:8120: pratyayaḥ, santamase 'pi bhāvāt. na ca tamo nāma kiñcid vastv asti
GSP28mimsvtku:8121: bhavatsiddhānte, bhāso 'bhāvamātratvāt tasya. atas tatsaṃyogavibhāgahetuko 'pi na kriyāvasāyaś śakyate samādhātum iti na pratyakṣe karmaṇi dvaividhyopapattiḥ. yā tu na hi te pratyakṣe ity apratyakṣatoktā, tāṃ tatraivānyathā vyākhyāsyāmaḥ. rūpaśabdāvibhāgam iti ca vadatā sūtrakāreṇa pratyakṣam eva karmety āsthitam. apūrvādhikaraṇe ca na karmaṇo rūpam upalabhāmaha iti vacanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:8123: eva. itarathā hy upalabdhimātrapratiṣedhe śaśaśṛṅgādivannityābhāva eva karmaṇo bhavet. na hi tatra pratyakṣopalabdhimātram eva pratiṣiddham.
GSP28mimsvtku:8124: yadāśrayaṃ deśāntaraṃ prāpayatīti ca na phalānumeyatvābhiprāyam. kiṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:8125: tarhi. āśrayasya deśāntaraprāpakatvarūpeṇa na svarūpataḥ karmāstīty apūrvātmanā karmaṇo 'vasthānaṃ darśayati. ihāpi devadattasya gatipūrvikāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:8126: deśāntaraprāptim upalabhyeti vadan devadatte pratyakṣatām eva gater
GSP28mimsvtku:8127: darśayati. anyathā tu devadattādityayor ubhayor api karmaṇo 'numeyatvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:8128: kena viśeṣeṇāditye gatyanumānaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭatayodāhriyate. devadatte
GSP28mimsvtku:8129: 'pi hi sāmānyato dṛṣṭād eva gatisiddhiḥ. ato naivaṃvidhaṃ granthato
GSP28mimsvtku:8130: yuktito vā ghaṭata iti sūktam anupapannam iti. pratiyoginor hi parasparam
GSP28mimsvtku:8131: asaṅkare dvaividhyaṃ bhavati. iha tu yat{3,85}pratyakṣadṛṣṭasambandhasya
GSP28mimsvtku:8132: pratiyogitayopāttaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ tatrāpi gatiprāptyākṛtyoḥ pratyakṣadṛṣṭa eva sambandha iti na pratiyoginor asaṅkara iti || 138 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8133: yadi tu dṛṣṭānte pratyakṣatāyām api pakṣīkṛtād ity agater apratyakṣatvāt na pratyakṣadṛṣṭas sambandha ity ucyate. tad etad āśaṅkate tāvat -- āditye
GSP28mimsvtku:8134: 'nupalabdhiś ced iti. idānīṃ dūṣayati -- neti. kāraṇam āha -- deśe 'py
GSP28mimsvtku:8135: adhunātana iti. deśe 'py adhunātane -- samprati pramīyamāṇe,
GSP28mimsvtku:8136: apratyakṣatopalabdhir evety arthaḥ. yadi tv agnidhūmākṛtyoḥ kvacin mahānasādau apratyakṣopalabdhir iṣyate sā tarhi devadatte 'pi gateḥ pratyakṣatvād astīty āha -- kvacid iti || 139 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8137: evaṃ tāvat pratyakṣato dṛṣṭatā sāmānyato dṛṣṭatayā saṅkīryate ity uktam. idānīṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭatāpi pratyakṣato dṛṣṭābhimatāgnyākṛtyanumāne saṅkīryata ity āha -- yadīti pādatrayeṇa. yadi hi devadattādidharmyantarāpekṣaivāditye gatyanumānasya sāmānyato
GSP28mimsvtku:8138: dṛṣṭateṣyate, sā tarhi mahānasādidharmyantarāpekṣayāgnidhūmayor api gamyagamakatvenāvasthitayoḥ prāpnoty eva. sāmānyato hy avivakṣitadeśādibhedam idam avagataṃ dhūmavān agnimān iti, yathā deśāntaraprāptyadhikaraṇaṃ gatyadhikaraṇam iti. ataḥ pratiyogitvarahitam evedam ubhayam iti dvaividhyānupapattir ity ākṣepaḥ. evam ākṣioya samādadhāti -- tasmād evaṃ pracakṣata iti. yathoktadvaividhyāsambhavād evaṃ vakṣyamāṇaprakāreṇa dvaividhyaṃ varṇanīyam iti bhāvaḥ tatra pratyakṣasambandhaṃ tāvad udāharati -- pratyakṣeti yudhyate 'ntena. yadā hi yayor evāgnidhūmaviśeṣayoḥ, gomayendhano yam agniḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:8139: gomayam indhanam asyeti{3,86}bahuvrīhiḥ, tajjanyo 'yaṃ dhūmaviśeṣa iti ca
GSP28mimsvtku:8140: prāk pratyakṣeṇa matiṃ kṛtvā punaś ca kiyatā vilambanenānyatra kvacid gatvā gatas san taddeśasthena tenaiva dhūmaviśeṣeṇa tam evāgniviśeṣaṃ budhyate, tadā tatpratyakṣadṛṣṭasambandham anumānaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:8141: anena ca viśeṣadṛṣṭam eva pratyakṣadṛṣṭaśabdenocyata iti vyākhyātam.
GSP28mimsvtku:8142: pratyakṣaśabdena hi viśeṣo lakṣyate. pratyakṣeṇa hy ayam evaṃvidho
GSP28mimsvtku:8144: pramāṇāntareṇa. taddvāreṇa tv anumānasyāpi tādṛśo viśeṣo viṣayo bhavatīti yuktaiva pratyakṣaśabdena viśeṣalakṣaṇā. viśeṣadṛṣṭaṃ ca sāmānyato
GSP28mimsvtku:8145: dṛṣṭasya bhavati pratiyogīti dvaividhyopapattir iti bhāvaḥ. nanu viśeṣadṛṣṭaṃ nāma (na) pramāṇabhedaḥ. na cedaṃ pramāṇam, gṛhītaviṣayatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:8146: taddeśasthitenaiva hi dhūmena tasminn eva deśe sa eva gomayendhanajanyāgnir anumīyate. ato deśabhedābhāvād aprāmāṇyam eva, ata āha -- tasyeti pādatrayeṇa. tasyaivaṃvidhasya pratyakṣadṛṣṭasya sandihyamānasadbhāvavastubodhāt pramāṇatā bhavati. yady api deśabhedo
GSP28mimsvtku:8147: nāsti. kālabhedāt tu saṃśayānasya saṃśayocchedadvāreṇa prāmāṇyam avihatam
GSP28mimsvtku:8148: iti. etac ca vindhyavāsināpi viśeṣadṛṣṭatvenodāhṛtam ity āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:8150: yadi viśeṣadṛṣṭodāharaṇam idaṃ kathaṃ tarhi bhāṣye
GSP28mimsvtku:8151: ākṛtigrahaṇam. evaṃ hi viśeṣa eva darśayitavyo bhavet. ata āha -- ākṛtyor
GSP28mimsvtku:8154: hetusādhyatvam. evaṃ hy atra pratyayaḥ. sa evāyam adya yāvadanuvartamāno gomayendhanavikārasya dhūmasyākāro dṛśyate. ata eva tadindhanayonir agnir anuvartata ity ato nānupapannam ākṛtigrahaṇam iti || 144 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8155: yady evam avivakṣitāvāntaraviśeṣam agnidhūmāntaram eva sāmānyato dṛṣṭodāharaṇatayā vācyam. kim ādityodāharaṇena. ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:8158: bhavati, naivaṃ gatiprāptyākṛtyoḥ. ataḥ prāptyākṛtimātrād gatyākṛtimātrānumānam āditya ekāntatas sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandham iti
GSP28mimsvtku:8160: kiṃ punas sāmānyatas sambandhagrahaṇe pramāṇam. na hy agṛhītayos sambandhinos sambandhagrahaṇam asti. na ca sāmānyayoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:8162: anavasthāpātāt. ata āha -- pratyakṣaviṣayatvam iti. bhaved anavasthā, yady anumānena sāmānyagrahaṇam iṣyate. tasya tu savikalpakasiddhau
GSP28mimsvtku:8163: pratyakṣaviṣayatvam upapādyānta upasaṃhṛtaṃ pratyakṣatvam atas siddhaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:8164: sāmānyasyeti. nanu vastv eva na sāmānyaṃ kiñcid asti nāma. tasya bhinnābhinnasyānirūpaṇād ata āha -- vastutvaṃ ceti. vastutvam apy ākṛtigranthe vistareṇa pratipādayiṣyate. pratyakṣaviṣayatāpratipādanena ca pratyakṣe 'pi prasādhitaprāyam eva. atra ca asti sāmānyavastuṣv ity anvayopapādanāya sāmānyasya vastutvam upanyastam eva. ayaṃ tu hetukathanārthaḥ punarupanyāsa iti. yas tu haituko na hetum antareṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:8165: pramāṇāntarasiddhāv ādriyate. taṃ prati hetunaivobhayam upapādayiṣyāma ity āha -- atreti {3,88} tatra vastutvaprasādhanārthaṃ tāvad hetum āha -- dhūmād
GSP28mimsvtku:8166: agnyanumānasyeti. bauddhā hy avastusāmānyālambanam anumānam ācakṣate.
GSP28mimsvtku:8167: sāmānyasya vikalpākāramātrābhyupagamāt. ata eva bhrāntir evānumānaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:8168: sambandhabalena svalakṣaṇarūpam upasthāpayatīti pramāṇam ity āhuḥ. tān eva pratīdam ucyate -- vastv ālambanam anumānam abhāvānyapramāṇatvāt yathā svārthe śrotrādibuddhiḥ. yā hi svaviṣaye śrotrādibhir indriyair buddhir
GSP28mimsvtku:8169: janyate, sā vastv ālambanaiva. yena ca yadindriyaṃ sannikṛṣyate sa tasya
GSP28mimsvtku:8170: svārthaḥ prāpyakāritvād indriyāṇām. tad iha mṛgatṛṣṇādijñānanirākaraṇārthaṃ svārthaviśeṣaṇam. aviśeṣeṇopādāne tu nābhāvānyapramāṇatvasya vastvālambanatayā vyāptiḥ kathitā bhavet.
GSP28mimsvtku:8171: bhrāntīnām ubhayavikalatvāt. na hi tāḥ pramāṇam. na ca vastv ālambanāḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:8172: anyasamprayuktendriyasya hi tā anyaviṣayā jāyante. īdṛśam eva jñānam
GSP28mimsvtku:8173: avastvālambanaṃ, na punaratyantāsadartham. evaṃ vastvālambanatve 'numānasya sādhite arthāt sāmānyaṃ vastv ity uktaṃ bhavati. idaṃ cāvastvālambanatvam anumānasyārthapadaṃ prayuñjānena bhāṣyakāreṇa nirākṛtam. anarthaviṣayam anumānam iti bauddhā manyante. yadvad iti(?)
GSP28mimsvtku:8175: arthasambandhena pravṛttes tadavyabhicārāt pramāṇam anumānam iti, teṣām idam uttaram arthas sāmānyam anumānasya viṣayo bāhya eva. na vikalpākāramātram ity ākṛtigranthe vistareṇa pratipādayiṣyata iti || 147
GSP28mimsvtku:8177: sāmānyasya ca vastutvam iti. sāmānyaṃ vastu abhāvānyaprameyatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:8178: asādhāraṇavastuvad iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti. pratyakṣaviṣayatām idānīṃ prayogeṇa darśayati -- pratyakṣeti pādatrayeṇa.
GSP28mimsvtku:8179: yadabhāvānyaprameyaṃ tat pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyata eva. yathā saugatānām evāsādhāraṇaṃ vastv iti || 148 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8180: {3,89} bauddhānām eva tu sāmānyam anumānaikaviṣayaṃ manvānānām
GSP28mimsvtku:8181: anavasthā prasajyata ity āha -- sāmānyam iti pañcabhiḥ. nigadavyākhyāto granthaḥ || 149 -- yadi tūcyate liṅgabhūtasāmānyagrahaṇārtham anumānāpekṣāyām anavasthā bhavati, na tadgrahaṇārtham anumānam apekṣyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:8182: dhūmādisvalakṣaṇadarśanaprabhavavikalpavedyatvāt tasya. na cāsāv apramāṇam, arthakriyāsamarthavastupratilambhāt. na ca pramāṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:8183: anarthaviṣayatvāt. ato 'nirvacanīyavikalpasiddhatvāt liṅgasya nānavasthā bhavatīty āśaṅkyāha -- atheti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na tāvat pramāṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:8184: apramāṇaṃ ca jñānaṃ sambhavati. viruddhasvabhāvayor ekatra pratiṣedhe
GSP28mimsvtku:8188: evāpadyeta.{3,90}pramāṇāntaraṃ ca sad yathā talliṅgasaṃvedane pramāṇam iṣyate, evaṃ liṅginy api prāpnoti. evaṃ ca vakṣyamāṇaprasaṅgo bhavet.
GSP28mimsvtku:8189: pramāṇād apramāṇād veti vadannanirdhāritobhayarūpatāṃ vikalpasya darśayatīti || 154 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8190: astu tarhi liṅgino 'pi tathaivāvagamaḥ, ko doṣaḥ, ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:8191: evam apīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- anavasthām api prasañjayatām asmākam anumānocchedāpādanam abhimatam. pramāṇāntarābhyupagame 'pi cānumānocchedo bhavaty eva. tad eva hi pramāṇaṃ tadā sarvasya
GSP28mimsvtku:8194: tato 'pramāṇāvagatāl liṅgāl liṅgijñānam api mithyā bhavet. bāṣpād iva dhūmasaṃviditād agnijñānam. evaṃ ca nānumānam iti. sa evānumānasya nityocchedaṃ ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- apramāṇāvabuddhād iti || 156 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8195: atra codayati -- nanv iti. yathā hy apramāṇam eva sambandhasmaraṇaṃ pramāṇakāraṇam iṣyate tathā liṅgajñānam api bhaviṣyatīty arthaḥ || 157 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8196: pariharati -- tatreti. smṛtir hi pūrvajñānād bhavantī tadupasthāpanadvāreṇānumāyām upayujyate. tac ca pramāṇam eveti tadanusārī nirṇayo yukta iti || 158 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8197: {3,91} na caiṣa prakāro liṅgagatau sambhavatīty āha -- na tv iti. na hy atra prāg api liṅgāvagame pramāṇaṃ kiñcid upapadyate, yat pramāṇajñānenopasthāpyata iti. na ca liṅgajñānam api smṛtir eveti vācyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:8199: nanu nirvikalpakagṛhītadhūmādisvalakṣaṇapariprāpakatayā liṅgajñānam api smṛtir eva. ato 'trāpi nirvikalpakapramāṇāntarato nirṇayo yukta eva. ata āha -- smārtam iti. yathā samprati sambandhajñānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:8200: gṛhītaprāpakatayā smaraṇam, evam etad api liṅgajñānaṃ nirvikalpakagṛhītaprāpakatayā tadabhedena smārtam iti yo vadati tasya vandhyāsute 'pi smaraṇaśaktir anivāritā. gṛhītaviṣayā hi smṛtir iti
GSP28mimsvtku:8201: sthitiḥ. na ca liṅgasāmānyajñānaṃ nirvikalpakagṛhītasvalakṣaṇālambanam iti kathaṃ smṛtiḥ. yad atra prakāśate tan na gṛhītaṃ, yac ca gṛhītaṃ tan na prakāśata iti na smṛtitvam. agṛhītagocarāyāṃ tu smṛtau vandhyāsute 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:8203: nanv anumānena liṅgasāmānyajñāne 'navasthā bhavati, yadi sāmānyātmakam eva liṅgaṃ tadgrahaṇārtham iṣyate, tasyānumānavedyatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:8204: asādhāraṇa evārthātmā sāmānyajñāne liṅgaṃ bhaviṣyati, sa ca pratyakṣa
GSP28mimsvtku:8205: eveti nānavasthā. ata āha -- na ceti. kiṃ na kāraṇam ata āha -- yasmād
GSP28mimsvtku:8206: iti. dṛṣṭāvinābhāvaṃ liṅgaṃ bhavati. na cāsya tena sāmānyenāvinābhāvaḥ kathañcid deśataḥ kālato vā dṛṣṭaḥ. asādhāraṇasya bhāvāntareṣv anusyūtyasambhavād ekatra dṛṣṭasya ca tatraiva niruddhatvād iti || 161 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8208: sāmānyarūpatāpattir ity āha -- syād veti. atra kāraṇam āha -- na hīti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8209: itaś cāsādhāraṇo 'rthātmā na liṅgam ity āha -- na ceti. dhūmādir hi dhūmo 'yam ityādivikalpāspadīkṛto 'gnyāder liṅgam iti dṛṣṭam.
GSP28mimsvtku:8210: asādhāraṇas tu kenacid rūpeṇāpy avyapadeśyaḥ kathaṃ liṅga bhaved iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:8211: liṅgatvaṃ nopapadyata iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti. nanu tiraścām asaty
GSP28mimsvtku:8212: eva śabdollekhe 'sādhāraṇarūpadarśinām evānumānaṃ dṛṣṭamato nāvyapadeśyatvād aliṅgatvam ata āha -- vikalpeti pādatrayeṇa. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- mā nāma tiraścāṃ śabdollekho bhavet, arthavikalpas tu teṣām
GSP28mimsvtku:8213: api pūrvāparānusandhānātmako 'sty eva. ato yuktam eva teṣām anumāne 'vyapadeśyasyāpi liṅgatvam. asādhāraṇas tu pūrvāparānusandhānād
GSP28mimsvtku:8214: vinārthavikalparahito 'pīti kathaṃ liṅgam. na hi so 'yam ity anārūḍho buddhau dhūmo 'gner liṅgaṃ bhavati. na caivam asādhāraṇe sambhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:8217: te 'py anvayābhāvād aliṅgaṃ, kim aṅga punarnirvikalpakaikagocaro
GSP28mimsvtku:8218: 'sādhāraṇo 'rthātmā ity āha -- kalpyanta iti. anvayābhāvād evāsādhāraṇajñānam api liṅgisāmānyajñāne na liṅgam ity āha -- etasmād eveti || 164 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8219: yadi tv anvayasiddhyartham asādhāraṇasya sāmānyarūpateṣyate, tato liṅgasāmānyagrahaṇa ivānavasthāprasaṅgāt tasyāpy anavadhāraṇam ity āha
GSP28mimsvtku:8220: -{3,93}sāmānyeti. yadi tu kasmiṃścid evāsādhāraṇe sāmānyena jñātasambandhe
GSP28mimsvtku:8221: nyadarśināpi sāmānyam anumīyate. evaṃ tarhi sarva eva sarvasya pratyāyako
GSP28mimsvtku:8222: bhavet. aviśeṣād ity āha -- kvacid veti || 165 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8223: evaṃ tāvan na liṅgāvadhāraṇe pramāṇam astīty uktam. idānīm anvayagrahaṇakāle liṅgijñāne 'pi na kiñcit pramāṇam astīty āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:8224: sambandhānubhava iti. nāgṛhīte liṅgini tatsambaddhaṃ liṅgaṃ śakyate 'vagantum. na cānumānapravṛtteḥ prāk tasmin sāmānyātmani bhavanaḥ kiñcit pramāṇam asty asmākam iva pratyakṣam, ato liṅginy apy avagamyamāne
GSP28mimsvtku:8227: liṅgaliṅgisaṃvyavahāraḥ, kim ihātinirbandhena. kācid eva hi vāsanodbhūtā kiñcil liṅgākāraṃ vikalpam āvirbhāvayantī kiñcid evānumānasaṃvyavahāraṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:8228: pravartayati. yathāhuḥ -- sa evāyam anumānānumeyavyavahāro buddhyārūḍhena
GSP28mimsvtku:8229: dharmadharminyāyena, na bahissadasattvam apekṣata iti, ata āha -- na
GSP28mimsvtku:8230: cāpīti. na vāsanāmātranirmitaṃ liṅgajñānam. vāsanā hi pūrvānubhavāhitas
GSP28mimsvtku:8231: saṃskāraḥ. nāsau liṅgasāmānyasya śaśaviṣāṇādivadatyantāsatas sambhavatīti kathaṃ vāsanāmātrālliṅgajñānasya sambhava iti. tannibandhane ca liṅgajñāna
GSP28mimsvtku:8232: iṣyamāṇe tadvad eva liṅgijñānopapatter anarthakaṃ trirūpāl liṅgato
GSP28mimsvtku:8233: 'rthadṛganumānam ity anumānaprāmāṇyāśrayaṇam ity āha -- liṅgijñānaṃ ceti || 167 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8234: {3,94} nanv iyam anavasthā meghābhāvena vṛṣṭyabhāvānumāne bhavato 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:8236: anavasthāpadyate. ata āha -- yatreti. yatra hi vṛṣṭyabhāve meghābhāvo liṅgaṃ nāsāv anumeyaḥ, abhāvākhyapramāṇāntaragamyatvāt. ato nātra tulyajātīyāpekṣānibandhano 'navasthādoṣo jāyata iti || 168 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8237: pratyakṣasāmānyavādināṃ tu na naḥ kācid anavasthety āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:8238: pratyakṣāvagatād iti. ataḥ pratyakṣād ity arthaḥ || 169 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8239: anumitānumāne tarhy anavasthā, ata āha -- yatrāpīti. pratyakṣā hi deśāntaraprāptir maulikaṃ mūle bhavaṃ liṅgaṃ, tena gatim anumāyāditye
GSP28mimsvtku:8241: nanv anityaś śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt, kṛtakatvaṃ ca tatra darśanād ity evaṃ karmānantarabhāvitayā kṛtakatve sādhyamāne karmaṇo 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:8242: hetvantarād anumāne 'navasthā bhaved ata āha -- liṅgatvam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:8244: iti kārakavyāpārānantarabhāvitvaṃ liṅgam uktam. tatra ca kārakaviśiṣṭā
GSP28mimsvtku:8245: kriyā tadviśiṣṭaṃ vā kārakam anantarabhāvitāṃ viśiṃṣalliṅgam āpatati.
GSP28mimsvtku:8246: ubhayaṃ{3,95}ca tatpratyakṣam. kriyāyās tāvat pratyakṣatvam anantaram eva sādhitam. kārakam api tadvat pratyakṣam eva. śaktis tu parokṣā. sā ca na
GSP28mimsvtku:8247: tāvad iha liṅgam. na cānumeyā. ataḥ kriyākārakayor ubhayor api pratyakṣatvān na dūragamanam. anumeyakarmavādinām api hi
GSP28mimsvtku:8249: evaṃ tāvadanumānasyāsati sāmānyasya vastutve pratyakṣatve ca dausthityam uktam idānīṃ sarvam eva pramāṇajātaṃ sāmānyasya dausthitye dusthitam āpadyeta teṣām api sāmānyāśrayatvāt. na ca tadapramāṇaṃ
